66a3(mdo): gyurd cig/ de na sems can gang dag grang ba'i sems can dmyal por skyes par gyur pa de dag gis kyang bdag mthong bar bde ba'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste dper bgyi na dge slong/
66a4(mdo): bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur da cig// de dag gis bdag mthong nas lus dang sems kyi bde ba mchog dang ldan par
66a5(mdo): gyurang nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ de dag de nas shi 'a/ phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur
66a6(mdo): zhing der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog par gyur da tsogi// sems can gang dag a dgas kyi gnas rnams su skye bar gyur da pa dag gis kyang bdag mthong par gyurarang
66a7(mdo): cig/ snga ma bzhin du sbyar da te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog par gyu rad cig// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o//
66a8(mdo): lha rnams la yang de bzhin te/ bdag ga 'od kyang gnyis kyurd tu snang bar gyur da cig/ bdag gi tshe yang dpag tu ma mchis par gyu ra la/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par
66a9(mdo): sus kyang bgrang bar rngo myi thog par gyurd cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa gzhan dag gi sangs
66b1(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag gis glang dag bsgrags par 'gyur ba/ bdag gi bsngags pa brjod par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag gis/ bdag gi bsngags pa 'thob par gyurd pa de/
66b2(mdo): dag kyang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar gyurd cig/ de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang mtshams ma mchis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams
66b3(mdo): dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ma gtogs pa dag/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
66b4(mdo): grangs ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis bdag gi mying thos par 'gyur zhing / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal bar gyurd cig/ de dag 'gum
66b5(mdo): pa'i dus kyi tshe na yang bdag tshogs du mas yongs su bskorod cing rab rib ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gang sems can de dag gi sdug/
66b6(mdo): bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i legs pa bshad pas sems can de dag tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/ rang pa de nyid kyis sems myed pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
66b7(mdo): thob par gyur du TIg/ sems dga' ba'i chos kyis bzod pa yang thob par gyurd cig/ 'gum pa'i skyes bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur du cig/
66b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na sems can gang dag nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / theg pa gsum po don tu myi gnyer ba rnams dang / sgra dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag don tu myi
66b9(mdo): gnyer ba rnams dang / dge ba yongs su btsal ba don du myi gnyer ba rnams dang / bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po don tu myi gnyer ba rnams dang / chos ma lags pa dang / 'dod
67a1(mdo): chags la chags pa rnams dang / 'dod pa kyi bzad pas zild kyis non pa rnams dang / chos log pas sems dkris pa de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na bdag tshogs du mas yong /
67a2(mdo): su bskor te mdun du mchis nas/ 'od dang ting nge 'dzind kyis chos stond par gyurd cig/ de dag ya bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang stond par gyu rad cig/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu
67a3(mdo): gsol par yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag kyang bdag la mchog tu dga' zhing dad pa thob par gyur nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur do cig/ de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thos
67a4(mdo): cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ de dag gis ting nge 'dzin/ nyi ma'i sgron ma thob par gyur nas/ gti mug spangs par gyu ra cig/ de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi/
67a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so// legs so// khyod kyis ni smon lam bzang por btab bo//
67a6(mdo): de nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag smond lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i srad pu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs
67a7(mdo): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang rab tu 'bab par gyu rad cig/ sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyurd pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na
67a8(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin gya nom snang ba zhes bgyi ba thob par gyur da cig/ de yang bdag nyid kyis mthong bar
67a9(mdo): gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzind gya nom snang ba skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dag du tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying /
67b1(mdo): po'i phye ma'i char bab pa de yang bdag nyid kyis mthong ba phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang mthong ba
67b2(mdo): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu shi nang tu myur bar spos kyi char yang bab la/ sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug pas na// rigs
67b3(mdo): kyi bu de'i phyir khyod seng ge spos shes bya bar gyurd cig/ seng ge spos khyod ni bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs myed pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ shar phyogs logs su
67b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung ba zhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'ad sa pa der/ 'jig rten gi khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral zhes
67b5(mdo): bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ seng ge spos khyod ni der bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
67b6(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba rdul bral spos mthob dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems
67b7(mdo): dpa' seng ge spos kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de la bka' stsa la pa/ lha myi lha myin rnams
67b8(mdo): kyis mchod par gyur pa longs// srid pa'i 'gro bar sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis sgrol// sred pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'ching ba khyod kyis mchod// myi'i rgyal ba 'phags pa'i gang
67b9(mdo): zag nyid du 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu brgyad pa gnod pa rna zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
68a1(mdo): nyon mongs pa can khri/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul bral ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
68a2(mdo): dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du byang chub sems dpa' gyu rad cig/ sangs rgyas
68a3(mdo): kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba pyod nas/ slad kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
68a4(mdo): bdag gis ni ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag myi spyod pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa byad par bgyi 'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag lo bdun
68a5(mdo): po 'di la gcig pu dben par mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgon/ yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su dag pa la
68a6(mdo): sems shing mchis pa na bdag gis ting nge 'dzind snang ba bkod pa las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzi nad khri chig stang bskyed cing thos te bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa
68a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' gyurd pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu
68a8(mdo): mchis pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la/ sma nad pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos stond pa de dag gang dag dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'ang
68a9(mdo): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgya nad ces bgyi ba rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su bltam pa de dag mthong zhing der 'jug par gyurd cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind des bdag gis sangs
68b1(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar gyur da cig/ ting nge 'dzi nad kyi mthus bdag gnas pa ma mchis
68b2(mdo): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kyis re re la yang phyag 'tshal bar gyurd cig/ re re la yang bdag gi lus re res rin po che dang / me tog sna tshogs bla na ma mchis
68b3(mdo): pa dag dang / spros dang / me tog 'phreng dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / rol me'i smre bla na ma mchis pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / bkod ya na ma mchis pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur da cig/
68b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yang bdag bskal pa rgya mtsho'i bya ma snyed du spyod par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gis lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi skad cig gcig
68b5(mdo): gis sangs rgyas re re'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul/ sangs/ rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'tshal par gyur/ da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ting nge 'dzind
68b6(mdo): yon tan 'byung gnas kyis de dag re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi tshul phra rab kyi rdu lnga snyed kyi bstod pa bla na ma mchis pa dag gis ba stod par gyu rad cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
68b7(mdo): gis myig mya 'dzums kyi ting nge 'dzind kyis rdul gcig gi steng du sems kyi tshad kyis rgyal ba rnams kyis maltam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar gyur cig// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dra
68b8(mdo): bdag gis nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzi nid kyis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sems can dag na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub seMs
68b9(mdo): dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar gyurd cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis sems can dmyal ba rnams su
69a1(mdo): zhugs te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su sprul nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la chos stond par 'gyur zhing / byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu gsol bar gyur
69a2(mdo): cig/ de nas sems can de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyu rad cig/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang myi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag
69a3(mdo): bzhugs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos nyand par 'gyur te/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur da cig/ dud 'gro'i rnams la yang de bzhin yi dgas rnams la yang de bzhin// gnod/
69a4(mdo): sbyin rnams la yang de bzhin/ srin po rnams la yang de bzhin/ lha ma yin rnams la yang de bzhin/ klu rnams la yang de bzhin/ myi 'am ci rnams la yang de bzhin/ lto 'phye chen po rnams la yA
69a5(mdo): de bzhin sha za rnams la yang de bzhin/ srul po rnams la yang de bzhin/ lus srul po rnams la yang de bzhin/ myig/ rol pa rnams la yang de bzhin/ tshong pa rnams dang / smad 'tshong
69a6(mdo): ma rnams la yang de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rigs ji lta bur skyes pa dang / de dag gis lus ji lta bur thob pa dang / sems can las kyi rkye nad ji lta bus bde ba 'am sdug
69a7(mdo): bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba rnams bzo'i gnas ji lta bu dang / las kyi gnas ji lta bu dag la chags pa rnams la de lta bu'i lus su sprul nas/ bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de lta bu dag la brjon
69a8(mdo): pa stond par bgyid cing / de lta bu'i yi ge brjod pas sems can rnams kyi sems mgu bar bgyid cing / chos kyang stond par gyur cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
69a9(mdo): yang dag par 'dzi nad tu 'jug cing 'jud pa dang / rab tu 'god par yang gyurd cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog pa la 'god par yang gyur cig/
69b1(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu po thams cad dag na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la ji nas kyang / sngon gyi las dang / nyon mongs pa
69b2(mdo): ma lus par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'ga'i sems kyi rgyud kyi lam yang bdud bzhis rtogs par myi 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag
69b3(mdo): gis byang chub kyi pyad pa spyad par bgyi'o// de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snang rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po skar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdug
69b4(mdo): bral gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ltar yongs su dag par 'jog par gyur da cig/ de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / bdag gi 'khor yang ji ltar byang chub seMs
69b5(mdo): dpa' seng ge'i spos kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i
69b6(mdo): slad du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag gi sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyu rad cig/ thams cad kyang sems mnyen par gyu rad cig/ sems las su
69b7(mdo): rung bar gyur cig/ rang rang gi gling bzhi pa'i dag na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dag mthong bar gyurd cig/ sems can de dag la rin po che sna tshogs ngag dang / me tog dang / spos dang byug
69b8(mdo): pa dang / bye ma dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bdog par gyur pa des sems can de dag sangs rgyas de dag la yang mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par
69b9(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'ja ni snang ba bkod pa'i mthus bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de brjod
70a1(mdo): ma thag tu ji ltan smon lam btab pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyisra bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi
70a2(mdo): bu khyod ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kho rakhor yug tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khri 'jog par 'gyur ro// sems can dpag tu byed pa grangs myed pa dag gi sems kyi rgyud yongs su
70a3(mdo): dag par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag la/ mchod pa dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag byed par spro bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
70a4(mdo): de'i phyir khyod kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig/ kun tu bzang po khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grang das myed pa gang ga'i klung cigagi phyis skyed 'das nas/ bskal pa
70a5(mdo): gnyis pa la bab pa na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi/ zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams ye shes kyi
70a6(mdo): chug nad tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po khyod ni de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshes
70a7(mdo): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rjes rnam par bsgyings pI dab gyu tog ces bya bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas bya
70a8(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos gdugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po/
70a9(mdo): bka' stsal pa// brtul zhugs bzang po rab tu dga' ba sems btul longs// dam bcas brtan pa sems can rnams kyi rgyud skyongs la// khyod kyis sems can nyon mongs myi bzad pa las
70b1(mdo): sgrol// khyod ni 'jig rten ye shes smon mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur// rigs kyi bu yang de'i tshe na srog chags le lo can khris tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
70b2(mdo): 'das bsam pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i byung ba 'apyod cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba na/ bdag cag kyang
70b3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// de ltar bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs
70b4(mdo): su rdzogs par bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba ra gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snyi pa pos srog chags khri bo de dag la 'di skad du lung bstand
70b5(mdo): te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyed cag 'jig rten
70b6(mdo): gi khams de'i kho ra khor yug dag tu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ stong stong zhing mtshan mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs
70b7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa mye skye thab khung dbang phyug dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsgom pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs shes bya
70b8(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa shi nad tu dri myed dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa gya nom 'jigs myed dbyang
70b9(mdo): kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri myed dbyangs kyi gzi'i brjid dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// lnga brgya yang mtshan mthun
71a1(mdo): te 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnyis pa 'jigs bral grags pa'i rgyal po dang / 'od zer bral dang / 'od zer bral ba'i dbyangs dang /
71a2(mdo): grags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs dang / rnam 'grel chos grags dbyangs dang / snying po'i grags pa'i rgyal po dang / rim can rgyal mtshan dang / snang ba'i dbang phyug drang / thub pa ye shes 'bar ba'i
71a3(mdo): dbang phyug dang / gnas kyi go bstsags rgyal po dang / ye shes blo gros bsam yas snying po dang / ye shes blun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye ges rgya mtsho la rgyal po dang / bcon 'grus chen
71a4(mdo): po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang // lhun po'i dpal lta bu dang / ye shes rdul bral shugs dang / ci'i dbang phyug sa bon dang / ye shes shi nad tu dri myed sgrogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / yon tan
71a5(mdo): rgya mtsho zil mnan rgyal po dang / ye shes 'byung ba stobs kyi rgyal po dang / byang chub rdul bral rgyal po dang / thub pa dpal brtsegs shugs kyi me tog dang / ye shes dpal
71a6(mdo): brtsegs blo dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / tshul khrims 'od gas la dang / bzang mchog dang // 'od zer mtha' yas dang / se nga ge dga' dang // ye ges myi bzang ba rtsegs dang / rin chen
71a7(mdo): snang ba dang / ye shes dri myed dang / ye shes rgyas pa dang / seng ge grags pa dang / dngon shes yon tan rgyal po dang / chos kyi sna ma'i me tog char 'bebs dang / 'od 'byed dang / lhun po mngon 'phags
71a8(mdo): dang / chos yang dag 'phags rgyal po dra myed dang / spos kyi dbang phyug dang / dri myed s+yan dang // rab tu che bam chags dang / thogs myed stobs kyi rgyal po dang / rang gi ye shes bsod nams stobs dang /
71a9(mdo): ye shes chos gos dang / dbang sgyur dang / chags myed phan bzhed dang // ye shes yang dag 'byung dang / lhun po chen po dang / stobs kyi snying dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'khri shing me tog rgyal mtshan
71b1(mdo): dang / yon tan 'od dang / gti mug rnam bral yon tan rgyal po dang / rdo rje mchog dang / chos kyi tog dang / dbyangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / legs sbas dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / zhi can dbang phyug dang / mngon 'phag/
71b2(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ri bo lta bu dang / dga' sprin dang / chos byed dang / sa la'i rgyal po dang / kun skyed dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang / ye shes dag bsags dang / ye ges 'od 'phro dang / me tog tshogs can dang / glang
71b3(mdo): po che'i dbang po'i dbang phyug dang / u tum pa ra'i me tog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / tsam ngan dang / shi nad tu brtan pa dang / mthus gnod dang / rgyal mtshan gyi
71b4(mdo): the mo'i sgron ma' dang / ye shes go rims dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal dmatshan dang / rnam rgyal chos grags dang / nga rgyal sgrogs dang / yon tan 'od 'phro dang / ye shes 'od dang / ye shes sgron ma dang /
71b5(mdo): bde ba'i rgyal po dang / ye shes dbyangs dang / rgyal mtshan pa sdus pa dang / rdo rje'i sgron ma dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i grangs dang / rab tu brtan pa dang / blo gros zla ba'i
71b6(mdo): rgyal po dang / rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / sa la'i dbang po seng ge'i sgra dang / sred myed kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po dang / yon tan rin cen yang dag bstsags dang / skar ma'i snying po dang
71b7(mdo): skar ma' nam 'jigs grags pa dang / bsod nams stobs sa la'i rgyal po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang / tshangs mchog dang / yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong na
71b8(mdo): spos kyi pad ma rnam rgyal grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / spos kyi pad ma dam pa'i thugs dang / yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas ye shes
71b9(mdo): bla dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma dang // yon tan ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang // seng ge'i tog dang / klus spangs te me tog gzi' brjid rgyal po dang / dri zhim sa bon bdag myed dang / yon tan bdud rtsi gzazi'
72a1(mdo): brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos byin rgyal po klu dbang rnam grol sang byed
72a2(mdo): 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i myig gi ri bo zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu nyi ma gcig dang // dus gcig tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
72a3(mdo): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro// srog chags khri bo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgos gtugs pa dang /
72a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa klu ltar brtan par sgrogs dag re shig longs// dge ba'i nor rnams dag ni yang dag stsogs kyis la// pha rol du phyin
72a5(mdo): pa rnams la myur tu brtson kyis dang / lha myi 'jig rten rnams/ kye 'dren pa dag tu 'gyur// bam po / rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu dgu pa
72a6(mdo): sdig myed ces bya ba la smras pa dang / snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba myong pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
72a7(mdo): rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams bdag gi dbang lags par 'gyur ba de ltar
72a8(mdo): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa khyad pa bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis khyod kyis spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
72a9(mdo): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba spyod pa na/ 'gyod pa'i sems skye bar ma gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa na nye/
72b1(mdo): par bzung ba'i bar du dam bcas pa brtan zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can gzhan gi sems 'khrug par myi bgyid par gyurd cig/ bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs
72b2(mdo): rgyas kyi theg par sems myi bskyed par gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba skye bar ma gyur cig/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang ldan par ma gyur cig/ rgod pa dang ldan
72b3(mdo): bar ma gyurd cig/ 'gyod pa dang ldan par ma gyur pa cig/ the tsom dang ldan par ma gyurd cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa pyod pa na/ srog gcod pa ma
72b4(mdo): mchis pa dang / ma byin par lend pa ma mchis pa dang / myi ngas par spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / brdzun tu smra ba ma mchis pa dang / phra ma ma mchis pa dang / ngag grub mo ma mchis pa dang /
72b5(mdo): tshig kyal ba ma mchis pa dang / brnab sems ma mchis pa dang / gnod sems ma mchis pa dang / log par lta ba ma mchis pa dang / the tsom dang ldan pa ma mchis pa dang / chos la myi
72b6(mdo): gus pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang / slu ba'i sems ma mchis shing chos de dag ma mchis par gyurd cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du gom pa 'dor ba tsam la yang rtag tu/
72b7(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'jug par gyurd cig/ bdag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyand pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen
72b8(mdo): bkur byed pa dang / myi bral bar gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang rab tu byung ba thob par gyur da cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du phyag darang khrod par gyurd cig/ chos gos gsum pa dang /
72b9(mdo): shing drung pa dang / cog pu pa dang / dgon pa pa dang / bsod snyoms pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / chos stond pa dang / tshig btsun pa dang / spobs pa dpag tu myed pa phun sum tshogs
73a1(mdo): par gyurd cig/ lhung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ brdzun tu smra ba dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ phas kyi rgol ba 'dul bar ma gyur cig/ bud myed la stong pa nyid dang ldan
73a2(mdo): pa'i chos stond par gyur da cig// stong pa nyid yid la bgyis pas bud myed la chos stond par bgyid par gyur da cig/ lag pa bskur zhing chos stond par ma gyur da cig/ rtag tu bdag theg pa chen po la
73a3(mdo): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la stond pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur da cig// bdag chos smra ba gang la chos nyand pa na de la stond pa'i 'du shes kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur da cig/
73a4(mdo): bdag chos smra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ji lta ba de ltar rim 'gro bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri yor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid par gyur
73a5(mdo): cig/ chos smra ba la bdag gi sha dag gi bar gyis kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyurd cig// bdag snod dang sno/ da ma lags par myi rtog par sbyin pa sbyin par gyur da cig/
73a6(mdo): bdag chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag bskyed par ma gyur da cig/ bdag byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la rang gi srog gi sbyin pas yongs su skyob
73a7(mdo): par gyurd cig/ bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i rdzas kyis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs su tha rad par
73a8(mdo): bgyid par gyu rad cig/ bdag rab tu byung ba'i rtags can nam khyim pa'i rtags can ltung ba byung ba 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ba dag la bskul bar bgyid par ma gyur da cig/ bdag rnyed pa dang / bkur
73a9(mdo): sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la rtag tu mye dang / dug dang / mtshon cha lta bur 'du shes skyed par gyurd cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi daphyan sngar
73b1(mdo): smon lam btab pa'i smon lam 'di dag byang chub kyi mthar thug par nye bar bzung ba'i bar du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa gnyis su lha'i 'khor lo rin po che cibs
73b2(mdo): stong mchis pa lte ba dang / bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ nyi ma'i kha dog ltar 'od gsal ba dag 'byung bar gyurd cig/ rgyal bu sdig myed kyis tshig smras ma thag tu lag pa gnyis su ji ltar 'dod
73b3(mdo): pa de lta bu'i 'khor lo dag 'byung bar gyurd pa dang / yang gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na// de'i slad
73b4(mdo): du 'khor lo 'di dag 'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgya sa kyi zhing dag sgras mngon par go bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa dran pa myi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong
73b5(mdo): ba/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa la pyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul kyi chos// kyi rnam grangs 'di dpyod du gsal ba'i slad du/ ji ltar klu'i/ rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis ma mchis pa de lta
73b6(mdo): bu'i sgra gsang mthong pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mchi bar gyurd cig/ gang dag dar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rna ba'i dbang po dag
73b7(mdo): tu yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis grag par gyurd cig/ klag ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyurd cig/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga rgyal dang / tha dog dang / ser
73b8(mdo): snga rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran par yid la bgyid pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyurd cig// rigs kyi
73b9(mdo): bu rgyal bu sdig myed kyis 'khor lo rin po che de dag btang ba dang / de dag 'di ltar mgyogs par song ste/ 'di lta ste dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgyogs pas gshegs pade
74a1(mdo): bzhin du 'khor lo rin po dag kyang song ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag tu song nas sems can rnams byang /
74a2(mdo): chub sems dpa' lung stond pa/ dran pa myi brjod pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa la 'apyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myod du bcug go//
74a3(mdo): sems can gang dag gi rna ba'i dbang por chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa/ de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / ser sna'i bar gyi sems dang / sems las byung ba dag rab
74a4(mdo): tu zhi bar gyurd cig/ thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul yid la byed pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'khor
74a5(mdo): po de dag kyang yud tsam gcig gis phyir log ste// rgyal bu sdig myed kyis mdun tu 'dug go// rigs kyi bu de na sa de bzhin gshegs par rin po che'i snying pos// rgyal
74a6(mdo): bya sdig myed la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis ni smon lam shi nad tu bzang po btab ste/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas
74a7(mdo): kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu btang bas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag rnyog pa myed pa'i sems dag la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu
74a8(mdo): bcug pas na// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod myi 'khrug pa zhes bya bar gyu ra cig/ kyi 'khrugs pa khyod ni 'jig rten gi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur gyis/ myi 'khrugs pa khyod kyis
74a9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi/ yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa longs cig/ myi 'khrugs pas gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag na ji ltar sa gzhi thams cad gser las
74b1(mdo): grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/ lga'i nor bu rin po che rnam par bkram pa/ gseg ma dang / gyo mo dag ma mchis pa/ gor ma'i ka ba dang / pha bong dang / mi dag ma mchis shing ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg/
74b2(mdo): bde zhing 'jam la/ rkang mu thil bzhag ma ni nems shes bgyid/ rkang mthil bteg na ni pa rad ces bgyid pa/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag 'tshal te/ de na sems cam
74b3(mdo): dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dag ma mchis par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dri nga ba dag ma mchis par gyurd nas/ sangs
74b4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing de na lha'i lasa? shi na tu 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyurd cig// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dag gis kun tu gang
74b5(mdo): bar gyurd cig/ de na sems can rnams la dga' ba dang / nang dang / 'gum pa ma mchis par gyurd cig/ gcig gis gcig 'jig pa ma mchis pa dag dang / gcig
74b6(mdo): la gcig mtho 'tsham pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can na/ mas la dus ma lags par 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / 'gyod cing 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag
74b7(mdo): par 'gus pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bgyid par gyurd cig/ ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
74b8(mdo): kyi zhing snyigs pa lnga dang ldan pa stong pa rnams su skye bar ma gyurd cig/ byang chub cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi 'bral bar gyurd cig/ chos nyan pa dang dge
74b9(mdo): 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang myi 'bral bar gyurd cig/ de na sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bar gyurd cig/ de na thams cad kyang dge ba
75a1(mdo): bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams bzol bgyid par ma rgyu rad cig/ de ma ngan song gi rgyu mtshan ma mchis
75a2(mdo): gyurd cig/ de na sems can rnams la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa'i lam ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la mdog ngan pa ma mchis par gyur da cig/ de na sems can rnams la 'di lta
75a3(mdo): ste rje bo 'am/ bran gyi rim pa ma mchis par gyur cig// de na sems can rnams la bdag gi ba ma mchis shing yongs su 'dzind pa ma mchis par gyur cig// de mnyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'
75a4(mdo): rnams pa tha na g.yar lam na yang khu ba 'byind pa ma mchis par gyu rad cig/ de na sems can thams cad chos 'tshal ba dang / chos yongs su tshol ba spur le nad par gyu ra cig/
75a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can 'ga' yang log par lta/ khar gyi 'gyur zhing / gzhan mu stegs can yang ma mchis pa/ ra gyurd cig/ de na sems can rnams la lus ngal pa ma
75a6(mdo): mchis ga sems ngal ba yang ma mchis par gyur da cig/ de ma sems can de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan bar gyu rad cig/ de na sems can thams cad la bkres
75a7(mdo): pa dang / skom pa dang / rnam par mtho' 'tsham pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ ji ltar 'dod pa na pyod pa'i lha rnams bzhin du kha zas ji lta bu dag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag mdun du rin po che'i snod
75a8(mdo): dag ras 'byung bar gyur da cig/ bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil sa dang / sngabs dang / mchis dang / lus kyi dngul rag ma mchis par gyur da cig/ se klang ba ma mchis pa dang / cha ba ma mchis
75a9(mdo): bar gyur bag/ dri gda' ba dang / nyams dga' bar gyur da cig/ de na reg na 'jam pa'i bser ma dag ldang bar 'gyur zhing / de dag lnga dang kyi rnams kyi spos kyi bya ba bgyid par gyur cig/
75b1(mdo): bdag gi 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta bur 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe gcig ni bser ma bsil bar 'tshal la/ gcig shos ni dron po 'tshal ba dang / la la ud pa la'i dri gda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal
75b2(mdo): la/ la la ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri gda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal ba dang / la la ni dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi dri gda' ba dang / la la ni rgya spos kyi dri gda' ba dang / la la ni a ka ru ba'i bser ma
75b3(mdo): 'tshal la/ la la ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bser ma ye myi 'tshal bar 'gyur na yang / de dag gis ji ltar sems bskyed cing dmyigs pa de bzhin du 'grub par gyu da cig/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
75b4(mdo): khams de snyigs ma lnga dang bral bar gyur da cig/ de na sem das can rnams la rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i kheng pa brdekra pa da dag mchis par gyurd par rin po che sna bdun gyi khri shing bal gyi
75b5(mdo): sngas 'jam po dag gis kun tu g.yogs shing ka tsa lin di ka ltar/ reg na 'dzam pa dag 'byung bar gyurd cig/ khang pa brtse/ gas pa de dag gi kho ra khor yug gang dag tu myi de dag chab kyi
75b6(mdo): bya ba bgyid par 'gyur bar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chab kyis yongs su bltam pa'i rdzing dag 'byung bar gyurd cig/ sna ma'i me tog gi shing dang / shing ta la dang / shing ljond pa'i 'phreng ba dag gis brgyan
75b7(mdo): par gyurd cig/ shing ljond pa de dag kyang me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi rgya nad 'phreng sna tshogs dang rgyan ma chok+kas/
75b8(mdo): ke/ brgya nad par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams gos dang / rgyan ji lta bu 'tshal ba dag dpag bsams kyi shing de dag las blangs te gyon par gyur da cig/ de bzhin du me tog rnams dang / rgyan dag gi bar
75b9(mdo): yang blangs te/ thogs par gyur da cig/ bdag gi byang chub kyi ga pi ni rin po bdun las grub par gyur da la/ 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong mchis/ sdong po'i snyoms su ni dpag tshad gcig mchis / sa/
76a1(mdo): ga gyes pa'i khyon tu yang dpag tshad stong mchis par gyurd cig/ byang chub kyi shing de ba ser ma bskyod pa las pha rol tu phyind pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
76a2(mdo): byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra lha'i las shi nad tu 'das pa 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung bar gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos par gyu rad pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i seMs
76a3(mdo): kyi dran pa so sor thob par gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud myed rnams ni 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi bu'i bu mo ltar yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyurd cig/
76a4(mdo): de na bud myed rnams la dri nga ba ma mchis shing / skye gnyis pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas bkris pa ma mchis par gyurang cig/ de na myi rnams bud myed dang lhan cig tu lto zhing 'khrig
76a5(mdo): pa pyod pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na skyes pa ga/ nga dag kun tu chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur na/ de/ mchis te ku nad tu chags pa'i sems kyis yud tsam zhig/
76a6(mdo): bud myed la bltas pas/ skyes pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur nas shi nad du yid byung ste/ slar ldog cing gtsang ba rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad thob par gyurd cig/ ting
76a7(mdo): de 'dzind des bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su grol nas/ slan chad 'dod chags kyi sems mya skye bar gyur da cig/ de na bud myed gang lags pa de dag kun tu chags pa'i skyes pa la
76a8(mdo): brtags pa tsam gyis/ sbrum par 'gyur zhing brtags pa tsam gyis gnyi ga'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyurd cig/ mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang lags pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/
76a9(mdo): dper bgyi na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas lus dang sems kyi dbe' ba myong ba de lta bu'i lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig/
76b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mngal ma gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo dag gdugs mtshan bdun du de lta bu'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyu rad cig/ zung myed sbrusgyum ma de dag kyang 'di lta ste dper bgyid na dge
76b2(mdo): slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ sems can de dag kyang mngal gyi dri ma dang / myi phreng bas gos par myi 'gyur zhing / dgung bdun pa la mchog
76b3(mdo): tu dri gda' ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa dang ldan bzhin du btsa' bar gyurd cig/ bud myed de yang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur zhing / gnyis ka rdzing bur zhugs te khrus bgyis nas bud
76b4(mdo): myed des gang gis 'dod chags dang bral ba gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur cig/ ting de 'dzind des 'dod chags kyi chos rnams las yongs su grol
76b5(mdo): zhing rtag par rgyu nad tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur da cig// gang gis tshe rabs snga ma dag la bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po// ra bud kyi lus nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las
76b6(mdo): bgyis shing bstsags pa gang lags pas kyang ting nge 'dzind de mngon par bsgrubs pas bud myed kyi lus thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su bas par 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las
76b7(mdo): 'das kyi bar du slan chad bud myed kyi lus myi 'thob par gyurd cig/ sems can gang dag gis gang gi slad du bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag tu mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su
76b8(mdo): myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa de dag gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa'i mying thos shing dad pa thob par gyur da nas/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas
76b9(mdo): kyi zhing mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig// der sems can de dag gi las de thams cad kyis thams cad du yongs su bas par gyurd cig/ sems can de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi
77a1(mdo): bar du slan chad mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag las yongs su bas nas mngal du gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/
77a2(mdo): bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bud myed dam/ mngal na gnas par mngon pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shind tu bde ba dang ldan par gyu rad cig/ snga ma'i mye tog gi zhi pa ta la dag bser
77a3(mdo): mas bskyod par gyurd pa na/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngas pa dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra skad nyams dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur da cig/ sgra des myi rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin
77a4(mdo): sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba thob par gyurd cig/ ting nge 'dzi nad des sems can de dag gis stong pa nyid snang ba'i chos zab mo ngag rtogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing den
77a5(mdo): 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra ma mchis par gyurd cig// bcu// mab bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi shing rlung du mchis na// sa/ yud tsam gcig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
77a6(mdo): ba'i byang chub thob par gyurd cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mye tog kha zum pa ma gtogs par nyi ma dang / zla ba dag gi 'od kyang myi mngon par gyur da cig/
77a7(mdo): lha'i myig gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
77a8(mdo): 'odadi dag bdag gis gtong bar gyur na cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa ra/ smra gang gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu gang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgras chos stond par gyur
77a9(mdo): cig/ de ma sems can gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dras pa thob par gyur cig/ de dag gang dang gang du mchi ba dang / 'chag pa dang / mchis padz+ra/
77b1(mdo): ldog par 'gyur ba na/ de dag gis rtag par rgyu nang tu bdag mthong bar gyur cig/ de dag chos rnams la ji ltar the tsom du gyu ra pan/ de dag gis bdag la bltas pa tsam dang
77b2(mdo): bdag byang chub zab pa na/ bdag mthong ba tsal gyis de dag gi the tsom ma mchis par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning dpag tu ma mchis
77b3(mdo): pa dkan nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg sa pa 'am/ blan myed pa'i theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag mchis pa de dag gis bdag gi gyi
77b4(mdo): rang bsngags pa zos par gyur cig// de dag de nas shi phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur da cig/ de dag gis der bdag las chos thos nas nyan thos kyi
77b5(mdo): theg pa pa gang lags pa de dag ni rnam par tha dad pa brgyad kyi bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur cig/ de na gang ngag theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags
77b6(mdo): pa de dag gis ni/ bdag la chos thos nas ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang bzod pa zab mo dag thob par gyur da cig/ de dag de nyid du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog
77b7(mdo): par yang gyur da cig/ bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni dpag tu ma mchis par gyur da la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar rngo gyi thog par gyu ra cig/ bdag gis
77b8(mdo): byang chub thob pa na gang dang gang tu 'chi zhing / sa phyogs gang dang gang du rkang mthil bzhag pa de dang der pad ma 'dab ma stong mchis la/ gser gi mdog lta bur gda' ba dag 'byung bar gyur da cig/
77b9(mdo): pad ma de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gzhan dag tu mchis nas/ bdag gi bsngags pa dang / sgra dang / dbyangs brjod par gyu rad cig/ sems can de dag gis bdag gi myong yang bsngags pa dang /
78a1(mdo): snyan pa thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes par gyur cig/ de dag rab tu dang ba bskyes nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye 'tshal bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i
78a2(mdo): tsha ba de dag kyang der yongs su sngo bar gyur cig/ de dag de rus shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur rad cig/ bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dge sbyong dri ma dang bral ba dang / dge sbyong
78a3(mdo): gi dkor dang / dge sbyong gi gya rgyu dang bral ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang bral bar gyur da cig/ 'khor rnams kyang chos lhur le nad cing / yo byad sbur lend pa me lags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sbur
78a4(mdo): le dang pa ma lags pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa la mngon par dga' bar gyurd cig/ bdag gi 'khor rnams brtson 'grus pa thams shing chos la 'bab
78a5(mdo): pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par gyurd cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir myi ldog par gyur da pa de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa la zhugs pa'i dran pa thob par gyur cig/ de dag
78a6(mdo): tshe 'phos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod par gyurd cig// byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du de dag gis chos de dag myi brjed par gyur da cig// bdag byang chub
78a7(mdo): thob nas bskal pa chen po khri'i bar gnas par gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa stong du gnas par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dra pa/
78a8(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su blangs pa ni legs so legs so// myi 'khrugs pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
78a9(mdo): 'das nas/ grangs myed pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ shar phyogs logs su 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar khyod kyi smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i
78b1(mdo): yo ma tan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ der khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang myi 'khrugs pa
78b2(mdo): zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// myi 'khrugs pas gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
78b3(mdo): lta na/ de'i slad du 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na gang dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis yongs su zand pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i
78b4(mdo): sems dang ldan par gyur cig// mkhon ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa ma mchis pa'i sems su gyur da cig/ de dag 'di lta bu'i lus kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ 'di lta
78b5(mdo): ste dper bgyi na sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind pad ma la snyoms par zhugs shing / de/ sa bsam pa la spong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bur
78b6(mdo): sems can rnams kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyurd cag// gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad gser gi kha dog lta bur
78b7(mdo): gda' bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sems can thams cad kyang ji ltar smon lam gtab pa de
78b8(mdo): lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur/ de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyang gser gi kha dog lta bur snang bar gyurd pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsa yad pa/ blo gros rab mchog sems kyi
78b9(mdo): 'khrugs pa yongs// lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo mchog rab gnas// phyi rnams mang po'i snying rje'i sems la bkod// bre gros dge khyod 'gro ba'i stonang par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze
79a1(mdo): rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu pa gangs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// rgyal bu gangs kyi nor bus kyang ji ltar myi 'khrugs pas smond lam btab pa de bzhin du smon lam btab bo//
79a2(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa'i yid la bgyid par gyurd cig/ thams cad
79a3(mdo): kyi sug par yang tsan dan/ sbrul gyi snying po'i dra 'byung bar gyur da cig/ de dag thams cad kyis dri de yang sangs rgyas kyi skra dag la yongs su bsngo bar gyur da cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
79a4(mdo): kyi bu khyod kyis spyod lam rgya chen po btab pa ni legs so legs so// gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi lag tu tsan dam sbrul gyi snying po bzhag pa dang / bsam pa zag pas sangs rgyas
79a5(mdo): yid la byed pa bskyed pas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod spos kyi glang po che zhes bya bar gyur cig/ spos gi glang po che chu/ da ni bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
79a6(mdo): 'das nas bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/
79a7(mdo): dam pa'i chos nub pa nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / spos kyi glang po tshe khyod 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
79a8(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi mye tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// spos kyi glang po ches kyang gsol pa a bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi
79a9(mdo): re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ kun dga'i ra ba 'di thams cad du kye tog ces bka'
79b1(mdo): char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i rab
79b2(mdo): de thams cad du mye tog tsam pa ka'i char mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ shi nang tu dri zhim tshogs rab mchog sems longs// mye tog tsam pa mchog
79b3(mdo): gi char 'di bab// rab tu gya nom dge ba'i lam stond la// 'gro ba mang po 'jigs myed sgor khod cag// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu gcig pa seng ge zhes bya ba la snga ma
79b4(mdo): bzhin du sbyar ro// ji ltar spos kyi glang po ches smond lam btab pa bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la/ na ba ci'i rgyam can yul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/
79b5(mdo): skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod rin po che'i tog ces bya bar gyurd cig/ rin po che'i tog khyod ni ma 'ongs// pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye
79b6(mdo): ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma don par dga' ba zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa gser gi mye
79b7(mdo): tog yongs su mye tog yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i dam pa'i chos nub nas par gyi bskal pa gsum 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// der khyod bla na myed
79b8(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa glang po che rnam par bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs shes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar
79b9(mdo): du 'gyur ro// khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhi gshegs pa kyi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// rim po che'i to/ krig sol pa/ btsun pa bcoM
80a1(mdo): ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
80a2(mdo): gang dag byang chub chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu snying rje zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/ slar myi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa
80a3(mdo): sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la phyag byas pa dang / de bzhin du
80a4(mdo): sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di lta ste/ sems canahAms cad snying rje'i sems la bkod par gyur pa de lta bu'i dran ba thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs
80a5(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i/ tog la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros legs pa gzugs mchog brtan pa longs// sems can phyir ni dam bcas
80a6(mdo): rab brtan byas// skye bo mang po rdul bral sems la bzhag/ myi mchog sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mnyen des las bstsogs pa rgyal bu lnga
80a7(mdo): brgyas kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / yongs su blangs pa de ltar smon lam btab cing / de lta bu'i sangs
80a8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su blangs nas/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
80a9(mdo): ba'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand to// gzhan yang rgyal bu bzhi brgyas kyang rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis ji
80b1(mdo): lta ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na byed
80b2(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gzhan yang rgyal bu dgu bcus kyang kun tu bzang pos ji lta ba de lta bu'i smon lam btab cing / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
80b3(mdo): pa blangs so// khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad kyis kyang so so nas smon lam khyad par can dag btab cing / sa so nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs
80b4(mdo): thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos// du sa gcig tu 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
80b5(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de bzhin du srog chags du// da phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis kyang so sa na/ sa smonang lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tam
80b6(mdo): bkod pa dag kyang yongs su blangs nas/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de bzhin du khyed cag kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na skye//
80b7(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand to// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi
80b8(mdo): bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i gcen bcung po brgyas po de dag gi thu bo/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag ces bya ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
80b9(mdo): gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su longs shig/ bram ze'i
81a1(mdo): khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis smras pa/ yab rje khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig/ rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis spras pa/ bu rje khyod kyis smon lam thob shig dang / kho bos byis
81a2(mdo): smon lam gdab par bya'o// des smras pa/ yab ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa blang bar bgyi lags sam/ 'on te yongs su ma dag pa blangs par bgyi lags// mdun na 'dond kyi ye bos smras
81a3(mdo): bram ze'i khye'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can yongs su lend par byed cing / sems can bsam pa nyon mongs pa can lta ba
81a4(mdo): log par gyur pa dag 'dul ba yang yongs su lend par bye/ da pas/ khyod dag rang gis shes par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag
81a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsum pa
81a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skye dku lo brgyad khri thub pa na byang chub dam pa la reg par 'gyur ba de lta bur bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub 'tshal lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar gyi
81a7(mdo): sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung ba dang / skyo ba'i bsam pa can dang / 'khor ba la 'jigs pa dang / skyon tu lta ba de ltar gang tu bdag mngon par rdzogs par
81a8(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams kyang de lta bur gyur da cigi// de dag kyang bdag las rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur 'di bdag kyang seMs can nas la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos stor par gyur te/
81a9(mdo): btsum pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan/
81b1(mdo): tu gsol // de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsa lad pa/ bram ze 'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal du/
81b2(mdo): pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtogs ces bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing / skye dgu lo brgyad khri/
81b3(mdo): thub pam/ byang chub mngon par thob par 'gyurar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rim po che ba thegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'gyur ro// des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
81b4(mdo): 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu rab stan/ de'i slad du kun dga' ra ba 'di thams cad du mu ta ga dmar po'i cher dgra rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/
81b5(mdo): shing ljond pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i si// la snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur du cig/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag
81b6(mdo): gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe/ kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad du mu tig dmar po 'char dag kyang rab tu ba sa
81b7(mdo): shing ljond pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ mthu mchog mya zad shes
81b8(mdo): rab mdzod longs shig/ sems can snying ba che phan 'dod byams pa'i sems// khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa rdzogs 'gyur te// 'jig rten sems n+dan don mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur/
81b9(mdo): bram ze'i khye'u gnyis pa yang dag 'byung zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis ji lta ba de bzhin du gsoyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsa la pa// bram
82a1(mdo): ze'i khye'u khyod kyang bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing / skye dgu lo brgyad khris 'phel ba ma/ de bzhin
82a2(mdo): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mye tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbya ra te gsum pas kyang gsol pa/ lo nyes stong pa la skar ma'i dri zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
82a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstand to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma'i me tog dang / ri bo'i rgyal po dang / spyan bsdams pa dang / tshangs mchog dang /
82a4(mdo): 'dzam bu'i grib ma dang / gang ba dang / bla ma dang / rin ce na ri bo da/ dpa/ rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / sred myed kyi bu dang / gtsug tor dan dang / gser thub dang / thub dbang dang / ko'u di n+ya dang / seng ge'i
82a5(mdo): thal dang / ye shes rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas sgrogs dang / gzhan gyis myi thub pa dang / rgyas pa dang / rgyal ba dang / 5na bzhed dang / shes rab sdang dang / dbang chen dang / zhi ba dang /
82a6(mdo): shes rab 'byung gnas dang / dga' ba dang / n+ya gro d+ha rgyal po dang / gsor s+yan dang / phan bcas dang / gnyi dga' dang / rin ce na thug tor can dang / spyan bzangs dang / tshangs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / tshangs pa
82a7(mdo): khyu mchog dang / sma rab dang / chos kyi zla ba dang / don mthong dang / snyan pa dang / dga' can dang / grags mchog dang / gzugs bzung dang / dri zhim dang / grims yar dang / rab mchog spyan dang / rab
82a8(mdo): spong dang / don bcas brtul zhugs dang / thugs kyi re ba bzang dang / shes rab mchog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / s+yan mdzes dang / dag pa'i lha dang / zas gtsang dang / legs mthong dang / 'phags
82a9(mdo): khres rgyal mtshan dang / byig kyi bzang dang / sangs sbyangs dang / dpal 'byung dang // nga rgyal dpas dang / rdul bral dang / nor bu bzang dang / 'od gzer can dang / shag kya thub pa dang / dbyangs kyi dbang phyug/
82b1(mdo): dang / bder 'byung dang / thu bo dang / yang dag 'byung dang / mye tog dang / yang dag s+ye tog dang / kyi 'khrugs pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang dga' dbang phyug dang / klus byin dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang / grags pa'i
82b2(mdo): rgyal po dang / stag gi 'od gzer dang / spyod bcas dang / ye shes 'byung dang / spos kyi dbang phyug dang / sa la'i dbang po dang / sred myed kyi bu'i snying po dang / skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro//
82b3(mdo): zhes lung bstand to// rigs kyi bu de na mdun na 'dond kyi bu thams cad kyi tha chungs 'jigs dang gdung bral zhes bya bar gang yin pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di
82b4(mdo): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i khye 'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag thams cad bskaya pa ud pa la ya bdag rtog gi yar skye ba gnyis pa ya a sde sa lda / rjod pa'i bya lub mdonas
82b5(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstand pa/ lags pa na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang // bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
82b6(mdo): bar bgyi ste/ bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog pas par 'gyu ra ba na/ thams cad kyi tha mar byang chub mchog la rig par rgyu rad cig/ sangs rgyas bdun cu cha dgu po de dag gi sku tshe
82b7(mdo): tshad ji tsam pa bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur da cig/ de bdag gi 'dul ba ji snyed mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis chos stond par 'gyur
82b8(mdo): ba/ bdag gcig pu yang de snyed du gyur du cig// ji ltar de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed pa mchis par 'gyur ba// bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur
82b9(mdo): cig/ sangs rgyas bdun cu ya dgu po de dag 'byung ba'i bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog de la sems can gang dag gis kyi'i lus thob par gyu rang pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa 'as
83a1(mdo): par gyur pa na bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ theg pa gsum po dag gis nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
83a2(mdo): gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol// rigs kyi bu de
83a3(mdo): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos 'jigs dang gdung bral la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la snying rje zhing phan par byed pa zhugs pa ni
83a4(mdo): legs so legs so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa da'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas/ bskayang pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi
83a5(mdo): bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog de zad kar thams cad kyi tha mar khyod bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
83a6(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral yang dag 'phogs mngon par 'phags shes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// ji ltar sangs rgyas bdun cu cha dgu po
83a7(mdo): de dag gi tshe bskal pa byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod gcig pu'i yang bskul pa phyed du 'gyur te/ ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur
83a8(mdo): ro// des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re bA 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i srad du gang ga che bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas
83a9(mdo): phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du mye tog sngon po'o char gnid tu dri gda' ba dag 'bab par gyu rad cig/ sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyurd pa de dag thams cad
83b1(mdo): kyi khams rnams rab tu dang zhing myi mthun par ma mchis par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi nang rnams rab tu zhi bar gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'jigs dang rdul bral
83b2(mdo): bral kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du mye tog sngon po'i char dag kyang rab tu bab/ sems can
83b3(mdo): thams cad kyis kyang dri de tshor bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams kyang snyoms shing kyi mthun pa myed par gnas par gyurapa/ de na sems can thams cad la nad byed cing / gnod pa myed par
83b4(mdo): gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos pa ka' stsal pa/ snying rje brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs shig/ 'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing
83b5(mdo): nyon mongs g.yo bdud dam po gcod 'gyur te// dge ba/ dam pa shes rab mdzod du 'gyur// bam po / rigs kyi bu bram ze'i de'i slob ma bye ba
83b6(mdo): zag gsum kun dga'i ra ba'i sgo na 'dug pa de dag gis kyang sems can 'ongs pa rnams/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro bal bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug go/
83b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la smras pa/ kye bram ze'i khye'u dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
83b8(mdo): bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang longs shig// smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig// de na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa/ lam/
83b9(mdo): ji lta bu dang / tshogs jilta bu dang / pyod pa ji lta bu dang / rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang chub thob par gyur lags// mdun na 'dond kyis spras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi yan sdug
84a1(mdo): la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as myi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par bslu bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi zad pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi
84a2(mdo): zad pa dang / shes rab kyi tshogs myi zad pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i tshogs mya zad pa ste/ rigs kyi bu lam ni de lta bu yin no// bram ze'i khye'u de bzhin gshegs pas
84a3(mdo): kyang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba/ tshogs nyams su lonod par byed pa/ chos kyi sgo sbyin pa'i cho gas yongs su gtong bar byed pa de ni 'dul ba'i seMs/
84a4(mdo): can yongs su smyin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub se// mas dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smond lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub seMs
84a5(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi batshon 'grus kyi tshogs ni
84a6(mdo): dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi
84a7(mdo): tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs pa ni spobs pa thogs pa myed par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub
84a8(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa myed par
84a9(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni gnas kyi tshogs ni sems tsam las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom
84b1(mdo): dang thal bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni ni 'grus pa skyed pa'i sems su byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ma
84b2(mdo): 'dul ba la myi spro bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dgal la dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
84b3(mdo): btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni/ rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang
84b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzind par thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge
84b5(mdo): ba'i las byas pa chud myi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang// chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba bsgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub ses
84b6(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi chog sa ni blo'i bye brag byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
84b7(mdo): rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don kyi rnam pa rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i tshogs ni/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la/
84b8(mdo): so sor rtog par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub se
84b9(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni/ lus dang / sems yang ba nyid du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dbang po tshogs ni sdom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//
85a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni//
85a2(mdo): chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying por byed pa drug gi tshogs ni/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro// zhes
85a3(mdo): gsungs te/ bram ze'i khye'u tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su lond par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs mi longs
85a4(mdo): spyod chen po dang g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho' ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / thos pa ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang //
85a5(mdo): dad pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bsgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal// par byed par bstand to// mdun na 'dond kyis smras/ pa/ bram ze'i khye'u gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba
85a6(mdo): rnams ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze'i khye'u de yang ji skad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni dul ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par
85a7(mdo): bya'o// ni gnas kyi sems kyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o// rnyog pa myed pa'i sems kyis thos pa yang yongs su btsal bar bya'o// snying rje chen po'i sems kyis bsgoms pa bsgoms
85a8(mdo): par bya'o// chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang / ye shes dang thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ bram ze'i khyen
85a9(mdo): de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no// tshogs de lta bus byang chub 'thob par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i khye'u bsgom pa ni de lta bu yin/ dran pa ni de lta bu ya ni/ byang chub kyi lam gyi 'apyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyis/
85b1(mdo): bram ze'i khye'u byang chub du mdun pa bskyed cig/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam mi dag pa yin kyis bsam pa zag pa nas spo'ong lam thob shig dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye
85b2(mdo): bsam pa dag pas byang chub kyi lam ni ngang ba yin no// bram ze'i khye'u g.yo myed pas rnam par dag ste/ nyon mongs pa rab tu btsal bas/ byang chub kyi lam ni drang ba yin no// bram ze'i khye'u bla ma
85b3(mdo): myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang bde ba yin gyis/ smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa 'am/ yongs su ma dag
85b4(mdo): pa ji lta bu 'dod pa longs shig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze li khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te//
85b5(mdo): 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ sems can
85b6(mdo): 'dod chags chung ba rnams dang / zhe sdang chung pa rnams dang / gti mug chung ba rnams dang / sems 'khrungs pa ma mchis shing ma 'khrugs pa rnams dang / 'khon pa'i sems ma mchis
85b7(mdo): pa rnams dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems rnam par spangs pa rnams dang / log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / yang dag par lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang /
85b8(mdo): dge bar sems pa rnams dang / dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang / ngan song gsum gyi lam rnam par spang bar sems pa rnams dang / mtho' ris kyi lam gsum la bathon
85b9(mdo): par sems pa rnams dang / bsod nams kyi bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba'i ya ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang / theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems pa rnams kyi slad
86a1(mdo): du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyu ra cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kal/
86a2(mdo): te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ldan/ de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa lag pa gnyis su glang po che gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur da cig// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu
86a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus/ de'i lag pa gnyis su glang po che tso bo thal kar yan lag bdun shi nad tu gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ khyed cag cung zad tsam zhig thos
86a4(mdo): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yi steng gi nam mkha' la deng la/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char shind tu dri zhim pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sems can
86a5(mdo): thams cad sad par gyis shig/ de'i thigs pas so// mas can gang dag gsi lus la phog gam/ gang dag gi/ sa dri tshor bar gyur pa/ de dag gi sgrib pa lnga spangs par
86a6(mdo): gyurd cig// 'di lta ste 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa swa nges par gyurd cig// gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tsom gyi
86a7(mdo): sgrib pa spangs par gyurd cig/ tshig de skad smras ma thag tu glang po che de dag gi steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag
86a8(mdo): ba brkyang pa las bskums pa 'am/ bskums pa las brkyang pa de bzhin du/ de ltar mgyogs par dong nas glang po che the bo de dag gis ji skad smras pa'i bya ba dag byas nas/ phyir log ste de'i
86a9(mdo): mdun du 'khod do// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'i khyu mchog shi nad tu yid dga' bar gyur pa dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rini po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa// rigs
86b1(mdo): kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa sgra snang zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par
86b2(mdo): bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od gzer zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro//
86b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgos gtugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos
86b4(mdo): bka' stsalang ba// rgyal dang rnam bral sems can nas dang / longs// khyod kyis sems can bye ma lung bstan du/ byang chub phyir ni rab dag la sbyor zhing // rgyal mchog
86b5(mdo): sems can rnams kyi 'drend par 'gyur// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bram ze'i khye'u stong dang / bram ze'i khyen / ba phrag ku sum po gang dag gos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das
86b6(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smond lam btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstard te/ tha ma ni sangs rgyas ni rnam
86b7(mdo): bar gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob pa'i bar du gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u lung bstand pa de dag thams cad las gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong zhig yod pa'i
86b8(mdo): thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba/ khyab 'jug klung zhes bya ba des gso yod pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur
86b9(mdo): cig/ 'dod chags bdo ba dang / zhe sdang bde ba dang / gti mug bdo' ba'i sems can rnams lo chos stond par gyur cig/ bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa// kye mkhan
87a1(mdo): po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par bgyid lags// mdun na 'dond kyis smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang
87a2(mdo): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par byang chub 'thob par byed cing sems can skyabs myed pa rnams dang / dpung gnyen myed pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa dag gis
87a3(mdo): gces pa rnams dang / lta bas nyon mongs par gyurd pa rnams kyi don byed cing / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyurd pa dang / sems can rnams skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba
87a4(mdo): la rab tu bkod par byed cing / sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud pa'i ros tshim par byed do zhes grag ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam
87a5(mdo): 'debs par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po yin par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i ste// da pos bka' stsal pa/ khyab 'jug rlung khyod ni ma 'ongs
87a6(mdo): pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste da 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung ga byai ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ shar phyogs logs su
87a7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa de 'jig rten gi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa khyod der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung/
87a8(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyab 'jug rlung gi gsi gsol/
87a9(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta no// de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba des
87b1(mdo): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa gnyis bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u khyab 'jug rlung gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
87b2(mdo): zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' khyab 'jug rlung gi spyi bor zhabs gnyis bzhag ste// bka' stsal pa// snying rje'i bsam pa shes rab rnon po
87b3(mdo): longs// byang chub mchog phyir pyod pa spyod bgyis la// brtan pa nyon mongs 'ching ba dam chod cig/ khyed ni phan pas snying pa che sangs rgyas 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gyis bcom
87b4(mdo): ldan 'das de gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la bus mo g.yas pa 'i lhangs la btsugs te/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pad ga gis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses
87b5(mdo): bskyed par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can 'do/ da chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi sems cha mnyam pa rnams dang / dge ba dang myi dge ba'i bsam pa la myi gnas pa'i skye dgu
87b6(mdo): tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyurd cig/ de ba zhin gshegs pa rin pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/
87b7(mdo): bskalang pa grangs myed pa gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa gnyis pa la bab pa na// 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni myi mjed ces bya bar gyur te/ ci'i phyir de myi mjed ces
87b8(mdo): bya zhe na/ sems can de dag 'dod chags la myi mjed pa dang / de dag zhe sdang la myi mjed pa dang / gta mug la myi mjed pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams la myi mdzad pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gi khams
87b9(mdo): de na myi mjed ces bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der bskal pa chen po bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ci'i phyir bzang po zhes bya ba zhe na/ bskald pa chen po bzang po de la sems can 'dod
88a1(mdo): chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug ro rgod pa rnams kyi nang du/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa stong byung bar gyur pa'i phyir te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyang bskaskul
