88a2(mdo): pa chen po bzang po byung zhing skye dgu tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa ma/ thams cad kyi dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
88a3(mdo): gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing / theg pa gsum po dag gis chos stond par 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i chu bos 'das pa'i sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa
88a4(mdo): dag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'god par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma skyong gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i zhabs la yan
88a5(mdo): lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te/ phyogs gcig/ tu 'dug go// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u gnyis pa tum/ bu nu zhes bya ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i
88a6(mdo): spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten du skye dgu tshe lo sum khri thub pa na sangs rgyas su
88a7(mdo): 'byung bar gyurd cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal du pa// bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni bskald pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskald pa grangs myed pa
88a8(mdo): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing skye dgu che lo sum khri
88a9(mdo): thub pa ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// des bcom ldan 'das las lung stan
88b1(mdo): ba long nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mge bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ mye tog dag gis bcom ldan/
88b2(mdo): 'das kyi sku la 'thor zhing thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'bral pa legs bsgrags rab snyan gsungs pa po// ma 'khrugs ma 'dre/
88b3(mdo): ma brnyogs dri sa myi mnga' ba// khyad 'phags shinang tu bsdom pa thon blo rab blo gros ldan// drang srong dam pa khyod mdzes thub gtso khyu mchog lags// yon tan brgyas bltam yon tan mang po cha la pa
88b4(mdo): khyod// thub mchog bde ba mdzad pa mya'i dam pas btud// srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra'i sems can gzhan ma mchis// deng khyod sems can mang po byang chub lam lung bstanang //
88b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u kun kyis bsrungs zhes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che yi spyan sngar/ rin po/ che sna bdun gi khri'u bzhag ste/ rin thang 'bum gi bshams
88b6(mdo): pas bshams nas/ khri'u de la gser gyi lhung bzed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba dang / gser gyi ril pa bIng ga ra dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdong dag bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas
88b7(mdo): las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas/ des gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
88b8(mdo): 'das nas bskal da pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la tshe 'grib pa dang / rtsod pa nus kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang / sems can
88b9(mdo): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bdol zhing / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas kun nas bkris pa rnams dang sems can log par lta ba dang / myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang / kyi
89a1(mdo): dge ba'i cha ba'i sems kun nas langs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems yongs su nyams pa dang // yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems rnam par spangs pa dang / sogs pas 'tsho zhing phyi dge bar
89a2(mdo): sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub yongs su
89a3(mdo): mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos nub nas 'jig rten long bar gyur cing 'drend pa ma mchis la/ skye dgu tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
89a4(mdo): bar 'tshang rgya bar gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas de ba zhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bram ze kun gyis bsru ngas la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze legs so legs so//
89a5(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung zhi 8/ skye dgu tshe lo nya khri thub pa'i bar dang / 'jig rten long ba ra gyurd cing / 'dren pa myed pa'i nang du smon lam btab pa ni
89a6(mdo): rtogs pa che zhing ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mkhas mdzod snying rje rta nad ces bya bar gyurd cig/ mkhas mdzod snying rje rten khyod na mi 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grang
89a7(mdo): myed pa gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs myed pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung zhing / skye dgu tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na
89a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas mdzod snying rje rten gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
89a9(mdo): po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la me tog dang / mye tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / bye ma dag gis gtor nas
89b1(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod do// myi mchog pham pa mdzang pa dga' ba bgyid pa skyed pa po// zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes pa shinang tu snyanang pa'i gsung mnga' ba// gnas mkhye nga mkhas pa
89b2(mdo): phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu ra ba mchog ldan// ye shes bsam gtan rnam tha rad tha ra phyi nad bder gshegs khyod la 'dud// myod pa mang po pyad pa'i zhal ni rnam rgyas pa// khyod kyis byang chub sems
89b3(mdo): dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po// gzhal yas byang chub slad du lung yang bstand pa mdzad// myi mchog bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/
89b4(mdo): bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu dri ma myed ces bya ba la yang dag par bskul to// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'grong bya'i sa dri ma myed pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar
89b5(mdo): 'dug ste/ gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag/ kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po de la byang chub par 'tshal// mod kyi/ chod pa'i dus de ltar bu 'ba' ga gi myi 'tshal te/
89b6(mdo): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgu tshe lo khri thub pa na sems sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa'i bsams pa bas pa rnams
89b7(mdo): dang / ror bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ste nad par 'du shes pa la sems dpa' la zhugs pa rnams dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag don tu gyi gnyer ba
89b8(mdo): rnams dang / legs par spyod pa gsum dang bral ba rnams dang / nyes par pyod pa gsum po dag la batshon pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pas sems rnam par dkrugs pa rnams dang / theg/
89b9(mdo): pa gsum po dag dond tu kyi gnyer ba de'i dus su ni sus kyang byang chub kyi dpyod pa bsgrub par rngo myi thog lags// skye dgu tshe lo stong thub pa ma lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshal te/ sems can de dag kyang tshe lo
90a1(mdo): brgya pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mying yang ma mchis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// re shig stegs ma lnga dang ldan
90a2(mdo): ba'i 'jig rten tshe 'bring zhing lo brgya par gyur nas/ mtshon gyi bskal pa 'bar ma nye bar gnas par gyur ba/ de'i dus ma bdag lha rnams kyi nang nas babs shing sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa
90a3(mdo): gyurd cig/ myi dge ba spangs nas dge ba la sbyor bar gyur cig/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu 'god par gyur da cig/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs
90a4(mdo): pa dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyis yongs su sbyor bar gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la yang sbyorabar gyurd cig/ snyigs ma lnga yongs su spong bar gyur da cig
90a5(mdo): skye dgu' tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na bdag bla na myed pa yang // dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ par gyur da cig// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
90a6(mdo): dang / ma rig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna chung ba'i sems can rnams la chos stond cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan
90a7(mdo): 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yung bstan du shes lan
90a8(mdo): btsun ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag de ltar lung bstand pa thob pa na/ theg pa gang gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyi sa yang don tu myi gnyer la/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang
90a9(mdo): don tu myi gnyer lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal da pa/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub sems dpa' le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ se so
90b1(mdo): dngos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni yun ring por 'khor pa 'dod de/ lta ba'i g.yang sa dang / 'khor ba'i bcon rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /
90b2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur tu 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la la cho ga dman pa dang / grogs dman pa dang / yongs
90b3(mdo): su gtong ba dman pa dang / smon lam dman pa yin te/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dman pa yin zhe na/ 'di la la la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing tshul khrims
90b4(mdo): 'chal ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa de'i sems can rnams dang / lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang / thams cad yongs su mya gtong zhing / kun la yang yongs su
90b5(mdo): myi gtong la/ lha dang / myi'i dpal dang / bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa yongs su
90b6(mdo): myi lend cing / 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yang yongs su myi lond pa yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' le lo can ni yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar
90b7(mdo): sdug bsngal nyes su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur tu thob par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na myed pa yang dag/
90b8(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhig pa zhe na/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi pyod pa bsdams shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par
90b9(mdo): zhugs pa rnams dang / sman cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang / thams cad yongs su gtong zhing kun la yang yongs su gtong la/ sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su tha rad par bya ba'i
91a1(mdo): phyir snying rje'i sems bskyed cing sbyin par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam ni yongs su 'dzind par byed pa ste/ chos
91a2(mdo): bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar
91a3(mdo): stond par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon
91a4(mdo): bar shes pa rnams kyi rnam par phye ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhis ngoms myi myong bar gnas par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pas ngoms myi myong ba dang / chos nyan pas ngoms myi myong ba dang /
91a5(mdo): sgom pas ngoms myi myong ba dang sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i da/ ngos pos ngoms myi myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go// byang chubab sems dpa'as myi zad pa'i gter bzhi po 'di dag yongs su
91a6(mdo): rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems da pa'as dad pa myi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos bstand pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / sems can
91a7(mdo): dbul po yongs su bzung ba'i myi zad pa'i gter yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag go// bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na
91a8(mdo): sems can myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / srog myed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang / gang zag myed pa'i phyir shes rab yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grog
91a9(mdo): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur
91b1(mdo): tu bla myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / nam mkha'i 'khor lo yang bskor bar byed/ myi rtag pa'i 'khor lo dang / myi mnyam pa'i 'khor lo dang / brjod
91b2(mdo): du myed pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byind pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / bskor du myed pa'i 'khor lo yang bskor bar byed do// bgrod bya'i bu dri ma myed pa khyod ni
91b3(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ bskal pa bzang po la bab nas ring po ma lon zhing snyigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab na/ skye dgu
91b4(mdo): tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog das pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom
91b5(mdo): ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma myed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zha bas la yan lag lngas phyag byas ste// phyogs gcig tu
91b6(mdo): 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / mye tog phreng dang / phye ma dag gis mchod pa byed pa la ba'on zhing / tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mgon po khyod kyi 'phrul pa'i dbyes
91b7(mdo): che mdzod spu gangs mdog mdzes// khyod ni gser gyi ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra zhing yid du mchi// yon tan brgya lham bdag dus 'di gsungs 'gro na'ang bdag 'tshang rgya// thub pa khyu mchog 'jig
91b8(mdo): rten sgron khyod la ni su myi 'dud/ br-i ze mdun na 'dod rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ br-i ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong po zhes tsA bya nub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug nas/ ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser zub dang / 'od srung dang /
91b9(mdo): byams pa lung bstand pa de bzhin du bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa seng ge dang / mchog tu dka' ba dang / dku brgya dgu bcu cha dgu'i bar du thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di la
92a1(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na myed pa yang dag
92a2(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// de dag thams cad kyi nu bo tha chungs gang yin pa de la yang / mdun na 'don kyis 'di skad du kye ma bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang ring du brtag tu ci yod/
92a3(mdo): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed cig ces yang dag par bskul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang mngon par ko bar byas so// sems can gang dag rga dang nad dang 'chi 'pho'i 'jigs
92a4(mdo): pa sred pa'i klung du sdung ba dang / phung po rnams la zhe nad pa'i myi dag srid pa'i btson ra rab tu 'jigs par chud pa rnams phan tshun gsod par byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni
92a5(mdo): sdug bsngal rgya mtshor rab tu gnas/ gti mug gis ni lam/ hor long ba bzhin du myi chad 'khrul 'khor dag na 'khyam par gyur da// log par lta la gnas pas 'byung po thams cad
92a6(mdo): srid pa gsum na sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'bar/ srog chags thams cad 'gro ba lnga po dag na ji ltar 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du 'khor// 'gro ba lnga po dag na chos kyi myig nyams skyabs
92a7(mdo): myed sems can rnams ni dran kyis sa// yang dag shes rab kyis ni nem nur yid gnyis spongs pa byang chub don du 'dun pa bskyed// 'gro ba rnams kyi srid pa'i mya ngan song la sems can rnams
92a8(mdo): kyi gnyen du gyur par gyis// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching ba dgrol bar bya phyir byang chub don tu sems kyang gzhol gyis shig// gti muka bral ba chos myig rnam par nyams pa rnams la lam gyi
92a9(mdo): dam pa sbyin par gyis// 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra dag na 'bar ba rnams la chos kyi bcud kyis tshim gyis shig/ phan pa byed pa khyod ni myur du nye bar song la thub pa'i zhabs la gtug pa rgyas
92b1(mdo): re ba thams cad grub smon bkra shis ldan pa rab brtan 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// 'jig rten dag na sems can rnams kyi dbugs 'byind kyis la srid pa'i mtsho' las sems can thon// gya nom
92b2(mdo): tha rad pa'i lam yang dbang po stobs dang / byang chub yan lag sbyin byed 'gyur bar gyis// chos sprin chos kyi char pa rab tu pho ba ste sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar gyis// rigs kyi bu de nas bri/
92b3(mdo): ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang des kyang smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i dpal myi 'tshal la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang myi 'tshal te/ bla na myed pa
92b4(mdo): yi theg pa 'chal ba lags kyis/ kye mkhan po yud tsam zhig gzhes la bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa la gson cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho' rdul de nas phyir byung ste/
92b5(mdo): rang gi bsnyen bkur ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga po dag la bos te smras pa/ khye'u dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig// de dag gis kyang smras pa/ bdag
92b6(mdo): cag sa gang sangs rgyas las sotshogs pa dge' slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi ba chung zad kyang ma mchis pa lags na/ dge ba'i phrab bskrund pa bdag gis ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed par
92b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'dod kyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bsnyed bkur ba dang po lo zang spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog gi rgyan dag byin/ bsnyen bkur ba gnyis
92b8(mdo): pabazang la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rna cha byin/ bsnyen bkur ba gsum pa chung la sdod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'u byin/ bsnyen bkur ba bzhi pa shugs kyis spyod ces
92b9(mdo): bya ba de la di rin po mas bdun gyi khang 'byin/ bsnyed bkung ba lnga pa snying po spyod ces bya ba de la ni gser gyi rim pa spring gar gyi mi la snyam pa/ bram ze'i khye 'u dag khyed cag dengs dngom pa 'di ga sangs rgyas
93a1(mdo): las martogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig// de nas bsnyen bkur ba lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du/
93a2(mdo): dong ste/ de ltar bkur ba'i dngos po de dag sangs rgyas las gtogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag bskal pa bzang po de la/ bla
93a3(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol/ rigs kyi bu snga ma bzhin du sbyar da te/ de bzhi/
93a4(mdo): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze'i khye'u lo zang khyod kyi bskasad pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa brtan dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub tu lung bstand to// zang la spyod ni de
93a5(mdo): 'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bde dbang blo gros shes bya bar 'a gyur ro// chu la spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa don pa/ ces gsung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// shugs kyis spyod ni de'i
93a6(mdo): 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba dang bzhe bya bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u snying po ni de'i de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa sed ge bshes gnyen gtsug pud ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
93a7(mdo): to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag bskal pa bzang po bar lung bstan ma thag tu mdun na 'don gyis/ yang bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la smras pa/ stobs chen shugs 'chang sangs rgyas
93a8(mdo): gyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag longs shig// smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig// sems can thams cad kyang chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron tu gnyer cig/
93a9(mdo): batshon 'grus brtan pos rang gi byang chub kyi khyad pa yang khyod la/ yang dang yang du ring tu ma rtog shig ces lag nas bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u
93b1(mdo): stobs chen shugs 'chang de yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po de la thub pa nyi ma mang nyung ji snyed 'byung bar
93b2(mdo): 'gyur lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la bka' saHlad pa/ bram ze'i khye'u bskal pa bzang po de la ni thub pa nyi ma stong ma bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'us gsold pa
93b3(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bskal pa chen po bzang po de la rgyal ba nyi ma gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi tha mar bram ze'i khye'u gces lag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mad+mo
93b4(mdo): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs/ pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de sri dad du yun ring por bdag gis brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang
93b5(mdo): spyod pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / des pa dang / bsod nams dang / shes rab kyi tshogs sna tshogs
93b6(mdo): yang dag par bsdu zhing / byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bkyi'o// bskal pa bzang po pa de dag thams cad mar na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon par dang por bsod snyoms kyang
93b7(mdo): dbul bar bgyi'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi sku gtung dag la yang mchod par bgyi'o// de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par yang gyur da cig/ sems can tshul khrims dang /
93b8(mdo): bral ba rnams ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / 'jud cing rab tu 'god par gyur da cig/ sems can lta ba dang bral zhing nyam nga ba thob par gyur da pa rnams
93b9(mdo): ni yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzi nad tu 'jug pa dang / 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyurd cig/ de bzhin du bsam pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu 'god par gyur
94a1(mdo): cig/ de bzhin du mo ga dang bral ba rnams ni cho ga la rab tu 'god par gyu rad cig// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i pyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang nges par stond par gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas
94a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub nas ring po ma lon par bdag gis 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'byung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi
94a3(mdo): sgron ma 'bar bgyid par gyur da cig/ mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba dang / yang dag pA lta ba'i se bar la rab tu 'god par gyur da cig/ sems can rnam
94a4(mdo): myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / lam ngan pa dag nas bton zhing yang dag pa'i lam du 'god par gyurd cig/ nyes par skyo pa'i mun pa 'jig par bgyid par gyur da cig/ legs pa
94a5(mdo): spyod pa'i snang ba snond par gyur da cig/ 'jig rten na dus kyi snyigs ma dang / tshe dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyin/ sa ma'i bar dag 'jig par bgyid par gyur da cig/ mu ke
94a6(mdo): bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na bdag sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod par gyur da cig// shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug cing 'dzud
94a7(mdo): par gyurd cig/ bdag sems can rnams pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag la sbyor bar bgyid pa na thams cad du mu ge'i mun pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / g.yul shom pa dang / mkhon pa
94a8(mdo): cod pa dang / 'byed pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyurd cig/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud pa nyon mongs pa mye'i gdung ba dag zhi bar gyurd cig/ nad kyi bskasad pa bar ma'i dus kyi chen bdag kyi
94a9(mdo): sems can rnams snying por 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug yang dag rje 'dzind du 'jug par gyur cig/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing / rab tu 'god par gyurd cig/ sems can
94b1(mdo): rnams kyi nad kyi mun pa rnam par 'jig par bgyid par gyur da cig// sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i bar du gyur cig/ bskasad pa bzang po la sangs rgyas
94b2(mdo): kyi zhing myi mjed du de ltar sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thard par bgyid par gyur da cig// gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong ra bzhi 'byung ba dag yos
94b3(mdo): su mya ngan las 'das par gyurd nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad du nub par gyurd pa na/ de'i 'og tu gdod bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
94b4(mdo): gyurd cig/ bam po// / bskas pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong pa bzhi po dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam par/ bdag gis byang chub thob
94b5(mdo): pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du ring bar gyur da cig// de dag gi nya// na thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par bdag cig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge// 'dun yang de snyed du gyur da cig/ bskal pa bzang po de
94b6(mdo): lasangs rgyas stong cha bzhi po de dag gis sems can ji snyed ba tus bar gyurd pa'i sems can ji snyed cig bdag gis kyang 'dul bar gyur da cig/ sems cad gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/
94b7(mdo): de dag gi nyan thos kyi bslab pa la 'khruld par gyurd pa dang / lta ba'i g.yang sar ltung bar gyurd pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma gus pa'i sems dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems su gyur/
94b8(mdo): pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la 'khrul pa'i sems su gyurd pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sems dag dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang / mtshams myed pa bgyid par gyur da pa dag kyang
94b9(mdo): bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byind cing / myi 'jigs pa'i khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyurd cig/ ji srid du bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pI
95a1(mdo): chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po yang bas par ma myurd cig/ bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyurd pa na/ bskal pa bzang po yang bas par gyur da cig/
95a2(mdo): bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung kang dag lags pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu Na gnyis kyi sku legs par brgyand cing // mtshan re re yang dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus
95a3(mdo): legs par brgya nad pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur da te gnas par gyur da cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma
95a4(mdo): mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku re res/ kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang /
95a5(mdo): 'jud cing rab tu 'god par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / ngan bar gyi bskal pa zhig par ma gyu rad pa des/ de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas/ ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar
95a6(mdo): sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur// slad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur da pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
95a7(mdo): mchis shing / rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / gter dag kyang kun tu stond par gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang bral zhing nad kyis nyon sngos
95a8(mdo): par du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang tsan dan sa mchog pa dang / sbrul gyi snying po dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gi spos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par gyurd cig/ spos kyi char de dag kyang sems can
95a9(mdo): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nang nas dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par
95b1(mdo): 'gyuram zhing / mtho rasi swa gzhol bar yang kyu rad cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyurd cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas/
95b2(mdo): kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par gyur da cig// bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig/
95b3(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyi sman du yang myi 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
95b4(mdo): mu ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dgra bslus par gyur da cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na mye
95b5(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par yang // ma gyur da cig// bcom ldan 'das srog chags bye ba phrag mad / po gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
95b6(mdo): yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstand pa'i sems can dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gi thun/ sa dbyung bar bgyis par ma gyur da cig/ bdag byang chub kyi
95b7(mdo): slad du yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dge ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i chos bgyi ba'i sgra dag rna lam du grag par gyur da cig/ gal te bdag gi re
95b8(mdo): ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyi sman du yang myi 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag rtag tu mnar myed par gtogs par gyur da cig// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
95b9(mdo): rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod ni sems can rnams kyi smad du 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal
96a1(mdo): dag las yongs su tha dad par byed par 'gyur te// skyes bu ngas pa de'i phyir khyod sman kyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma myed pa zhes bya bar gyur da cig/ sman kyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma myed pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa
96a2(mdo): dus na bskal da pa grangs myed pa gang ka' klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs skyed pa gang gi klung bye ma snyed ka/ rmil bab pa na bskal da pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong rang bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par
96a3(mdo): sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag bzhin du bsod snyoms dbul bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud bzang po yongs su mya
96a4(mdo): ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa na/ 1bla na myed pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs
96a5(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong pa bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed du 'gyur
96a6(mdo): ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur la/ sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ji srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'i beskal da pa
96a7(mdo): zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par myi 'gyur la/ de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mos
96a8(mdo): pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nad rnams dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab tu zhi bA lngagyur da la/ sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris
96a9(mdo): la gzhol bar byed par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma myed pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su
96b1(mdo): rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgya nad pa'i phyag gis bdag gi kyi bo la byug par gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying /
96b2(mdo): pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma myed pa'i spyi bo la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgya nad pa'i phyag gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas/ de na bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu de nas bya
96b3(mdo): chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma myed pa sems dga' zhing mgu' la yid rangs shing rab tu dka' bar gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag
96b4(mdo): byas nas/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bram ze rgya mtsho rdul gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod kyis smon lam bzang po
96b5(mdo): btab ste/ de bya ning chad khyod kyis kho bo'o bsnyen bkur bya myi dgos pa ji ltar bde ba nyid du gyod cig// rigs kyi bu de nas/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i dus 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar thams
96b6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di na snang ba dag ltar/ bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum brag mang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug ko// sems
96b7(mdo): can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni smon lam rgya chen po dgu btab cing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang bsha stag yongs su blangs te/ khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
96b8(mdo): kis phod pa'i dus yongs su spangs pas// bdag gis ni thod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na/ sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer bar bya zhing / brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/ bdag
96b9(mdo): gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par gyurd pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang / lha dang / dri za dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig
97a1(mdo): rten 'di yang bdag la zhal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhis su ston par 'gyur/
97a2(mdo): pa dang / stand par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
97a3(mdo): kyang bdag gi seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par yang mdzad la// pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan
97a4(mdo): ni 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyurab dang / gang yang phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang rab sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i cho
97a5(mdo): pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du/ smon lam kyis byang chub yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nad dag gis
97a6(mdo): bdas par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang mdzad par 'gyur la/ se mas can rnams la yang stond par 'gyur ba dang / bdag yongs
97a7(mdo): su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dag rma
97a8(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing bstand pa dang / dbyangs kyang sgrogs par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
97a9(mdo): kyi mdun du bdag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgoms shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam thos nas/ mchog tu
97b1(mdo): ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de nas de dag kyang smon lam de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzi nad par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar da ltar bdag
97b2(mdo): gis yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / chu bo bzhis bdas par gyurd pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur/
97b3(mdo): zhing / theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par gyur da te/ de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu
97b4(mdo): mdun na 'dond kyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par bskye de nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar da te// de bzhin ga
97b5(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying po ka la ba der song ngo // yang de'i tshe na lha/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mar po dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil nA lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bsil
97b6(mdo): bkrol zhing mye tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig mthun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so// legs so// khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la/ smon lam rab mchog dag shod la zung shig dang
97b7(mdo): khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang thal mo sbyar da te/ mngon tu
97b8(mdo): phyogs nas tshig mthun par spras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa/ blo mchog mnga' ba/ smon lam brtan po thob shig dang bdag cag kyang
97b9(mdo): nyan par 'tshal lo// kang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdun na 'don gyis/ pus mo'i lhabs la btsugs pa dang / de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong
98a1(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams ci tsam pa de thams cad/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'akul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ sdig rab tu ldeg go// sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol ba
98a2(mdo): sgra 'khrol lo// ri dgas dang bya gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so// sho ljond pa dag las kyang me tog dag brul lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
98a3(mdo): kyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs pa gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzind du bcug pa gang yin
98a4(mdo): pa dang / byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu ma bcug pa gang dan pa de dag thams cad kyang pham pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i ste dmas dang / byed dang de la dang / rtog byed pa ma dang / byams pa'i sems dang /
98a5(mdo): ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur da to// sems can gang dag/ nam mkha' sa rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lam sgra 'jamazhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'khod nas
98a6(mdo): 'di ltar mchog tu dka' ba'i yid kyis mye tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / ras bcos bu dag gis mchod
98a7(mdo): pa'i las la bcon par gyurd to// de bzhin du 'og rkyen gyi gnas man chad kyi ske kang ji snyed pa rnams kyang bram ze'i smon lam mnyan pa'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/ nam mkha'i dkyis na la/
98a8(mdo): cing lha'i spos dang / ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur da to// bram zes kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs kyi bcad pa 'di dag kri
98a9(mdo): mngon par bstod do// bsam gtan dag gis rnam rol tshangs pa bzhin// gzugs kyis 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste/ rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing // rin cen mchog mnga' thub
98b1(mdo): pa tshong dpon bzhin// zhi ba spogs mdzad mil seng ge 'dra// myi 'gul brtan pa lhun po 'dra ba ste// rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa myi mngal zhing // yon tan skyon las bzhin mtshungs par spyod// hri/
98b2(mdo): ma thams cad ded la chu bzhin te// thub pa mye ltar nyon mongs nags rnams sreg/ rlung ltar gang la yang chags pa myi mnga' zhing // thub panya ltar yang dag nyid kyang stond// klu ltar thub pa chos kyi cher
98b3(mdo): 'bebs shing // char pa bzhin du 'gro mang ngoms par mdzad// pha rold mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra// me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong // tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i tshig gsung zhing /
98b4(mdo): 'gro ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin// sems ma nyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te// 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin da mdza' bshes 'dra// nga rgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin
98b5(mdo): te// thub pa mtshon bzhin sreg pa'i khri shing gcod// zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad ning // kru ltar thu/ ba pa'i myi shes tsa rnams sreg// thub pa zla ltar 'od ba sis
98b6(mdo): gtong mdzad cing // myi'i pad ma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin// 'bras bu mchog bzhin sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra// thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor// rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra/
98b7(mdo): ba ste// 'gro ba dag la sems snyoms hA shing bzhin// myi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cig// 'jig rten rjes su 'thun 'jug chu dang 'dra// thub pa mtshan mchog mnga' ba thugs
98b8(mdo): can// khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan// sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul// byang chub mchog rab tu ni bdag lung stond// drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab
98b9(mdo): mchog/ bdag ni 'gro ba nyon mongs 'thab phod tshe// sangs rgyas byang chub lung stond dogs chod la// sems can brgya dag zhi ba de'i lam du khod// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe/ mdun na 'don kyi/
99a1(mdo): tso ba bram ze rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de// de na 'dug pa de'i mod la lha dang / dri ba
99a2(mdo): dang / myi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin no// bdun na 'dond kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag
99a3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu saHlad te/ de dag gis kyang rang rang ki sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa
99a4(mdo): yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i cha ba bskrund pa dang / ka du ya sra ba dag yongs su bzung lags so// gang dag skar ma skyong las tshogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong pa zhi po 'di dag
99a5(mdo): ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstand te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid
99a6(mdo): lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang / cod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa
99a7(mdo): rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la sku rad pa 'debs pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / bar myi 'dzin pa rnams dang /
99a8(mdo): mar myi 'dzind pa rnams dang / dge sbyong du myi 'dzind pa rnams dang / bram zer myi 'dzind pa rnams dang / bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang / bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
99a9(mdo): 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par myi lta ba rnams dang / legs par spyod pa gsu po dang / don du myi gnyer ba rnams dang / de bzhin du lha dang myi rnams kyi dpal dang 'byor da pa dag la brtson pa rnams dang /
99b1(mdo): nye bar spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / dge ba bcu'i las ma dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams dang / mkhas pa thams cad kyis bor
99b2(mdo): rnams dang / srid pa'i btson rar chud pa rnams dang / rgyun phyogs su 'das pa rnams dang / 'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang / gti muka gi mun pa dang ma bral
99b3(mdo): ba rnams dang / myi dge ba'i dachos thams cad ma btang ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba rnams dang / lam
99b4(mdo): ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags ste/ de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed na/ myi tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba
99b5(mdo): thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa 'di dag gis spangs pa 'a// de dag gis spangs shing bor bas de'i tshe sred pa'i dpa' klong dang / 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa dang /
99b6(mdo): skyabs ma mchis pa dang / dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag spangs nas/ rang ra ngagi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung zhing shi nad tu
99b7(mdo): dul ba dang bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrund pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa'i dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma
99b8(mdo): lags sam// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' sarba lad pa/ bram ze de bzhin du sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam 'debs par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
99b9(mdo): pa yang yongs su bzung ba rnams ngas kyang de nyid du lung bstand to// bram zes gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dper bkye ne/ shing kang shu ka'i 'da' ma bzhin du snying 'dar zhing bdag
100a1(mdo): ki yid ni shi nad tu tshol// bdag gi lus thams cad ni sha thar bar gyurd cing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing phod pa/
100a2(mdo): chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phangs ste/ thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas su 'gyur ba la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa
100a3(mdo): grangs myed pa gang ka'i klung gcig ki bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu tshe lo stong thub pa na/ sdod cing bad
100a4(mdo): yun ring por de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor bas yo ngas su myi skyo bar gyurd cig/ bdag gis ting nge 'dzind kyi ste bas kyis yun ring pos sbyin par bgyi 'tshal ba'i 'dul ba rnams
100a5(mdo): yongs su 'dzind pa la spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug la spyod pa na/ 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dngos po'i mtshan ma yongs
100a6(mdo): su btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags so zhes zos pas/ bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyad par bgyi ste/ ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan dag na slongs mo pa'i sems can dpag tu
100a7(mdo): ma mchis par 'gyur ba na yang / de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yongs su gtang bar gyur da cig/ 'di lta ste/ zas dang / skom dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang
100a8(mdo): gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / me tog 'phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi sbyin pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / nor dang 'bru dang / klang
100a9(mdo): po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / gser dang / dngul dang / 'gron bu dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye ru s+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rdul can dang / sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thos
100b1(mdo): cad yang dang yang du yongs su gtong ba na/ bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu myi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la gsal nas/ sems can yongs su smyin par bgyi ba'i don dang
100b2(mdo): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du gtang ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur da cig/ gal te yang btang bar dga' ba slong ba'i seMs can dag mchis nas/ 'di lta ste/ bran dang /
100b3(mdo): bran mo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyas srid dang / mchis brang dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / lag pa yongs su gtang ba dang / rkang pa yongs su btang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / myig dang / lce dang / lus
100b4(mdo): dang / pags pa dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / sus dang / srog dang / mgo yongs su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dge slong bar bgyid na yang mchog tu dka' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis
100b5(mdo): 'bras bu myi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i rma/ da du sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par gyurd cig/ 2/ ngag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang spyad
100b6(mdo): papar bgyi ste// gang sngon chad nam yang sems can gang gis kyang de lta bu'i yongs su btang bar gyurd pa dang / slan chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du
100b7(mdo): spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtang yangs su gtong bar myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba/ bdag yongs su gtong bar gyur da cig// gang bdag tshe rabs gzhan na bskas
100b8(mdo): ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa de dang / de dag tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa la byang chub kyi slad du pyod pa na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par gyur da cig// bdag gis
100b9(mdo): slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyis yon tan la 'god par gyur da cig/ nyon mongs pa'i g.yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa
101a1(mdo): de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags te/ de ltar bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag par tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snga/
101a2(mdo): tshogs kyi dka' ba khyad pa spyod par gyurd cig/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul rnams la myi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang / bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de ni// bzod pa'i pha rol
101a3(mdo): tu phyind pa lags te/ bdag de lta bu'i bzod pa bsgom par gyurd cig/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa byid dang / 'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar bsgoms pa la brtson
101a4(mdo): zhing bla na myed pa'i spyod pa las slar myi ldog pa gang lags pade ni 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags so// 'du da thams cad la phyin ci log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la phyod
101a5(mdo): pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la// kas so// rang bzhin gyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang la// gas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa lags te// gang
101a6(mdo): dag bskald pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis smod pa la// ji ltar sngan chad byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs sI/
101a7(mdo): byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la ma pyad cing / slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzos
101a8(mdo): pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi zhugs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la pyod par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur da cig/ slad mi
101a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi yon tan la 'god par gyur da cig/ bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs
101b1(mdo): kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par gyur da cig/ bla na myed pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzind par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa/
101b2(mdo): gyod par gyurd cig/ tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / batshon 'grus la blang ba ma mchis pa dang / bsam gtan la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / the
101b3(mdo): rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can dag 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba
101b4(mdo): rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / sog par lta ba rnams dang / myi dge ba'i tsha ba dang 'grog shing nyid pa thob pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnaMs
101b5(mdo): kyi don tu bdag 'bras bu myi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan po'i stobs/ kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la spyod par gyur da cig/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don tu yang sems kyi rgyud la dge
101b6(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon gzhag pa'i slad du bskal pa chen po bcur ya pa sems can dmyal ba mnar myed pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la spro bar gyurd cig/ de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /
101b7(mdo): dgas rnams dang / gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang / myi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang spro bar gyur cig/ ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i phra ba'i sa bon 'jog pa sa
101b8(mdo): sems can thams cad la yang de bzhin du gyu rad cig/ chad pa stong pa lta bu dang / sems kyi rgyud cig pa'i 'dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su 'dzind par gyur da cig/ bdag gis srid pa tha ma pa byang
101b9(mdo): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ skye ba gcig gis thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs par bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du yang lha'i bde ba da
102a1(mdo): skye ba dag don tu myi gnyer bar/ bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi ring gi nus sted dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ bdag sangs rgyas
102a2(mdo): re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnam pa swa mok+Sha da/ bgyid par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur
102a3(mdo): cig/ sangs rgyas kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu gsol par gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / de bzhin du nyan
102a4(mdo): thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba de ba'i na du yang dag par 'dzind tu tshol bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na yang bdag gis drang srong gi brtul zhugs
102a5(mdo): kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ya sbyor bar gyurd kyis/ ting nge 'dzi nad rnams dang / mngon par shes pa/ dag la yang sbyor bar gyur da cig/ bdag gis sems can ste
102a6(mdo): ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams kyang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i rnams la sbyor bar gyur da cig// bdag gis sems can sred myed kyi bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang
102a7(mdo): tshangs pa'i bar dag pa dad pa rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor bar gyur da cig/ de bzhin du nam mkha' lding rnams la yang nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang / brgya byin gyi khar
102a8(mdo): la yang brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/ dge ba'i spyod pa la sbyor bar gyurd cig/ sems can ltogs pa rnams la yang rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur da cig/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnaMs
102a9(mdo): la yang rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyu rad cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing dge ba'i za ba yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don tu stobs la rje
102b1(mdo): zhugs kyi myang ba pyod pa ma/ bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad du/ gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / myi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi sdug sngal ga/ non par gyurd cig/ bskal pa grangs
102b2(mdo): ma mchis pa gang ka'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste/ bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/ gang
102b3(mdo): ga tshe bram ze'i khye'u skar ma stong bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag gi
102b4(mdo): 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi myig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dgi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed pa/ dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos
102b5(mdo): kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyu ra cig/ bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs
102b6(mdo): pa rnams dang / nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / lam ngan pa'i bar gyis
102b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyam nga ba thob pa gang dag dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu stsa lad cing / btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis
102b8(mdo): dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag 'dzind tu gsol pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzind tu gsol la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par gyur da cig
102b9(mdo): bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge ba'i cha ba lis bon de yang bla na myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing / ngan song rnams las yongs su tha rad par bgyid par gyu rad cig/ shes rab dang bsod
103a1(mdo): rnams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dbul bar yang gyur da cig/ de'i tshe thur byed pa ya
103a2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa yang thob par gyur da cig/ ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur da cig/ sa gnond par yang gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can
103a3(mdo): de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzind tu gsol cing / slob du gsol bar yang gyur cig/ de dag kyang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang
103a4(mdo): 'dzind par gyur cig/ gong gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la bab ste rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba'i tshe/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
103a5(mdo): snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang stond pa dag kyang ma/ thong bar gyur cig// de 'tsho bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
103a6(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lags pa'i drung du mchis par gyur cig/ mchis nas kyang mchod pa sna tshogs bgyid par
103a7(mdo): gyur da cig/ zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang gyurd cig/ rab tu 'byung bar yang gyurd cig/ tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyurd cig/ chos kyi mchog ston
103a8(mdo): par yang gyur da cig/ de'i tshe na sems can gang dag seMs kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / myi dge ba'i za ba dang 'grogs par gyur da pa rnams dang / lta ba'i lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis
103a9(mdo): pa bgyid pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam pa ba chen po thob par gyu rang ba'i sems can de dag la yang chos stonod par gyu rad cig/ bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin
103b1(mdo): par gyur cig// rgyal ba nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe ma bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / skye dgu rnams me lo brgya par gyur kyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos
103b2(mdo): po gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyu rang cig/ dus de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos stonod par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzind par gyurd cig/ sems cad rnams kyi
103b3(mdo): lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du 'gyur ba na bde ba dang / dbang phyug dang / rigs dang / gzugs kyi dregs pas myos shing ser sna can su gyur da te/ snyigs pa lnga'i bud par chud pa sems can 'dod chags bdo' ba/ zhe sdang
103b4(mdo): bdo' ba/ gti mug bdo' ba/ nga rgyal bdo' ba/ sdig pa dang / ga dog dang ser sna bdo ba/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ chos ma lags pa'i longs spyod tshol ba/ log
103b5(mdo): par lta ba/ phyi nad ci log tu mthong ba/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun/ dang bral ba par myi 'dzind pa/ mar myi 'dzind pa/ dge sbyong du/ myi 'dzind pa/ bram zer gyi 'dzind pa/ bgyi ba ma lags pa
103b6(mdo): bgyis/ bsod nams ma lags pa bgyis pa 'jig rten pha rol pa 'jigs par myi lta ba/ bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la myi brtson pa theg pa gsum po don tu myi gnyer ba legs
103b7(mdo): par pyod pa gsum po la myi brtson pa/ nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la myi brtson pa myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa/ phyi nad ci log bzhis nyams pa/ rgud pa bzhi
103b8(mdo): la gnas pa/ bdud bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa/ chu bo bzhis ded pa/ sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// dbang po drug ni dregs pas myos pa/ log pa brgyad la zhugs
103b9(mdo): pa/ 'dod pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa/ bag la nyal kun nas slong ba/ lha dang myi'i dpal dang / 'byor da pa don tu myi gnyer ba/ phyi nad ci log gi lta ba can/ lam ngan pas bcom pa/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa
104a1(mdo): dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dge ba'i za ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/ khwa ltar mu cor smra ba/ byas pa kyi bzo' bya/ dram pa nyams pa/ dge ba la spong pa/ shes rab
104a2(mdo): 'chald pa/ thos pa nyung ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul 'chos pa/ ser sna can/ phan tshun gyi snyan pa brjod pa/ gcig la gcig kyi gus pa/ le lo can/ dbang po ma tshang ba/ nyam chung ba/ gos ma mchis pa
104a3(mdo): gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zind pa/ bsam pa dang dran pa'i snying po snyoms pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa nyon mongs par gyur pa mdog ngan pa kyi sdug pa/ ngo che ma mchis pa/ khrel ma mchis pa/ gcig
104a4(mdo): gis gcig 'jigs pa/ gang dag snga dro gcig la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi kyi yung pas du pyod pa de dag la stonod cing / ther zug tus pa'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// phung po lnga
104a5(mdo): la mngon par zhend pa'i sems dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chu// mas pa'i sems dang / ldang ba'i sems dang gnod sems kyi sem/ sa dang / khon du 'dzind pa'i sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i seMs
104a6(mdo): dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang / khyab pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / ma dul ba'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems dang / rgod pa'i sems dang / chos ma lags pa la mngon par zhend pa'i
104a7(mdo): sems dang / khyad pa mal myi gnas pa'i sems dang / phan tshun nongs pa com pa'i sems dang / 'dzings pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang / chos yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /
104a8(mdo): gyi brjod pa'i sem sna dang / chos rnams la mongs par chob pa'i sems dang / myi dge ba 'i sems dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhib kyi tshol ba'i sems dang / spyir gnas ma lags pa'i sems pa
104a9(mdo): kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sems dang / nang dang sa pa dang 'chib la yid todang pa'i sems dang / sun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams
104b1(mdo): cad yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskyes par bgyi ba'i sems dang / lta ba'i rgyas mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i sems dang / phan tshun gyi snyan pa brjod pa'i sems dang / gcig
104b2(mdo): gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang / phan tshun 'tshe ba la dbang bgyid pa'i sems dang / zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzind pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / 'dod pa dag gi
104b3(mdo): ngoms kyi myong ba'i sems dang / thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing 'jungs pa'i sems dang / byas pa'i myi bzol ba'i sems dang / gzhan gyi chung ma brdab pa'i sems dang / gnod sems kyi 'che ba'i sems
104b4(mdo): dang / sponang lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang / ldan pa'i sem sa can dag kyang de'i tshen 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de/ sems na
104b5(mdo): dmyal ba'i sgra dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sgra dang / gshin te 'i 'jig rten gi sgra dang / nad kyi sgra dang / rga ba'i sgra dang / 'chi ba'i sgra dang / gsod pa'i sgra dang / myi khom pa'i sgra dang / rtag tu
104b6(mdo): dgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang / khu sgo dang / khong sgril dang / bcing ba dang / btson ra'i sgra dang / chad pa dang / gnod pa'i sgra dang / mya sbyind pa dang / gshe ba dang / myo ba'i sgra dang / khyim dbugs pa'i sgra dang / tshogs
104b7(mdo): 'byed pa'i sgra dang / chom rkun gyi sgra dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang / mu ge'i sgra dang / 'dod pa' la log par g.yem pa'i sgra dang / brdzun tu smra ba'i sgra dang / ltas ngan gyi sgra dang / pra ma'i sgra dang / tshig
104b8(mdo): chub mo'i sgra dang / tshig kyal ba'i sgra dang / phrag dog gi sgra dang / ser sA'i sgra dang / kun tu 'dzind pa dang / yongs su 'dzind pa'i sma dang / ngar 'dzind pa dang / bdag gir 'dzind pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang
104b9(mdo): myi sdug pa'i sgra dang / 'dod pa dang / myi 'dod pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang / nyo tshong gi sgra dang / gcig gis gcig 'khol zhing 'tshe ba'i sgra dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang / dring ba'i sgra dang /
105a1(mdo): ho/ blang ba'i sgra dang / ma ba'i sgra dang / bkres pa'i dang skom pa'i sgra dang / ngas pa dang chad pa tshor ba'i sgra dang / ling zas kyi sgra dang / bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / nang sna tshogs kyis
105a2(mdo): nyen pa'i sgra dag ste/ sems can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so// de'i che na 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ni sems can dge ba'i phra ba yongs su nyams pa dge ba'i bshes
105a3(mdo): gnyen yongs su nyams pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag gis bstam par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyend pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/ ji
105a4(mdo): ltar bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa dang bral zhing / myi dge ba dang 'grogs la/ mur khrod
105a5(mdo): nas muran khrod du mchis pa'i sems can de dag ni/ de'i tshe na las kyi rkyend rab tu dam pos/ bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so// sems can de dag
105a6(mdo): gi las kyi rkyend kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed kyang dge ba'i pa bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing mnaro par 'gyur te/ sa gzhi pa tsa can du 'gyur/ sa gzhi gor ma dang / gseg/
105a7(mdo): ma dang / rdul dang / ri rod can du 'gyur/ spang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sprul dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / bya gdug pa dag gis kun tu bltam par 'gyur/ dus ma lags par rdul gyis 'khrigs pa'i
105a8(mdo): ba ser ma ldang bar 'gyur/ dusnga ma lags par ro ma mchis pa dang / lan tsa dang 'dres pa dang / myi bsil ba'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur zhing / de skar sa la lo thog dang / sman dang / rtswa dang / shing ljond pa dang
105a9(mdo): so la dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs 'apyod dang / nye bar pyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang / rnyog pa car dang / rlung rung po nga
105b1(mdo): drug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang / sgra ma'i ba rgya cher thub pa dang / gdug pa dang / khro ba dang / gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / 'jungs pa dang / gshe ba dang / gcig
105b2(mdo): gcig kyi gus pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / shu 'tshal ba dang / khrag 'tshal ba dang / ri dgas kyi pags pa 'tshal ba
105b3(mdo): dang / mtshon cha thogs pa dang / srog chags 'gums pa la brtson pa dang / byad gzugs dang / rigs dang / rgyud dang dbang phyug dang / bstand chos dang yi ge dang / rta thal dang / mda' gzhu dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs
105b4(mdo): pa dang / 'khor dang / ser sna dang / dregs ngas par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten dka' thub dang brtul zhugs ngan pa can rnam pa sA tshodags la mngon bA gyon par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na/ bdag 'dul ba'i seM sa
105b5(mdo): can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyinang par bgyi ba'i sgra/ da du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba/ 'i rigs rgyung khyad par 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i rigs
105b6(mdo): su btsun mo 'idam pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzind bar gyu rad cig/ de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mya mjed sdang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyi bar 'gyur zhing /
105b7(mdo): steng du ni 'og myin gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang / 'og tu ni gser gi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par gyurd cig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi
105b8(mdo): mjed na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye garas dang / gagan de'i 'jig rten 'ang / lha dang kyi rnams su skyes par gyur pa'i ro dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba chen po de mtho sa
105b9(mdo): reg pa dang / kun du 'tshal bar gyur cig// 'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshal dang / sam nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i sems bskyed par yang gyur cig/
106a1(mdo): dang por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di yang skyed par gyur cig/ gang Ni bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad stond pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskasang pa'i phyi ma'i
106a2(mdo): mthar stond cing / sems mnyam par gzhag nas/ zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig/ bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas yongasu skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs
106a3(mdo): su thar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la sems mnyam par bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyu ra cig
106a4(mdo): zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis thams cad dang ldan ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed kyi sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g.yo
106a5(mdo): bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing / steng du ni 'og myir gi gnas kyi// mthar thug pa'i bar dang / 'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mtha/ ra thug pa'i bar dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyurd cig/
106a6(mdo): de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed du sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / myi rnams su skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur da cig/ bam po
106a7(mdo): bdag ma'i mchar khung g.yas pa nas mngon par 'byung ba'i tshe yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgya ni gyi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyurd cig/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams
106a8(mdo): cad kyi sems can rnams la yang dag par bskul bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrund pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon 'debs par gyur cig/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i
106a9(mdo): sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ni ting nge 'dzind kyi myu gu skyed par gyur cig/ gang gi'i tshe bdag gis rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
106b1(mdo): kyi ning gyi mjed kyis gzhi gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i b.radag nas pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / 'khrug par gyurd cig/ de'i chen bdag gis gang dag skye gnas pazhi ma gtogs
106b2(mdo): shing 'gro ba lnga la te nad pa'i sems can yul te nad pa rnams dang / sa la rtend pa rnams dang / nam mkha' la nye nad pa de dag thams cad rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gi rgyang
106b3(mdo): la ting nge 'dzind kyi myu gu ma skyes pa rnams kyang skyed par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzind kyi myu gu brtan par 'gyur ba rnams ni theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir gyi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/ bdag bcas pa
106b4(mdo): thag tu de'i mdo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed de'i tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / bdud rnams dang / brgya byi nang rnams dang / zla ba rnams dang / nyi ma rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nas
106b5(mdo): dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / rdzus te skye ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srim po dang / klu dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyang /
106b6(mdo): bdag la mchod pa bgyid pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar gyurd cig/ bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyurd cig// bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa'i ting nge
106b7(mdo): 'dzand kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gang lags pa de theg pa gsum po de dag gis rab tu dang ba thob par 'gyur pa de ltar chos stond par gyur da cig/ 'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can srang
106b8(mdo): pa tha ma par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bdag gis 'dul bar gyu rad cig/ de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis rnam par snang byed mye tog gi bzod pa thob par
106b9(mdo): gyurd cig// de nas gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag pa chen po par gyurd pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzind rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzind thob par gyur da cig/ ting nge 'dzi nad des sa
107a1(mdo): gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid par 'tshal ba naklu'i rgyal po chen po khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag la khrus bgyid
107a2(mdo): bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khru ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis theg pa gsum po gang dag ji skad sbas pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag mngon par rtogs par gyurd cig/ seMs
107a3(mdo): can gang dag gis bdag shing la 'tshal ba mthong bar gyurd pa dang / rgya cher bgyin sems can gang dag gis bdag gzho nu brtse ba dag dang / bzo'i' gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sta nang snga tshogs stond pa dag dang /
107a4(mdo): bslab du rung ba dang / bud myed rnams kyi gnas su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ched mos yid dbyung nas/ dgung phyed na mngon par byung ste/ rgyan dang lbab sbub spangs nas yang dang yang du gos dmar po dang / chos gos
107a5(mdo): ngur smyig yongs su tshol ba dang / byang chub kyi drung nye bar bgro/ dpa'i slad du mchi ba mthong bar gyur da pa'i sems can de dag la/ yang bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag pa stsogs pa'i
107a6(mdo): ting nge 'dzin kyis ji nas kyang theg pa gsum po dog gis sems can de dag 'dun pa drug cing brtsan par 'gyur cang ba thon par 'gyu ra ba de ltar chos stonod par gyurd cig/ den gang dag rang
107a7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyu rang pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rnam par snang byed kye tog gi ting nge 'dzinang thob par gyur cig/ gang dag gis theg pa chen po sa khor bta' par gyur pa de dag
107a8(mdo): kyis ri 'dzis rgya / khrugs rnye 'dzin ba par gyur / ti di des pa gsum po dag las yang dag yas ma// bdug
107a9(mdo): byang chub kyi shing drung ngu rdo rje'i bdan bshams pa la skye'i mo krung bcas nas/ lus drang por bzang ste mchis nas/ bdag dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa nye bar 'i ba des bu'i mkha' khyab kyi bas
107b1(mdo): rlom par gyur // bdag gdums pa su cig thams gtanams ldang bar gyur cig sungs dus kyang gsas nyis kyi 'bras bu byed cig 'ab / byeng du rmongs mo pa la gsol par gyur ba ca/
107b2(mdo): gang dag sangs rgyas kyi 'di phyi mjed du gtogs pa'i 'og phyir gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi sgra ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid pa'i srengs nye 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad kyang bdas pa//
107b3(mdo): bamyong pa'i dbang du 'gro ba sring du sun ring bong bdashu res bu'i dgas bsrung bgyid par gyur ci/ bcur pa bcom ldan 'das de na gang dag gis nyan thos kyimig par ma bor btab pa rengs gi rgyang la nyor yongs
107b4(mdo): pa zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngang sngar smos pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba'i srid pa tha ma par gyur cig/ de bzhin du klu dang
107b5(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'amaci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bus rnams dang / mngos par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong
107b6(mdo): rnams kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyurazhing de dag thams cad bdag dka' ba 'byod pa'i dbang du gyur cig/ gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar spos
107b7(mdo): pa bzhin du gyur cig/ gling bzhi pa de na gzhan mu stegs can brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub ngan pa'i dka' ba myad pa pyod pa gang lags pa de dag la yang myi ma lags pa dag gis khyed cag ni dka' ba byed
107b8(mdo): ma yin te/ ji ltar phyogs 'di na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dka' ba khyad pa pyod pa dang / snying la yid la byed pa 'dogs shing lus kyi 'du byed ni nang du sbyangs pa dang / ngag gis 'du byed shi nang du stsam/
107b9(mdo): pa dang / de 'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa dag rab tu zhi ba dang / nyin cig bzhim du la rang re bsam gtan las langs nas zas su tis gyi 'bras bu byed za zhing de ltar bsam gtan bsgom pa'i dka'
108a1(mdo): pa nyung de ma bu che ba yin/ deni 'bras bu che ba yin/ de ni rtsom pa yin te/ de ni ring po kyi sogs par tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bya bar 'gyur ro//
108a2(mdo): gal te yid myi ches na/ de la nyid kyis ltos shig ces bsgo bar gyur cig/ de dag gis kyang dka' ba pyod pa de btang ste/ bdag dka' ba pyod pa mthong nas gang dag gis sems kyi rgyud la nyan thos kyi theg
108a3(mdo): pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur da cig/ myi'i rgyal po rnams dang bkrabs pa rnams dang / grong myi rnams dang / ljongs kyi myi rnams dang / khyim na gan
108a4(mdo): pa rnam pa rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang / grong khyim dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang / bdag dka' ba pyod pa'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar
108a5(mdo): sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ bud myed gang bdag lta ba'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ba de yang de'i bu d+d+hekyi lus kyi tha ma thob par 'gyur zhing / gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar sngar
108a6(mdo): spros pa bzhin du gyu rad cig/ ri dgas dang / bya gang dag gi sa bdag dga' ba pyod cing / mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de dag gi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par
108a7(mdo): gyurd cig/ ri dgas dang bya dag gis nyan thos kyi theg par sa bon btab pa de dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur zhing / gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji
108a8(mdo): ltar sngar spros pa bzhin du gyurd cig/ tshul de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas mo dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du yi dgas rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o// ji srid du sems can bye ba khrag
108a9(mdo): khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bdag dka' ba 'gyod pa 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du 'dzind par gyur pa dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tha rad pa'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ba/
108b1(mdo): yun ring po de srid du bdag skyil mo krung gcig gis de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa pyod par gyurd cig/ ji ltar sngan chad sems can du bgrang ba gzhan mu stegs can dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
108b2(mdo): theg pa dang / bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen po pa sus kyang sngon de lta bu'i dka' ba ma gyad la slan chad kyang sems can du bgrang ba dang / gzhan mu stegs tsam su yang ji ltar bdag spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba 'phyang
108b3(mdo): pa khyod par ngo gyi thog pa de lta bu'i dka' ba khyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa de'i tshe/ skyes bu'i chal bgyid cing bdud dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa
108b4(mdo): par bgyid par gyu rad cig/ las kyi 'bras bu'i lpag ma dang baHsa pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal zhing bla na s+ye da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
108b5(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ ci nas kyang bdag sems can/ gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la yang dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par/ 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum
108b6(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa la yang chos stond par 'gyur zhing / sems kyi rgyud la yang dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par gyur pa cig/ sems can gcig gi don kyi slad du yang bdag cho 'phrul
108b7(mdo): 'bum phrag du ma stond par 'gyur zhing / de'i sems kyi rgyud la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'jog par gyurd cig/ chos kyi don dang tshig 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyi brjod par gyur da cig/ ji ltar rngo thog pa'i
108b8(mdo): 'bras bu la yang 'jog par gyurd cig/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri bo dag/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes 'joms par gyur cig/ theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pas chos ston
108b9(mdo): bar gyur cig/ sems can gcig gi don tu chos bstand cing myi 'jigs pa'i cha ba gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzind pa rnams kyis ni bos pa brjod pa dang / gcig la gcig sems kyi
109a1(mdo): mnyam pa rnams kyis ni/ 'od gzer thogs pa myed pa brjod pa dang / las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa
109a2(mdo): rnams kyis ni seng ge'i tog brjod pa dang / 'khar gyis 'jigs par gyurd pa rnams kyis na sang ga' rtag brjod pa dang / bdud bzhi zi lad kyis gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang /
109a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ri bo'i phung po brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas
109a4(mdo): zild kyis non pa rnams kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi che mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang / shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / gti mug gi mun par mchis pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma'i smon
