109a5(mdo): ma brjod pa dang / zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang / bdag la dbu' ba rdos pa lta bur mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni/ sred myed
109a6(mdo): kyi bu brjod pa dang / glo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis ni snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / kyi gtsug ltar gda' ba rnams kyis ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang / sngon gyi dam bcas
109a7(mdo): pa bor ba rnams kyis ni snying po can rjod pad mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ma do rje'i tshogs brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang / chos thams cad
109a8(mdo): la smon pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang / sems can gyi sems kyi pyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni pyod pa dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog sa lags pa 'tshal ba rnams kyis
109a9(mdo): nigs rab smon ma brjod pa dang / pham thun du cig 'arjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'dug pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni ngas pa'i chos kyi tshogs kyi bsgom brjod pa dang / de 'dzi
109b1(mdo): gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni myig myi 'dzums pa brjod pa dang / dmyigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon par brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bskor
109b2(mdo): bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma myed pa brjod pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rig pa la rtend pa'i rjes su mthun par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
109b3(mdo): zhing gcig pu ther zug tu lta ba rnams kyis ni legs par bgyis pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad kyi sa bon bskrund pa rnams kyis ni rgya nad dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / tshig dang sgra rab tu
109b4(mdo): 'byed par rngo myi thog pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnam sa kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug pa ma mchis pa brjod
109b5(mdo): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du 'jug/ pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyingasarab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang /
109b6(mdo): shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma ma chis pa brjod pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par
109b7(mdo): 'tshal ba rnams kyis mi ci yang ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni/ yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god par brjod pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ma rdzog
109b8(mdo): pa rnams kyis ni shi nang tu yang dag par bzung ba brjod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rin po che yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas
109b9(mdo): pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / shes pa ma bsgoms gang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i rnams ni rgyal mo'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang / kyi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems dpa' rnams kyis ni
110a1(mdo): sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni baspyad pa ma mchis pa 'arjod pa dang / ban tshur legs par sbas pa la myi dga' ba rnams kyis ni/
110a2(mdo): rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / dkor mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis ni bsod nams che ba brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo'i char rab tu 'bab pas chog sa 'tshal ba rnams kyis mi chos kyi sprin brjod pa
110a3(mdo): dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin cen bkod pa brjod pa dang / shes pa nyams la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni dpe' ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba can
110a4(mdo): thams cad kyis ni nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa dang / chos thams cad gzhan ma lags par sems pa rnams kyis ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su ma rdzogs
110a5(mdo): pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon gsum du bgyi ba dngos po brjod pa dang / sngon sangs rgyas la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni/ rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang
110a6(mdo): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig stond pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / mdo'i sde thams cad la nges pa rnams kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges
110a7(mdo): bar brjod pa dang / snying por 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa go 'phang la rab tu 'god pa'i slad du yang / bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar gyur da cig/ bdagan
110a8(mdo): bstand pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / nyam chung ba dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / sems rnam par 'khrul pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / kyi ngos can gyi sems dang / shes rab
110a9(mdo): 'chal ba'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa yang pos dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / bud byed kyang bdag gi bstand pa la rab tu 'byung ba yum sum tshogs par gyur da cig/ bdag sa
110b1(mdo): 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyem dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mchis par gyur cig/ skye bo mang po dag gis bdag gi bstan pa rgyas par gyu rad cig/ lha rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /
110b2(mdo): gnod sbyin rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams kyang 'phags pa'i gso'i spyod yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par gyod pa la gnas
110b3(mdo): par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis/ bdag la mtshon cha 'am zhugs sam/ mdur zung ngam/ lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs
110b4(mdo): ngag gis 'debs su mchi ba dang / tshig thub po dang / brlang ba dag/ gis gshe zhing skyo bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtsham sa dag tu yang myi snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / drug
110b5(mdo): dang 'dres pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dag bsod snyoms kaso// la par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu yongs su mkhas pa la/ gnas nas/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
110b6(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'cha rgya bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems cam gang dag sngon gyi mkhon gyi 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi stsor bas/ bdag la tshig rtsub po dang/
110b7(mdo): mtshon ma sna tshogs dang / cus dang 'dres pa'i bdung ba dag gsol bar 'gyur zhing / khrag kyang 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la bdag gis tshul khrims dang / zos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
110b8(mdo): snying rje chen po bsgoms pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rdza bsgrags pas/ de dag kyi sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa de ltar chos stonod par 'gyur zhing / dge ba la sbyor bar yang gyur cig/ de sar
110b9(mdo): sems can de dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa 'tshigs par 'gyur zhing / slan chad kyang sdom pa lend par gyur cig/ sems can de dag gi mtho'i ris dang / tha rang pa'i 'bras bu dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba
111a1(mdo): dang zag pa zad pa la sgrib pa'i chos su yang ma gyur cig/ der bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang yongs su byas pa dang / mthar thug pa dang byang bar gyur cis// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
111a2(mdo): bdag byang chub thob nas kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du bdag gi spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa/ de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cus legs
111a3(mdo): par brgya nad pa dag sprul zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu 'gyed par gyu rad cig/ stong pa ma lags pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
111a4(mdo): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku cig gis kyang gdugs gcig la yang sangs ngargyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa
111a5(mdo): bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 2pags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / dge ba da// nga 'grogs pa'i bar dag dang / de na sems gang dag nyan
111a6(mdo): thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag bslab pa dag la 'dren
111a7(mdo): mar bgyid pa rnams dang / zhig ral du pyod pa rnams dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba rnams dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / dge ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon
111a8(mdo): par zhugs pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas rnam par bcom zhing / nyes nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la chos stond par gyurd cig/ sems can
111a9(mdo): gapangs dbang thug chen po la rang pa'i sems cad de dag la yang dag par dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos stonod par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed du bdag gi bsngags pa yang rdzo
111b1(mdo): par gyur cig/ der sems can rnams smond lam 'debs pa la brtson par yang gyurd cig/ sems can de dag gis bdag bsngags pa thos pa bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal zhing / spo nang/
111b2(mdo): lam 'debs par gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag sems can de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe mdun du mchis sam/ chos ma bstand pa 'am/ sems rab tu dang bar ma bgyis na/ bdag/
111b3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
111b4(mdo): mya'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag gi chos thams cad nyam sa par gyurd cig/ bdag la slar yang snang bar ma gyur da cig bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mtha' dag bsgrub par yang rngo mya thog
111b5(mdo): par gyurd cig gal te sems can gang dag sred myed kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang/ sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gror lbu nga ba'i bar du gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
111b6(mdo): mtha' dag bsgrub par rngo myi thog par gyur da cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na sems can mtsha mas ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / lam ngan pas bcom zhing
111b7(mdo): nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'i sems can dag gum nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mtshan ma ni 'di lags te/ sems can de dag gi kha dog sa lta bur gyur pa dang /
111b8(mdo): ma'i mdong na ba dang / bskyung ngas pa dang / dri rtsi ga zhu ba dang / tshul khrim sa 'chal pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyer pa dang / sems can de dag gi yo byang rabs kyang sangs su nyams
111b9(mdo): 'gyur ba ste/ sems can de dag gi don du bdag de'i tshe 'jig rten gi khams kyi mjed kyi glang bzhi pa ji snyed mchis par gyur pa'i gling bzhi pa thams cad du yongasu dka' ldan gyi gnas nas/ 'bab cing ma'i
112a1(mdo): mngal du skye bar stond par gyurd cig/ rgya cher bgyin gzhon nu bye ba dang / bzo' dang las kyi gnas dang / dka' ba pyod pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
112a2(mdo): rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gling bzhi pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag nye bar stond par yang gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sku gdung 'god pa'i
112a3(mdo): par dag nye bar stond par yang gyur da cig// bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig brjod pas chos stond par 'gyur zhing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni//
112a4(mdo): nyan thos kyi gtam gyi sde snod kyi chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur da cig/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems cad gang lags pa de dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam
112a5(mdo): gyi chos stond par 'tshal bar gyur du cig/ bla na byed/ ba'i theg pa chen po'i sems can gang dag lags pa de dag/ gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gi chos stonang par 'tshal ba
112a6(mdo): rgyurd cig/ tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can ga lags pa de dag la ni sbyin pa'i gtam gi chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bsod nams dang bral zhing mthol ris/
112a7(mdo): kyi bde bar 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyurd cig/ gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang /
112a8(mdo): rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa 'chis bstund par 'tshal bar gyur cog/ srog gcod pa rnams kyis ni snying rje bstand par 'tshal bar gyur
112a9(mdo): cig/ zag dog dab ser sngal pa med kyis nodod pa rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa'i gtam gyi chos bstarang par 'tshal par gyur cig/ gzugs das/ gzugs ya mchis pa la dregs pas bya'o
112b1(mdo): pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ btang ba snyoms brjod pas gtam gi chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ 'dod pa' la 'dod chags kyi dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni
112b2(mdo): yang dag par ma lags pa brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyurd cig/ theg pa chen po pa'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs dbyung ba
112b3(mdo): dang rngub pa dran par brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur da cig// shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur da cig/ thos pa
112b4(mdo): nyung ba rnams kyis ni baspyad pa ma mchis gang zos pa 'dzin pachung kyi za bar brjod pas chos bstanang par 'tshal bar gyur pa cig/ lta ba ngan pas nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid
112b5(mdo): brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyu rang cig// rnam par rtog pa kum du pyad pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni mtshan ma ma mchis pas brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyur
112b6(mdo): cig/ smond pa ma mchis pa'i yongs su dag pa nyams pa rna mas kyis ni smond pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstand pa ra 'tshal bar gyur da cig/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rdzas
112b7(mdo): kyis mi/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa brjod pas chos bstanang par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'dren par pyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi mjed pa brjod pas chos bstanang par/
112b8(mdo): rnams par gyur cig/ bang pa'i sbyor ba'i drong nyams pa rnams kyis ni bcos pa la lags pa brjod pas chos bsta rang par 'tshal par gyur cig/ lhag pa'i bsam bzhinan du sbyangs pa nyams pa nas
112b9(mdo): kyis mi rte nad pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstand par 'tshal bar gyu rad cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang / dge
113a1(mdo): kye bskyang pa rnams kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang / bdud kyi las la bsngon pa rnams kyis mi stong pa nyid brjod pa dang / dod dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis mi mngon par
113a2(mdo): 'phags pa brjod pa dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems dpar gyurd pa rnams kyis ni bral ba brjod pa dang / lam myi mnyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par ldog pa brjod pa dang
113a3(mdo): theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtog pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang / 'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa dang / dge ba dang sa dang ye shes ma
113a4(mdo): rtogs pa rnams kyis ni mongs pa brjod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams
113a5(mdo): kyis ni mngon par shes pas/ rnam par brje ba brjod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rnamapar rtog pa nad kyis ni gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa brjod pa dang / byang
113a6(mdo): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par myi brtson pa rnams kyis na ye shes thob pa brjod pa dang / nye du la yang dag par stond pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba brjod pa dang / byang chub sems
113a7(mdo): dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang / bcas pa rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni myi choms pa brjod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma
113a8(mdo): thob pa rnams kyis ni myi zad pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni myi 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang / mnyan la dang blta ba la don ma mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang /
113a9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon gsum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyud 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho dri ma myed pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis
113b1(mdo): ni sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgos pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mtha' ma ma mchis pa dang thug pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstand pa 'tshal
113b2(mdo): bar gyu rad cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa/ sgyu ma mchis pa/ drang ba drang ba'i rang bzhin can/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa
113b3(mdo): de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyurd cig/
113b4(mdo): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po 'tshal bar gyurd cig/ smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis kyi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur da cig/
113b5(mdo): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / byang chub kyi/ yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyurd cig/ 'di lta ste lus mtshan dang dpel byad kyis brgya nang par gyurd cig/ ngag les/
113b6(mdo): par smras pas sems can rnams kyis bsam pa ji ltar ba ba zhan du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgya nad par gyurd cig/ ting nge 'dzind tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du thos pas brgya nad pa dang /
113b7(mdo): gzungs bskyud pa ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pas brgya nad pa dang / 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du/ yid kyis brgya nang cing mya ngan las 'das pas brgya nad pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i slad du
113b8(mdo): bsam pas brgyan pa dang / dam bcas nyams su lon pa'i slad du sbyor bas brgya nad pa dang / sa nas sar 'phar ba'i slad du lhag pa'i bsam pas brgya nad pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i
113b9(mdo): slang du sbyin pas brgya nad pa dang / legs par thos pa'i khong du chud pa dri ma ma mchis pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyis brgya nad pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis pa'i
114a1(mdo): ma sa/ bzod pas brgya nang pa dang / tshogs thams cad nye bar bsngags pa'i slad su bcon 'grus kyis brgyand pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams dang mngon par shes pas num par brtse ba'i
114a2(mdo): srang du/ bsam gtan gyis brgya na pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su 'chal ba'i slad du shes rab kyis brgya nad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par stob pa'i rjes su mchis te/
114a3(mdo): slad du byams pa brgya nad pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba la rnam pa'i slad du snying rjes brgya nad pa dang / chos thams cad la the tsom mchis par gyur pa'i slad du/ dga' bas brgya nad pa dang /
114a4(mdo): mthon dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgya nad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par the ba'i slang du/ mngon par shes pas brgya nad pa dang / longs khyod kyi
114a5(mdo): bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i srad cu bsod nas/ nyes kyis brgya nad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal pa'i srang du/ ye shes kyis brgya
114a6(mdo): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkha sa pa'i slad rtsa/ blos brgyan pa dang / shes rab kyi myig gi swA dab thob pa'i slad du sdang bas brgya rang par gyurd cig// don/
114a7(mdo): dang tsas dang nges pa'i tshig rapa ga yocos pa mo mo yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i slad cu/ sa mo yang dag par rig pas brgya dad par gyur cig/ bdud dngams kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nyis kyi
114a8(mdo): phyinan pa'i grangs kyi 'jigs pas brgyan pa das/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yod tas ngas su thob pa'i mdas/ stos tan kyis brgyadad pa dang / rtag tu rdzus kyi 'phang par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mangs
114a9(mdo): pas sems can rnams la chos da pa'i srang chug chos kyis brgya dang par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdang bar gyur pa'i slang du sdang bas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi
114b1(mdo): sa cad ldang bar gyu pa'i mang / 'od kyis brgyan pa dang / byang bal su dang pa nang na su mdu 'arjod pa'i tshe 'phrul kyis brgyand pa dang / yang dag par dzin pa pa dres/ rjes sunam
114b2(mdo): ba nos pa'i srang na rjes su stod pa'i ngo kru kyis brgyang pa dang / rdu 'grus kyi gang pa bzhini dus pa'i pha rob tu son pa'i sangs/ tu 'phrul ma mo 'phrus gyis brgyad pa dang / de ba'im gshegs pa'i gas
114b3(mdo): hA'i rjes su yu pa pa'i grong rje/ de ban gshegs pa sems cad sa tsu 'as kyi btsun pa dang / gnanas rlan sas pa ma seMgs makri ba'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyad pa dang /
114b4(mdo): ji skad smras pa de bzhin chu bgyid cing thams cad kyis kyi choms ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang ngaH
114b5(mdo): par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma// mchis pa dag la yang dag par bdag gis tshig gcig brjod / pas/ dge ba rnam par sbyor ba yang dag par bstsags pa chen po/
114b6(mdo): yang dag par tshim par gyurang cigade nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la / zhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyurd cig/
114b7(mdo): chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur da cig/ myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang gyur da cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
114b8(mdo): rten gi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ bla na byed pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i
114b9(mdo): bar gyi 'ongs pa dang bcas pa dang ga sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon las kyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ sems can gyi dge ba'i che ba dang
115a1(mdo): 'grogs pa dang / thub pa sdig pa 'tshal ba khwa khro dang dmu khyod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag pas bdag gis sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag stonang par gyu ra cig/
115a2(mdo): sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khra bzhi steng dag rgya cher stond par gyur da cig/ de na sems can gang dag bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur pa de dag la yang bdag gis pa
115a3(mdo): rol tu phyind pa drug gi chos rnams rgya chen por stond par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa rgya cher stond par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar du rgya cher stond par gyurd cig/ yang
115a4(mdo): de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sa ngas rgyas kyi theg pa par gyurd pa 'am/ dge ba'i tsha ba ma bskrun da kyang bstan chos la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de dag kyang /
115a5(mdo): bdag gis gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la bgod par 'gyur zhing // slad kyis pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag la yang sbyor bar bya/ radang cig/ rnam par 'tshe la dga' ba rnams ni srog gcod
115a6(mdo): ba spong ba la dgod par gyurd cig/ 'dod pa myi bzad pa sa zi lad kyis non pa rnams mis byi nad par les pa spong ba la 'ang ba gyu rad cig/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags pa rnams
115a7(mdo): mi 'dod chags la log par g.yes pa spong ba la dgod par gyurd cig/ phan tshun rdzum du smra ba rnams ni thun tu smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyu rad cig/ myos par 'gyur ba la mjan par dgal ba rnams ni chang dang /
115a8(mdo): bcos pa'i chang zlos par 'gyur ba bag byed pa spong ba la 'gyod par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'das par lnga po thams cad 'gyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni nongs pa lnga po spong ning dge bsnyen gyi sdom pas
115a9(mdo): 'god par gyur da cigasems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par myi dga' ba de dag mi bdag gis nyin cig tsam yang yan lag brkyang dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/

115b3(mdo): myod pa thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / kun datu 'dzind pa'i rgyud can gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don tu bdag gis don dang / tshig dang yi ge rnam pa snga

116a1(mdo): 'dzind kyi stobs kyis bdag gi tshe'i 'du byed ji tsam pa lnga cha 'dor bar gyur da cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe na/ rang gi sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam
116a2(mdo): chu gcor par 'brum napa/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ bdag ni slad kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur da cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong nu dam pa'i chos la
116a3(mdo): gnas par gyur cig/ yang lo lnga brgyar ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs bstan gnas par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams la ni rim po che rnams dang /
116a4(mdo): rol mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa bgyid par spro ba skyed par 'gyur pa dang / tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam dang / bskor ba gcig tsam dang / thal mo sbyor ba gcig

116a6(mdo): can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstand pa la tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzi nad par 'gyur ram ji skad bstand pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas so//

117a1(mdo): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / smond pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba'i sgra dang / nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po'i

117a3(mdo): su dran par 'gyur zhing / sems can chen po de dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smond pa ma mchis par gyur nas/ de dag de nas babs te 'jig rten gi khams kyi myi mjed kyi myi thams cad kyang dge ba'i bcu'i

117a9(mdo): su mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed thams cad na zab mo dang 'thab pa dang / thod pa dang 'gyed pa dang mu dge dang / nang dang pha rold kyi dpag tshogs dang / tshig rgyal
117b1(mdo): cing brlang ba dang / drug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang nad ma mchis pa dang / thab mo dang 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang 'ching ba

117b4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mchod kyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang de dag nor bu rim po che/ a la da snyil dag/ tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag/ steng du 'og myinagyi

118a1(mdo): 'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po ngag gis slar myi ldog pa la 'god par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi/
118a2(mdo): rdul snyed dag byung ga rib du yang / bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po ga gi'i phyir myi ldog pa la 'god par gyu rad cig/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'ang mya rad cig/
118a3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du pyang pa dpyod pa na gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu stsa lad cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang /
118a4(mdo): bdag gis pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin tu stsa lad cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
118a5(mdo): nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa ga/ zhan dang gzhan du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la stag tu gyur/ da te/ 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang
118a6(mdo): bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa tu stsal du cing / btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung /
118a7(mdo): gi rnam par 'phrul pas bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / srad kyis bskal da pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ka'i krung stong gi byas
118a8(mdo): snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
118a9(mdo): 'di skang sagang sung rim pam sa zhas pa babang pa'is bya ba zhes byung bar gyur // bzhasang pa chen po bathapa pa la bas pas/ rgyal ba nyis pa'i ba zhes bya ba de bzhidi gshegs pa sa na 'a
118b1(mdo): zhig byung bar gyur pa des bdag cag dang po bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa/ myi dge ba dang 'grogs
118b2(mdo): par gyurang pa/ mtshams myed pa byed pa/ log par lta ba'i bar du gyu rad pa yin na/ des bdag cag pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu dgod pas ma/ de'i phyi
118b3(mdo): bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyend par gyurd cig/ rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bzlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po nga//
118b4(mdo): mtho ris dang tha rad pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no// zhes bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing sgrogs pa la dad+ya ngas kyang brjod par gyurd cig/ gang dag byang chub don tu
118b5(mdo): gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de/ dag las bdag gis bsngags pa dang / grags pa dang // na pa thos par gyurang nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
118b6(mdo): la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don kyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na de ltar chod pa'i dus la bab cing snyig ma lnga 'byung bar gyurd pa na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
118b7(mdo): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mya rang ces yongs su zhugs par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
118b8(mdo): le bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gi tshul 'di yang stond par gyur cig/ byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i
118b9(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzind par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyurd cig/ de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyur/
119a1(mdo): zhing de ltar thod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma brlo' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i
119a2(mdo): 'dul ba bar tu 'dzind par gyur cig/ da lta bu'i sma na lam yang 'dabs par gyur da cag/ de de lta bu'i smond lam yang 'debs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang
119a3(mdo): chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bdol ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin du byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
119a4(mdo): kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de lta bu'i lung sbyorang par gyurd cig/ sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi
119a5(mdo): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad duyun ring po 'di srid cig na/ rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku
119a6(mdo): gdung rnams kyis de sbyar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can nasas kyi don du de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / sna tshogs ngag mdzad de/ de'i sku gdung gi rnam par
119a7(mdo): 'phrul pa dag gis nged cig dang po bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskus nas/ dedang cag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i cha ba dang / 'grogs pas
119a8(mdo): mams bskyed cing ba masasu byed pa 'di dag la 'a bathom par byas so// zhes 'dag su gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i smon kri nas dag gyu ra rlom pa'i bar sun myur mdang par gyur
119a9(mdo): cig/ der sa mdum na 'dod kyi pho po bram pa rgyas tsho'i rdul gyis de ba'i na gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i khyar sngar/ lha dang dri na dang / gyi dang bcas pa'i rtse dgu thams cad kyi don tu snying rjerjen tho
119b1(mdo): sdung ba'i smon pa lam lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i nus ma bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / 52/
119b2(mdo): mo dang / snyigs ma bdo'o zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa ma/ 'jig rten mdongs shing 'drend pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten mtshams
119b3(mdo): ma mchis par bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos pa lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
119b4(mdo): thams cad sgrub par rngo thog pa sta ma byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar myi bgyi zhing dge ba'i tsha ba yang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar myi bkyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag
119b5(mdo): gi nyes pa lags so// yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ sa rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg/ pa yang myi 'tshal/ s+thA dang myi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang kyi
119b6(mdo): 'tshal/ lha dang myi'i 'jig rten gi dbang phyug kyang myi 'tshal 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs 'khyod kyang myi 'tshal/ sbar skye pa pa yang myi 'tshal/ dri za dang lha ma yini dang / gnod sbyin dang /
119b7(mdo): srin po dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang yang skye ba myi 'tshal la dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs su bsngo ba yang myi bgyid de/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin pas ni longs khyod chen por
119b8(mdo): 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni mtho'o ris su skye ba zos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur sgom pas ni bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs la/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ sems can bso
119b9(mdo): rnams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i ma pa yongs su bsngos las mi re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs sa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis kyang sbyor pa las byung ba dang / tshus khros
120a1(mdo): las byung ba dang / thos pa las byung ba dang / sgoms pa las byung ba dang / bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/ gal te bdag gis spo nang las ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta
120a2(mdo): na/ de'i slad du bdag gis de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar myed pa rab tu chub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi slad du
120a3(mdo): yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir myi'i lus 'thob pa thob par yang gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
120a4(mdo): bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing / mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur da cig/ sems can de dag gi la das kyi 'bras bu mabs par gyur nas yang de'i slad du bdag dgu
120a5(mdo): nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing / bdag ga/ lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhang ga rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kya ting nga / 'jand kyis kyang mya tshal ba dag byung bar gyur da cag/ bdag
120a6(mdo): ki sus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzind kyis kyang myi tshol ba dag byung bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur/
120a7(mdo): cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur/
120a8(mdo): cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal pa'i sdug bsngal ba drag pa chub pa myi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig/ bltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig
120a9(mdo): rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mnar myed pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las yang dag par stsogs par 'gyur ba rnams dang / sas
120b1(mdo): tsam gang dag pa ga/ lang pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying po gzhan dag tu mtshams
120b2(mdo): ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba 'am/ kun nas spong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar myed par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing
120b3(mdo): bdag gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyurd cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las dgal
120b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa ra 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su tha rad par gyu rad cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
120b5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las ku na nas slong ba dang / 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur ba'i
120b6(mdo): nyes pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / du 'bod chen po dang / bsdus gzhom dang / thig nag dang / yang sos kyi bar dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos
120b7(mdo): pa bzhin brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yang 'arjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la yang brjod
120b8(mdo): par bgyi'o// de bzhin du grul bum dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab
120b9(mdo): kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyurd pa dang / de bzhin du sbya rad te/ gang dag myi rnaMs kyi nang du 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma
121a1(mdo): mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myi chang ba za bar 'gyur ba rnaMs la lnga de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin/
121a2(mdo): du yang bdag sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar gyur da cig/ gal te bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams
121a3(mdo): yun ring po ji srid du khams dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang /
121a4(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams kyi myi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyurd cig/ ci ste bdag gis sngar
121a5(mdo): spros pa'i bar gyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ sa/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dbang du gyurang
121a6(mdo): cig/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma ma chis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
121a7(mdo): kyang stonas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhem ye shes su 'byung bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji sar dam bcas pa de swA bu'i sangs
121a8(mdo): rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag bsgrub par rdzos ga ci/ bdag bsal pa bzang pa la skye lo sam nyi thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nas
121a9(mdo): su ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag tha ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba sta nang tu gsol// de nas de'i yod la de bzhin gshegs
121b1(mdo): pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin yan lag lngas
121b2(mdo): rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so legs
121b3(mdo): so// lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing / mtshan ma myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang / 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher
121b4(mdo): yongs su bzung ba yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des ngan sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyem cu
121b5(mdo): gyu ra bar shes so// sems can rnams sdug bsngal lasarab tu tha rad par bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyu rad cig/ bcom
121b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsta nad par yang gyurd cig/ rgyal po bcud mi dag pa nyid kyang ngu zhing / bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas
121b7(mdo): te smras pa// me ma'o mchog tu zab pa po// khyod ni bde la myi gnas te/ khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan// khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyan ras gzigs dbang
121b8(mdo): phyag la smras pa/ sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags// dbang po'i rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul// dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de gzugs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du/
121b9(mdo): 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis spras pa sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams// dag pa'i don tu kun nas 'dus pa dka/ mchog tu dga' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi/
122a1(mdo): khrod kyi snying rje la mi du bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ brtson 'grus ting 'dzinang brtan pa dang // mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchog/ 'phreng ba'i dri dang /
122a2(mdo): zug pa yis de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa// snying rje chen pos sems can la// de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin// khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang //
122a3(mdo): mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpal rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab spang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis
122a4(mdo): sems can 'jigs myed lam// byang chub 'byod pa dag kyang bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par// sems can la brtsem na myed
122a5(mdo): de/ gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog khyod mi/ yom tam kun dang ldan/ spos kyi seng ges smras pa/ khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na mi/ bzang la nyom mongs bdud kyi tshe
122a6(mdo): sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing / khyod kyis grags pa dang snyam pa thob// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa// skye ba'i dgon par ba thos gyurd cing / log smras/
122a7(mdo): shinang du nyam nga ba/ ga za ba' dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur da/ kyi 'khrugs pas smras pa// ma rig pa'i spong pa'i sbubs chung cing // nyon mongs 'das bu bying gyur nga la/
122a8(mdo): mtshams myed pa dag byed pa pa'o// sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur // spos kyi glang pos smras pa// khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba// ji ltar mye long dkyil 'khor bzhin// dam pa /
122a9(mdo): chos 'i spong byed pa/ sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur // rin po che'i tog gis sbas pa// ye shes tshul khrims ting nge 'dzind dang // snying rje rgyand kyis brgya da pa po// 'phags la skur pa 'deb
122b1(mdo): byed pa// sems rgyud cig rnams bzung bar gyur // 'jigs dpagadung bral gyis smras pa// khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam ru// sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba// chang pa stong 'dar gnas
122b2(mdo): gyurd pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur // lag na ud pa las smras pa// khyod ni snying rje ye shes dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom// skye dang 'chi bas gzar gyur da pa// sems
122b3(mdo): rgyud tshig rnams bzung bar gyur / ye shes grags pas smras pa// nad yang dag gis nyen pa dang // nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag/ ye shes chu yis gzhi byas te// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom
122b4(mdo): gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa ga ji ltar khyod mi nyi ma bzhis// nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste// nyon mongs zad cing rnam tha rang pa'i/ ba cor 'grus brtan pa re la byed// mung dbul zlabs kyang smras
122b5(mdo): pa/ ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas/ bathon 'grus bar+d+ha/ ma la yang dag mos// srid pa'i bcing bas rab bsdams pa/ khams gsum pa dag grol bar byed// dri myed dbang
122b6(mdo): pos spras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dri pyod yul gyi/ nga rje chen po dag bstan pa/ snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba po/ khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal so// stobs chen shugs 'chang
122b7(mdo): gis kyang spras pa/ nyon mongs ldan pa'i tshong dus sde/ byang chub gang dag khyod la rterang// khyod kyis nyon mongs ldad nas bcad/ smon lam btab pa 'grub par 'gyur// skaras skyong gis kyang
122b8(mdo): smras galegs mdzod dang mtshungs 'drab/ ni byed rlon lam btab pa yis// byang chub khyod kyi'i sems can gyi// kAnang dbyen du khyod 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshor
122b9(mdo): po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing / bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyarang nas spras pa/ kyel zhes sgron sems can rnams// nyon mongs nad nams rnam par bcom/
123a1(mdo): khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can/ sems can sdug bsngal sgrol par mdzad// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa 'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri za dang myi dang bcas pa dag gis bram ze'i rkang pa la yan
123a2(mdo): lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ don dang tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs
123a3(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod las cher g.yos par 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcu kun kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
123a4(mdo): steng dag gi sa yang g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ sdeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyu rang nas
123a5(mdo): yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sa sa kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag
123a6(mdo): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang stond pa dag tu yang sdang ba chen po 'byung bar gyurd cing / mye tog sA gas kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste mye tog mam
123a7(mdo): dAr ba dang / mam d+ha ra ba chen po dang / 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhig chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
123a8(mdo): 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis g.yos pa de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom
123a9(mdo): ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing bye tog cher por yang mngon par rab tu bab par gyu rad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen mi gang lags shes yongs su zhus so// yang de'i tshe na shar phyog sa logs su sangs/
123b1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bsags pa de ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
123b2(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdus kyis
123b3(mdo): bltas te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de
123b4(mdo): gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen zla ba ga la ba de log sa su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin ce na zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
123b5(mdo): 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po rab tu ba ba par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyend ni gang lags de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen zla bas bka' stsal pa
123b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gi khams yang dag rtog ces bya
123b7(mdo): ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems
123b8(mdo): dpa'i yul yang dag par stond pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na myed
123b9(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po
124a1(mdo): yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonang pa bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub
124a2(mdo): tu smonang las btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i bar gyi smonang lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas ma
124a3(mdo): gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil kyis mnand cing yod sbyi kyims rgyas kyi cad sa da dang nyon mjam pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams myed pa byed cing kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi
124a4(mdo): kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnams tham sa cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan
124a5(mdo): ba'i 'khor de dang lha dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas ma'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po/ de spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mdze
124a6(mdo): pa bye ba'i phyir bcon zhing / yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par bya'o// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
124a7(mdo): pa rim po che'i snying po'i spyan snga ma 'dug cing lung bstan panyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po ngos bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lga bas la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das
124a8(mdo): des 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog gi cher dag kyang mngon par rab tubs par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dul ba mdzad do// mangs
124a9(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstanang par bya
124b1(mdo): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ning / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshus phra rab kyi rdul snyeng dag gi phyogs ras bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
124b2(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa 'apyod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin cem zla ba ya/ byang chub sems//
124b3(mdo): dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa brdo' zhing cod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung
124b4(mdo): ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang myi dge ba'i rtsab 'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur da cing // sems kyi rgyud tshig pa 'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa
124b5(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po/ dang ldan pa'i des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi phyir myang ba
124b6(mdo): khyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin ce na zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni/ gdod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
124b7(mdo): dpobaskyed ngo // rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas
124b8(mdo): kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstan pa'i myod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyis rnam grangs de yang nyon cig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i
124b9(mdo): tshig gis dris pa la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen zla bas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di yang skur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/
125a1(mdo): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bsna kyang smras
125a2(mdo): bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i mying rab tu thob par yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
125a3(mdo): dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dag dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzums par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs/
125a4(mdo): myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul phra rab kyi rdul ste/ yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras
125a5(mdo): kun tu gang bar gyur to// gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs myed pa dag bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug
125a6(mdo): cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul pa rnams kyang / bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub las phyir myi ldog pa la bkod par 'gyur te/ de
125a7(mdo): la kha cig smon las kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tam bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzidad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni/ byis lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag khyod kyis byang /
125a8(mdo): chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams
125a9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul za rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par gyu rad te/ rgyu
125b1(mdo): gsum po des na skyes bu ngas pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smras zhing / yang de'i tshe sa byang chub sems dpa' dung gyur zag dgu dang bye ba zag gnyis kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
125b2(mdo): cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsu
125b3(mdo): sa legs so zhes bgyi ba spang zhing / mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di skur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
125b4(mdo): gshegs pa rin ce na zla ba des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa'i pyod pa
125b5(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rig/ sa kyi bu de nas rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyisade bzhin gshegs pa rim zla ba las/ mye tog zla ba mdog rjes/
125b6(mdo): dri ma myed pa blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi kham sa rin cher bstsags pa na 'phags pa nas/ 'di lta ste dpe
125b7(mdo): ma/ glog bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin cen bstsags pa de nas myi snang bar gyur da te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal 'dir
125b8(mdo): lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po'i che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo' bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul
125b9(mdo): ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i dpyan snga na bram ze la/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i/ 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing
126a1(mdo): bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ na pa din sa gang la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur ba'i ting rje chen po 'an sa
126a2(mdo): de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs/
126a3(mdo): pa rin cen zla bas khyod lnga mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur te skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar spros pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar teg phyogs kyisas
126a4(mdo): kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang /
126a5(mdo): ze la mye tog bskur ba dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs so// zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de ba/ zhin du lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
126a6(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'dasapa de na 'jig rten gi khams pa gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya bzhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis sgyings pa de
126a7(mdo): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar sgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
126a8(mdo): po 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond to// 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i rtog ces bya/ gcig shos ni seng ge rdo
126a9(mdo): rje'i tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
126b1(mdo): rkyen sus che ga sos shing kye tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkye rang ni ga sanas/ shes bya'i bar bu'i ltar sngar khros pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu
126b2(mdo): byed grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu myed grangs byed pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lpags pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos
126b3(mdo): pa bzhin no// sang de'i na du phyog sogasu mas rgyad kyi ning 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de
126b4(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dpal bo thul ba yangs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum kyis chos ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par sngang
126b5(mdo): byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar 'byings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul
126b6(mdo): ba yangs pa'i spyan la/ sa cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char na po bab pa ci las gyur mes don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na byang
126b7(mdo): phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten ga khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dpa
126b8(mdo): phyag rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond to//
126b9(mdo): de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni myi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni shes rab 'dzind ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
127a1(mdo): rgyal po la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pus cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkye nad ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar
127a2(mdo): sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe ma 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten gi khams gti mug yun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de mde bzhin
127a3(mdo): gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyi
127a4(mdo): sa gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ gcig gos ni maHbar snang byed nyim zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar spros pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe ma steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
127a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa mye tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas// kyi zhing mye tog kun tu rgyas pa de na re bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
127a6(mdo): snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas shes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor zhi po dag la theg pa gsum kyis chos ston ngo to// sangs rgyas
127a7(mdo): kyi zhing de sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la/ gcig ni rang gas rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba/ gcig shos ni byang chub sems dpa'
127a8(mdo): gzungs kyis yang dgu par rab tu dka' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes su dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nam mdzad kye tog rab rgyas la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig nyen du
127a9(mdo): sa cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po bas par gyur pa'i skye ni gang lags/ rkye nad ni gang lags shes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mdzad mye tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs/
127b1(mdo): kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa den 'jig rten gigyi khams yang dag par rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de ma de bzhin gshegs pa rim po che'i/
127b2(mdo): snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi yul
127b3(mdo): dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi nam mangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag yang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstanang to// deran byang chub sems dpa' sems da
127b4(mdo): chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par
127b5(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa bshad pa dang / ci nas/ kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
127b6(mdo): tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasasu bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/ de zild kyis mnan cing chod
127b7(mdo): pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams myed pa byed cing myi dge ba'i tsha ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i
127b8(mdo): 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ya ni te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lA dang / kyi dang /
127b9(mdo): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kyi sa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson ning / yan lag
128a1(mdo): phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas/ de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can da chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug
128a2(mdo): cing b.lung bstand pa nya nad to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste phyogs
128a3(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tugayos shing / 'gul ba dang / mye tog gi char gyi bar dag kyang mngon
128a4(mdo): bar rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje
128a5(mdo): chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smond lam kyi 'apyod// pa nges par bstand par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi
128a6(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi tshul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tingange 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa'i myod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos
128a7(mdo): kyi nas grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de spyi bu'itsho 'phrul dag bstan to// bam / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam ma snga
128a8(mdo): mdzas kyi tog ras rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam bcu 'khrug
128a9(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tu nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bdo ning
128b1(mdo): pa'i rus la zab pa'i chus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i za ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang
128b2(mdo): yongs su bzung bar gyur pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ci srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi
128b3(mdo): spyad pa byod lags// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spang mdzad na rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni nga gdong bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
128b4(mdo): chub tu ses bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de lta ba dang phyag bya ba dang snyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
128b5(mdo): kyi sgo bstan pa'i pyod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam// grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gi khams yang dag/ rtog der deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
128b6(mdo): po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la/ nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ mye
128b7(mdo): tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
128b8(mdo): rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur da cig/ snying rje chen po li sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang
128b9(mdo): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs
129a1(mdo): par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed ma phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
129a2(mdo): gi rdul phra ra kyi rdul snyed dag du yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras kund tu gar bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs myed pa
129a3(mdo): ngag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'dasA la phul ba rnams kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
129a4(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa la bkod par gyu rang te/ de la kha cig gis ba com ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su bzung ba ngag dang / 'dul ba'i
129a5(mdo): sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od gzer dag gis kun tu be/ kab par gyu rang to// gang dag khyod kyis bla na byed pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug ma
129a6(mdo): lung bstand pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstand pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs myed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
129a7(mdo): ngag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag du sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ khyod nyid las brtsams shing
129a8(mdo): bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na/ skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang spros shig/ yang de'i chen byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//
129a9(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin
129b1(mdo): gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring zhing / mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog
129b2(mdo): der mchis lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad myed rab rgyas des bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa
129b3(mdo): rin po che'i snying po las/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa'i dpyod pa 'jigs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang
129b4(mdo): dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dag 'ab rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshe gas pa rnam par snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas de la mye tog zla ba mdog
129b5(mdo): mdzes dri ma myed pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang / lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mye tog/ kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs
129b6(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i 'tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyi nad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo // yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs
129b7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang / lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag
129b8(mdo): 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshul lam/ til kyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe ma
129b9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
130a1(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa rim po//
130a2(mdo): che'i spyan snga na bram ze'i la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te/ bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
130a3(mdo): bar snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas kyis gang la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang
130a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyog/ sa te/ bram ze de la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
130a5(mdo): par snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas kyis/ khyod la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur zhing / skyes bu dam/ pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ yan lag gsum
130a6(mdo): gyis legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar ste/ sa pa bzhin no// mye tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin rab tu bab pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
130a7(mdo): dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnams sna tshogs dag gis kun tu gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgra dang / stobs
130a8(mdo): gi sgra dang / myi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du byed myed pa'i sgra dang / skye ba myed pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po
130a9(mdo): li sma dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / myi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi sgra ste/ mye tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i
130b1(mdo): sgra de lta bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa gang dag 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su
130b2(mdo): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gi dbang gas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam gi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzi nad kyi stobs kyis de dag de
130b3(mdo): nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs//
130b4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la
130b5(mdo): mchod pa byas shing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang mchod pa byas nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob/ par 'khod do// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'dond kyi gtso ba bram ze
130b6(mdo): rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snyi pa po de la phye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa de dag gis ma chod pa byas te/ gsol dang sra sa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na
130b7(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand du gso yod// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzinang klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/
130b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzind des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna mdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyu rang nas/ ri dpa shing ljond pa rnams dang / khA dang / shing dang / sa gzhi thams cad
130b9(mdo): kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu sdang ngo // sems can gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su/ kha cig ni ser po
131a1(mdo): kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig ni btsod kha/ kha cig mings ma tho/ kha cig ni nag po// kha cig mi chu bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni nung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni kye lta bur/ kha cig ni nas
131a2(mdo): ka lta bum/ kha cig ni spyig rgya lta bur/ kha cika ni chu lta bur/ kha cig ni mi lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bum/ kha cig mi kye tog lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lding lta bur
131a3(mdo): kha cig ni seng gre lta bur/ kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/ kha cig ni skar ma lta bur/ kha cig ni bya rgod lta bur dang / lba lta bu dag tu kun tu snang ste/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i phyir/
131a4(mdo): dam 'khad pa 'a sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lusu kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de na sem sa can dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bu mthong ba de lta bur
131a5(mdo): sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying / po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi me'o bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang / mdun na de bzhin gshegs
131a6(mdo): pa rin po che'i snying po/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma mang ba mra skyong dang ldan pa'i ze ba lnga bzhugs par mthong ngo // riH/ sa kyi bu de na sems can gang dag sa dang ram mkha' la 'dun
131a7(mdo): pA 'am/ 'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong ste// bdag yi bzhin gra shegs pa rin po che'i snyi'i po'i spyan sngan 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad
131a8(mdo): kyis dgongs te/ bdag gcig sums brtsams te mam pa ston to snyam so// rigs kyi bu de ba na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chen po 'i'i snying zas bram ze
131a9(mdo): rgyal mo'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bram ze chem po snyi po chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang / 'jig nyem sa pa
131b1(mdo): khor byed par gyu ra pa mi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so legs so bram ze 'di lta ste dper ma/ kye tog gi ni phun sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog lnga tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa
131b2(mdo): tshogs dang / mdab sa sna tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / rtsa ba sna tshogs dang / sman ga yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod de/ de la mye tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/ kha cig gi
131b3(mdo): mi dpag tshad gnyis brgyar/ kha cig gis ni dpag tshad sum brgyar/ sbrang de lhan ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na mye tog kha cig gi kha tog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du lgang
131b4(mdo): de ldan ner byed la/ de ni sems can gang dag myig myed pa de dag gis mye tog de'i dri bsdams na ni myig dag thob par 'gyur/ 'or ba rnams ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur// yam lag thams
131b5(mdo): cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi pa/ rgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis gces par gyur pa de dag gis dri de
131b6(mdo): bsnams na ni nad thams cad pas yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ ba dang // de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / sems rmugs pa dang / sems rnam
131b7(mdo): par g.yengs pa dang dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis mye tog de dag gi dri bsdams na nI dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ bye tog gi kwi pa de'i nang nas pad ma dkar po mkhrang ba/ sra ba
131b8(mdo): rdo rje lus grub pa/ 'jam pa/ sdong bu ni byai tsum+b+ha/ mang po ma ni gser/ ze 'bru ni rdo rje'i snying po// ze ba ni mu tig dmar po/ 'phang du ming bag mang brgyad khri ba ni stong / rgyar ni dpag chang 'bum yod pa gcig
131b9(mdo): cig skyes par gyur la/ pad ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang / dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul steng dag tu khyab cing lgang nge lham ner 'gyur la/ bram ze phyog/
132a1(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag na/ sems can gyi khres gang dag lus kyi mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyend pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / myos
132a2(mdo): pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu
132a3(mdo): zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi rol pad ma dkar po de'i 'od gzer dag gis phog/
