132a4(mdo): gam/ dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / yang phyis langs ste/ mdza' bshes dang / snag gi ga nyen mtshams ngag mthong nas/ de dag thams cad skyed mos 'tshal
132a5(mdo): tu zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan / bar 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang de nas/ shi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de dag tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu skye bar
132a6(mdo): 'gyur la/ de dag der tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur zhing / yun ring por gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mya 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze mye tog gi
132a7(mdo): zhing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na mye tog de dag kha phye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas lgang nge ldan nor zhing kha
132a8(mdo): cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/ kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur na sems can mang po dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar mi 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma re bzhin gan
132a9(mdo): ba skyes bungs pa 'byung ba yin no// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od gzer dag gis kye tog de dag kha bye zhing lam rtse skang de ldan ner gyur pa ras/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang
132b1(mdo): bar lci bar gyur pa de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa pa 'jig rten du byung ba ste/ thugs rje'i 'od gzer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing / kha bye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams bsod nas
132b2(mdo): bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par spyong bar mdzad pa dang / khyed kyis kyang sems can chad byed grangs myed pa dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug ci
132b3(mdo): btsud de rab tu bkod nas pa la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung
132b4(mdo): kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing rang rang gi smond lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thar nas sdus
132b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis// ni 'dul ba'i sems can pasam pa dag pa/ gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i phra ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na/ de'i
132b6(mdo): phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes myi bya ste/ de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no// de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag
132b7(mdo): la 'jug pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas
132b8(mdo): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa ma yin no// gang dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag gis yongs su spangs
132b9(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa yin no// gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i
133a1(mdo): pa dang 'grogs par gyur ran/ bud byed pa rnam par sangs su/ sems can dbyas pa dang / cung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gag de'i 'jig cem ma pa
133a2(mdo): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spangs pa/ theg pa chen po'i
133a3(mdo): gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond par gyur da cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur da te/ yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
133a4(mdo): 'grogs pa rnams la chos stond par gyurd cig ces/ smon/ lam de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ des na ye shes dang bsam pa la mkhas par gyurd pa yang ma yin la/
133a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga las 'od gzer kha dog sna
133a6(mdo): tshogs/ kha dog du ma/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dag dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o// 'od gzer de dag tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i phyogs su dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
133a7(mdo): zhing rnams snang bar byas nas de na 'jig rten gyi khams mthe' bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gi khams mthe bong can de na/ myi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa/ mdog ngan pa/ mya sdug pa/ myi dge ba'i
133a8(mdo): za ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun ni mthel po'i tshad tsam mo// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
133a9(mdo): pa'i sku'i khrun yang chod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi phyi rnams kyi khru gang dang thams cad kyi kyang yon gyi d+ham ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum pongs
133b1(mdo): gi chos stonang to// rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / myi de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
133b2(mdo): sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni skald pa dpag tu myed grangs myed pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par
133b3(mdo): snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu
133b4(mdo): bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa ra snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab
133b5(mdo): ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni// yongs su ma dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su
133b6(mdo): bzung ngo // de nas sems can chen po des/ nga yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug cing / bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas par byas nas/
133b7(mdo): der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs mardza dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
133b8(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang ngal legs so zhes bya ba byin nas nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand to// de na
133b9(mdo): gang gis nga byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shi nang tu bdol zhing nyon mongs pa dang chod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shind tu nyon mongs pa
134a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam pa bar
134a2(mdo): zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
134a3(mdo): ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nya btang ste// snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar mying btags so// nga yi dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
134a4(mdo): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed ni ba de/ da ltar 'jig rten gi khams mthe' bo can du// mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi/ myi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po
134a5(mdo): ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des ma/ the bo'i tshad tsam gyi myi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi
134a6(mdo): 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
134a7(mdo): dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya dag btang ngo // des dang po gA/
134a8(mdo): dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu byanid pa' bar dag yang dag par 'dzind du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa ga
134a9(mdo): zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mye tog dag skur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na sems
134b1(mdo): can tshe ring ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa bde' ba gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs/
134b2(mdo): ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob/ sems can mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po sgeg par dzad
134b3(mdo): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos stond pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shi nad tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams myed
134b4(mdo): pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i phra ba dang ldan pa lci bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing smond lam khyad par can btab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag
134b5(mdo): thams cad zil kyis mnon to// byang chub sems dang// 'a gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'i skye/ gnas rnams su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
134b6(mdo): yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnam sa yongs su bzung zhing / 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shi nad tu dul ba/ dge ba'i A dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can
134b7(mdo): de dag ni mye tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shi nad tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'
134b8(mdo): sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no// bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smond pa dang / sems can
134b9(mdo): bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smond pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi stond par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe
135a1(mdo): ring bar spyond pa ste/ bzhi po de dag su byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' me / lha thun pa pa shes bya'i pad sa dkar po ga bu ya
135a2(mdo): la/ sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya ste/ bram ze 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su
135a3(mdo): bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus
135a4(mdo): brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe ma/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par smond pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs
135a5(mdo): rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam stond par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang myi ring
135a6(mdo): hacang yang myi thung zhing bar mar sgrub par smonang pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtsom 'grus bathams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des byang
135a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' bar ma dkar po lci bu rnams shes bya'o/ mye tog sta bu rnams shes kyi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams shes kyang bya'o// zlum ze 'di lta
135a8(mdo): dper na khyod ning ltar sponang lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sbyar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa grangs byed pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstanod pa'i zhing du snying rje ba
135a9(mdo): ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyu rad pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su
135b1(mdo): bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga 'dol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so/
135b2(mdo): zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so// 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// snying rje chen po/
135b3(mdo): dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs myed pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la
135b4(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na// 'jig rten ldongs pa/ 'drend pa myed pa myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
135b5(mdo): bar gyurd cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa nyam nga ba chen po thob pa mtshams myed pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba lhung ba'i
135b6(mdo): za ba byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa na sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro
135b7(mdo): ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang bsgyur ba'i bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas su myed pa dag tu smras khyab par byas nas/
135b8(mdo): khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong skyong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / spyan cig tu smond lam btab pa bzhin du lo bzhi bcu lnga lngas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
135b9(mdo): de lta bu mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i tshen ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag myed ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad myed pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
136a1(mdo): mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der skye dgu tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa shag/
136a2(mdo): thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcul lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bra na myed pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan
136a3(mdo): las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smond lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar
136a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du/ yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe gnas grong zhes bya ba na bram
136a5(mdo): ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu da ma pa khyod bskal pa grangs myed pa de dang de dag tu byang chubakyi spyad pa pyod pa na/ bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar
136a6(mdo): 'gyur zhing byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / gro gas byed par gyur da nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa na bdag khyod kyi
136a7(mdo): par gyur da cig/ skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing / khyod kyis bdag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonang par gyur
136a8(mdo): cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mgo nid tu nul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ bskald pa grangs myed pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tham pa'i bar du gyur pa na
136a9(mdo): bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyurd cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par gyur cig/ smras skar gi
136b1(mdo): lha mo chu lga pyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyu rad pa na/ bdag khyod snun pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyurd te khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag
136b2(mdo): kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par gyur cig/ brgya byin mu khyud cam zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang brgya byin pha rol sems shes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyi smras pa/ kye snying rje chen po
136b3(mdo): dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nyan thos zung du gyur cig/ gzhan yang brgya
136b4(mdo): byin spyang pa dbyed blta mdzes tshogs shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur
136b5(mdo): cig/ gzhan yang ri che'i lha me dos pa king shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang / tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyu da cig// khyod
136b6(mdo): kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen
136b7(mdo): po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs myed pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang 'thun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran tu 'gyur te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur
136b8(mdo): byed par gyur da cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir kasro//
136b9(mdo): ba 'debs par gyurd cig/ khyod kyis chos bstand pa dag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig/ chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig/ 'chi ba byed pa yang rtogs par gyur
137a1(mdo): cig nyon mongs pa thams cad spam ba'i phyir dgra bcom pa mab par gyur cig/ de bzhin du gyum te/ den lga dang thu dang lha ma yin gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag gis kyang nyi rje chen po dang ldan pa ma
137a2(mdo): spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir smond lam btab ste/ 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar bkod do// de na 'tsho ba pa myi 'gyur 'jigs myed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po bdag kyang khyod la yo byad
137a3(mdo): mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig/ bdag bskal pa dpag tu myed pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur da cig/ rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don tu khyod gi drung
137a4(mdo): du nye bar 'gro bar gyurd cig/ mal cha dang / stan dang / bgol ba dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / grong dang / gr-ing khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khyim dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / sha nga
137a5(mdo): khrag dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lce dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / myig dang / mgo dag so/ nga bar gyur da cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod kyi
137a6(mdo): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i grogs su gyurd cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar gi grogs su yang gyurd cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod byang chub kyi khyad pa pyod pa'i
137a7(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi grogs su gyur cig/ nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nyar thos kyi gnas thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzind par gyu ra cig/
137a8(mdo): rjes su chos stodong par gyu ra cig/ khyod kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonod par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu zas ze snying mechen po dang ldan pas de zos pa dang
137a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'arnabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ 'tsho ba la myi 'gyur ba 'jigs mying bos te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i bla na myed pa yi 'byod pa'i grogs su
137b1(mdo): 'gyur ba ni legs so legs so// khyod che rabs khrag khrig 'bum zag tshad myed grangs myed pa'i bar du ngal dngos po 'od byin nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ ras kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la
137b2(mdo): yang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang 'thun par ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar yang
137b3(mdo): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag dpag du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad
137b4(mdo): du myang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi mdun du slongs mo pa gang dag mchis nas zas slong bar bgyid cing / tshig 'jam da po 'am/ tshig rtsub po 'am/ brnyas pa'i tshig gram/ tshig
137b5(mdo): gsal bas slong bar gyu rang na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyu rad tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed
137b6(mdo): gyurd tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin pa stsol par gyur da na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho
137b7(mdo): zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyurd cig/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
137b8(mdo): ma gyu rad cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te dag gi myos so pa la sems dang bas/ sbyin pa gsold ta ma/ sbyin pa de yang le nad pa po la dad pa byin par 'gyur zhing chung za bar 'gyur ram
137b9(mdo): gas te la na sma'i che mo'i chags kyi tshad tsam dge dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad byed par gyur da na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur da cig/ gal te skra'i rtse mo 'a
138a1(mdo): shas kyi tshad tsam zhig le nad pa po la dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/ bdag kyang mnar myed par mchi bar gyur da cig// zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du spongs mo pa gang dag bdag
138a2(mdo): la dgos dang / mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing / tshig 'jam po 'am chig rtsub po 'o// brnyas tshig gi/ tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs so
138a3(mdo): pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyurd tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyu rang tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smyind pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo'i bar dag yongs su
138a4(mdo): gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag mnar myed po/ 'chi ba'i bar du gyur cig/ sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul
138a5(mdo): khrims rmas shes rab kyi bar dag yongs su gtong ba la yang // brjod par bya'o// / rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138a6(mdo): chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po gnas pa'i sems kyis/ smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni skyes bu dam
138a7(mdo): pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / myi dang / lA mra yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal me sbyar nas 'khod nas
138a8(mdo): de la legs so zhes bya ba byed te/ rjes su dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ smon du lam de lta bu btab pa 'i skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod de snying
138a9(mdo): por 'gyur ba dang / 'thum pa'i chis drug gis sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshob pa kyi 'gyur 'jigs/
138b1(mdo): myed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stod kyis kyang sprond lam btab po// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des rdzi
138b2(mdo): ltar 'tsho ba pa myi 'gyur 'jigs myed kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gyis kyang smon lam de lta bu dag btab pa thos pa dang / de na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog
138b3(mdo): du dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bltas te mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa/ a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge dang / zad pa'i dus
138b4(mdo): dang / nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing thod pa'i dus na snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten mgon myed pa'i ded dpon dang srung ba myed pa dang / sgron ma myed pa dang / byis pa
138b5(mdo): skyabs myed pa/ ldongs pa rnams kyis lam stond par 'gyur pa dang / 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas/ tshe rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gi mgo li nad par 'gyur
138b6(mdo): ba dang / myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / kha zas kyi bar dag le nad par 'gyur zhing bla na myed pa yi byang chub kyi myod
138b7(mdo): pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshard to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan
138b8(mdo): sngar 'dug ste/ gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskald pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas/ byang chub kyi mthar
138b9(mdo): shug gi bar du bdag gi drung du slongs po pa gang dag nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing / yun reng po de srid kyi bar du zas sam skom de dag blangs par gyur pa dang / bdag gi sug pa nas tha na skra'i the
139a1(mdo): mo'i chags kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyurd pa'i sems can de dag/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gal te 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par
139a2(mdo): myi bgyid dam nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen pos lung stond par myi 'gying ma bdag gis gang dag de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na bzhugs te/
139a3(mdo): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
139a4(mdo): bar myi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la
139a5(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis/ ji ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po che 'dzind gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od gzer gyi
139a6(mdo): s+yan sngar/ dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' pyod pa'i ya smon lam 'di lta bu bta ba ste/ skyes bu dam pa des smond lam ji ltar btab
139a7(mdo): pa bzhin du bsgra lang pa chen po gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shi nad tu lpags pa snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa spyad nas 'di nas shar phyogs log tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 'bum phrag
139a8(mdo): 'das pa la 'jig rten gi khams 'od gzum so sor rtog pa zhes bya bar/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
139a9(mdo): rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes kye tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag par mthong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra/
139b1(mdo): kyi bas du gyur cig/ lo bzhi brgya ma ldas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ rtsung po'i lpag sa skyes pa'i rgyatsham lus 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so// snying rje chen po dang ldan
139b2(mdo): bya de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kye tog rdul zas byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mthong yongs su mya dran las 'das nas de'i das pa'i chos kyi tshul mim stong tu gnas par gyur to// dam
139b3(mdo): chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong du gnas par gyurang to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mye tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mthong
139b4(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs bstan gnas pa na dge slong dang / dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos
139b5(mdo): dang ldan pa myi mthun par spyod pa 'jig rten gi nor 'phrog pa// ngo tsha myed pa rnams dang / chos kyi mchod pa gcod par byed pa// ngo tsha myed pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge
139b6(mdo): 'dun dang mngon par gyurd pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad ga gsos sman dang / yo byad gcod cing gang zag gar yongs su bzung ste
139b7(mdo): bdag spyod pa byed pa 'am/ khyim pa la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kye tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho' des
139b8(mdo): theg pa gsum po dag gis rim kyis lung bstand to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kang su dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstand pa la dur smrig dmar po dgos pa thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dag
139b9(mdo): gis phyir myi ldog par lung bstand to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang su dag snga ma kho na bzhin du ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang stonod par
140a1(mdo): 'du shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par sbyin pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir myi ldog par lung bstand pa de bzhin du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang khyod/
140a2(mdo): pa'i smon lam btab pa legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan
140a3(mdo): sngar gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di lta bu lags te/ ci srid du bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pyang ba pyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug
140a4(mdo): ba'i spyad pa spyod pa'i bar du bdag gis sems can gang dag spyi na pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par 'dzind tu
140a5(mdo): stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'god par 'gyur ba 'am/ tha na dge ba'i za ba smra'i rtse mo 'chashas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor ba/ ra 'gyur ba la sems can de dag las/ tha na sems can 'ag/
140a6(mdo): tsam zhig bdag gis theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir gyi ldog ba'i sa la bkod par ma gyu rang pa ma/ bdag gis phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa
140a7(mdo): dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur da cig/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang /
140a8(mdo): rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bra na byed pa'i ye shes thob pa nas kyang / sems can gang dag bdag gi bstu nang pa la chos gos ngu smyig bgos par gyur da ba las/ smyur
140a9(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa 'am/ nyom mongs pa can gyi lta ba la zhugs par gyur pa 'am/ dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul par ma gyur cig/ nongs pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong/
140b1(mdo): mA dang / dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang dag skad cig gcig la stonod pa'i 'du shes sam/ gus pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag las/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag
140b2(mdo): gis tha na sems can 'ga' tsam zhig spangs shing / theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir myi ldog par lung bstand par ma gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang
140b3(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos ngur smrig dmar po lnga dang kyi rnams kyis
140b4(mdo): gus par bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ba mthong ma thag tu/ ngur sbyin/ mgul nas thogs par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang theg pa
140b5(mdo): gsum po dag gis phyir myi ldog par gyurd cig// sems/ can gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang bral zhing bkres pa dang / sgom pas gnod par gyurd pa rnams dang / tha na gnod sbyin dbu
140b6(mdo): po rnams sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gAng dag tha na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de ngag thams cad kyang bza' ba dang / btung ba phun sum tshogs
140b7(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ lha 'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ klu 'am/ lA ma ya ni nam// nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul
140b8(mdo): bum 'am/ za 'ams kyi 'phra/ sems can gang dag pa mtshun zhe 'gras shing mkhon bcugs mang por gyu rad pa rnams dang / phan tshur 'gyed cing g.yul ngor zhugs te/ g.yul 'azod par gyu rang ba rjes
140b9(mdo): kyis kyang bdag gi chos gos ngur smyig rjes su dran par gyur da na/ sems can de dag snying rje'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / khon myed pa'i sems dang / yas su rung ba'i sems su gyu rad cig/
141a1(mdo): sems can gang dag g.yul po'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ cod pa'i nang du srung ba dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / gus par bgyid pa'i slad du ngur smrig gi dum bu 'chang bar gyu rang
141a2(mdo): pa'i sems can de dag kyang rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khrul pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba ma mchis par gyur da cig/ g.yul po dang / 'gyed pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa de dag las kyang legs
141a3(mdo): par yongs su tha rad par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi chos gos ngur smyig dmar po 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan par ma gyur na// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i
141a4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag gis mdzad pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par rngo myi thog pa dang / bdag gis chos rnams bskyud par 'gyur
141a5(mdo): ba dang / bdag gis gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod pa/ ra rngo myi thog pa'i bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad/ sa gang dag bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
141a6(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cing / bya'atshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib
141a7(mdo): pa bas sngar 'gyur zhing / mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das bla na myed pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin
141a8(mdo): po che'i snying po des/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ phyag ki mthi gyis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsa ladA pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smond lam
141a9(mdo): ni dgre bya bzang ba rab tu gtan la phab pa yin te legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod ni de bzhin du 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ngur smrig dmar pos/ sems can rnams/
141b1(mdo): nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// kye rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phyag sor ring pos yongs su bkab cing
141b2(mdo): phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mthil gyis byugs pa dang / lung bstan cing legs so zhes bya ba byin pa des/ mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba skyes nas che lo nyi shu lon pa lta bu'i tshad tsam kyi ga'on
141b3(mdo): nur red do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / driT dang / rmyi dang / sgyu ma yin du bcas pa rnams kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par
141b4(mdo): gyurd cing mye tog dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa byas te/ bsngags pa dang tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs kyis
141b5(mdo): ston nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// theg pa chen po 'i mdo'i snying rje pad ma dkar po las/ lung bstand pa/ 'i le'u bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// pham ma
141b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas ste/ de bzhin
141b7(mdo): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la gus pa dang bcas pas/ yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan
141b8(mdo): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan de lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan
141b9(mdo): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstand pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis
142a1(mdo): ni ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
142a2(mdo): mo tshogs ji lta bu dang ldan na brtan par gnas pa lags/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa ji lta bus na brgyan pa lags/ kye rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
142a3(mdo): sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la 'di skad bka' stsa lang to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi zhu ba bzang / spobs pa dag ste
142a4(mdo): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la do na de lta bu yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni snying rje chen po ldan pa khyod sems can dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa rnams la phan
142a5(mdo): ba byed pa dang / gces spras byed pa rgya chen po skyes pa yin te/ legs so legs so// 9/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyi ra legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod
142a6(mdo): laM bshad par bya'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzind dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind de la gnas/
142a7(mdo): pa ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa yin no// rim cen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ des ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed do// seng ge rnam par
142a8(mdo): che ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de// de la gnas nas ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni ting nge 'dza nad thams cad snang bar
142a9(mdo): byed do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge las na kyi rgyalta mtshan 'dzind par byed do// chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge
142b1(mdo): 'dzand thams cad khongs su chud par byed do// phyag rgya rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta bar byed do// chos kyi dbyings su rnam pa re song ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis
142b2(mdo): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par 'gro bar byed do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzind par byed do//
142b3(mdo): rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi phyed par byed do// chos lnga 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyal po shin
142b4(mdo): tu brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po nyid du gnas par byed do// 'od gzer bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'od gzer 'gyed par byed do// stobs
142b5(mdo): kyi brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind tham/ sa cad la stobs dang brtson 'grus su byed do// yang dag/ par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind zas
142b6(mdo): cad las gyen tu 'phags par byed do// nges pa'i tshig ston pa'i ting nge 'dza nad kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed do// tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin
142b7(mdo): kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi mying gi rjes su 'jug par byed do// phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed do// chos thams cad
142b8(mdo): rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba rjes su rtogs par byed do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzind pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad kyi phyag rgya
142b9(mdo): 'dzind par byed do// chos thams cad las dben pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad las dben pa'i chos nyid la rjes su 'jug par byed do// brjod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
143a1(mdo): kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad myi brjod par byed do// chos thams cad las kyi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la myi g.yo ba nyid du gnas par byed do//
143a2(mdo): chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad sdud cing yang dag par 'du bar byed do// chos thams cad la rlom sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind
143a3(mdo): kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i rlom sems myed par byed do// nam mkha'i khyab par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la nam mkha' ltar khyab
143a4(mdo): par byed do// chos thams cad rgya nang myi gcad pa'i ting nge 'ji nad kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad chu nad myi chad par byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin
143a5(mdo): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzind par byed do// chos tha mas cad ro gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind tham sa cad kyi bcung 'dzind par byed do// rin cen rgyal bu'i
143a6(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ yo byad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do// chos thams cad skye ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par ston
143a7(mdo): khar byed do// rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad lam me ldan ne lgang der byed do// chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad
143a8(mdo): rnam par 'byed par byed do// tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la ting nge 'dzind kyi chos rnams nam yang yang tshol bar myi byed do// gnas la rtend par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
143a9(mdo): kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la gnas pa'i byang chub chos nam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzi nid thams cad nam mkha'i
143b1(mdo): chos nyid lta bur snying po myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// sems/ myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la sems dang sems las chos rnams spong bar byed do// gzugs
143b2(mdo): mu myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ gzugs kun tu snang bar byed do// dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du byed do// chos thams cad mu myed pa'i
143b3(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad la ye shes mu myed pa stond par byed do// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin zhes lnga ba zhes pa mu myed par stond par byed do// 'od thams cad byed pa'i
143b4(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'od byed pa 'i sgro nye bar stond par byed do// khams kyi mtha'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni ting nge 'dzi nang mtha' myed pa thams cad rnam pa
143b5(mdo): shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar stonod par byed do// ting nge 'dzind dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind/ kyi chos rnams la stong pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do//
143b6(mdo): lhun po ltar bkra ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad gsog nyid tu kun tu stond par byed do// 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad
143b7(mdo): kya dri ma se lad par byed do// chos thams cad brda'i ting nge 'dzind kyis nI/ tang nge 'dza nid thum sA cang ma 'dres pa nyid tu yang dag par stond par byed do// dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis
143b8(mdo): nig ting nge 'dzind thams cad la dga' ba rab tu thob par byed do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par che ba'i ting nge 'dzinid kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs/
143b9(mdo): pa stond par byed do// glog 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la myi bzad pa nyid stond par byed do// chos thams cad la rnam par g.yeng bskyed dus da mas nyi tu
144a1(mdo): // kyi sa tu de mas pa nye bar ston par byed do// / myi zad pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi zad pa myed pa dang / zad pa myed pa ma yin pa yang dag par stonang par byed do//
144a2(mdo): chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab cing rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad myig yor lta bur stond par byed do// gzi' brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis nI/ ting nge 'dzind thos
144a3(mdo): cad la ye shes 'bar bar byed do// zad pa dang bral ba'i ting po 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad zad pa myed pa dang / nyams pa byed par stond par byed do// myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni
144a4(mdo): chos thams cad la g.yo bor gyi byed 'gul bar gyi byed/ zo bar myi byed do// rnam par 'phel ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la zhes bya
144a5(mdo): rnam par 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams ca/ nga la 'od gzer ga sgo 'gyed par byed do// zla ba dri ma myed
144a6(mdo): pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la snang bar byed do// snang ba dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la se sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par byed
144a7(mdo): do// bya ba dang myi bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ bya ba dang gyi bya ba'i byed cing / ye shes tog kyang yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad 'byed
144a8(mdo): par byed cing gang la yang 'byed par yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ sems g.yo bar myi byed do// 'gul bar myi byed snang bar myi byed
144a9(mdo): cing gnod par 'gyur ba yang myed la/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems ma yin no// snyam du yang mya sems par byed do// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la snang ba yang
144b1(mdo): dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rab tu gnas par byed do// rin cen pa tshigs pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind
144b2(mdo): thams cad la rin po che brtsegs pa lta bur kun tu snang bar byed do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la phyag rgyas 'debs par byed cing / chos thams cad mnyam pa
144b3(mdo): nyid kyi phyir/ mnyam pa nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la dga' ba spong bar byed do// chos
144b4(mdo): kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge mi mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge gcig
144b5(mdo): kyang myi dmyigs par byed do// dmyigs pa gcad pa'i ti/ nga nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la dmyigs pa rnam par// gcod par byed do// 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind
144b6(mdo): kyis ni chos thams cad la 'gyur ba myi dmyigs par byed do// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la phan 'dogs par myi dmyigs par byed do// gnas
144b7(mdo): myed par rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad la gnas myi dmyigs par byed do// rab rib dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi pyod pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong
144b8(mdo): zhing / bun pa'i yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad la bsags pa spong bar byed do// sems myed par
144b9(mdo): gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la sems shes bya ba myi dmyigs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad rtogs par byed do// dran
145a1(mdo): pa rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la spobs pa grangs byed pa thob par byed do// byed pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad
145a2(mdo): la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// ye shes tog gi ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ khams gsum thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do// shes pa nye bar gcod pa'i ting nge/
145a3(mdo): 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad rnam par gcod pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// ye shes rnam par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phro ba nyid rjes su thob
145a4(mdo): par byed do// gnas myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad gnas su gyur da pa myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos
145a5(mdo): 'ga' yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed/ do// rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa li ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes
145a6(mdo): su mthong bar byed do// srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rnam par sel da pa thams cad gtogs pa'i ting nge 'dza nad kyis ni/ chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i ye shes 'jug rdzi gA sa lug pa
145a7(mdo): yang myi rnyed par byed do// garda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ sgra dang brda' thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed do// sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni// chos
145a8(mdo): thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind gyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad pa gzi brjid kyis lam me lhan ne lhang
145a9(mdo): der byed do// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid stonang par byed do// mngon par shes pa myed pa'i mtshan
145b1(mdo): nyid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la mngon par rig pa myed pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis mi/ chos dang ting nge/
145b2(mdo): 'dzind thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par byed do// sdug bsngal thams cad shi nad tu spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas pa myed pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed
145b3(mdo): ngo // byed rgyu zad pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la zad pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// gzungs kyi gzhi'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang chos thams cad
145b4(mdo): 'dzind cing yang dag pa nyid dang log pa nyid yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// 'gog pa dpa' gal ba rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad 'thun pa dang 'gal/
145b5(mdo): bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi zhi ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'dus byas kyi dri ma dang / bral ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// snying po
145b6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la snying po myed pa myi dmyigs par byed do// zla ba nya ba dri ma myed pa 'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la yon tan
145b7(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed do// snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni
145b8(mdo): chos thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid rnam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la rtse gcig pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// nyon
145b9(mdo): mongs pa myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzind gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la nyon mongs pa myed par byed do// rang gi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin
146a1(mdo): kyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas myi byed do// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las kyi ldog par byed do// lus kyi skyon
146a2(mdo): yang dag par seld pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la 'jig tshogs myi dmyigs par byed do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni/ byang chub
146a3(mdo): sems dpa' chos thams cad la dag gis las myi dmyigs par byed do// nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa la rnam par grol zhing gos pa'i myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
146a4(mdo): thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa nyid rjes su tho ba par 'gyur te/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting
146a5(mdo): 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs yang dag pa'i// sgo sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ byang chub ses
146a6(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad yo ngas su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems de pa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su
146a7(mdo): rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
146a8(mdo): brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro//
146a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa myed par
146b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyi tshogs ni shes pa
146b2(mdo): thogs pa myed par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tsho gas ni sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang /
146b3(mdo): bral bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshig ni zhe 'gres pa'i sems myed par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su
146b4(mdo): sbyind par bya ba la skyo ba myed par byed par 'gyur ro// bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub seMs
146b5(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms tshogs ni rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khrod pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems/ dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed
146b6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// bya nga chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshags na
146b7(mdo): yongs su 'jan da pa thams cad spang bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni/ dge ba'i chatsha ba las byas pa chud myi za bar byed par 'gyur ro//
146b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' dzas
146b9(mdo): kyi rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang chos rjes su rtog
147a1(mdo): par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni myi dge ba'i chos rnams spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sgom par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang/
147a2(mdo): rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par
147a3(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni
147a4(mdo): chos kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa tha mas cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ro//
147a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i tshogs ni myi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing mtho ris su skye ba 'thob par 'gyu// ra ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag
147a6(mdo): par rig pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsom ga/ cod par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa'i tshogs ni shes pa gzhan la rag ma lus par byed
147a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad kyi sgo yin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshogs ni
147a8(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad la gyi slu bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs ni/ tshogs thams cad mthar phyi nad par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
147a9(mdo): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du yang dag par 'jog pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub par byed par
147b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs/
147b2(mdo): 'dzin pa'i tshogs mi dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gyi 'chang par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i chos shes pa mkhas pa'i tshogs mi sangs rgyas kyi
147b3(mdo): zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs
147b4(mdo): kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo yang dag par sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
147b5(mdo): pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po las rnam par ga/ zigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bos te bka' stsal da pa
147b6(mdo): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs pa'i rgyand ji lta bus brgya nad pa na ba zod pa yongs su rdzogs 'gyur zhe na/ don dam pa mthong
147b7(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'bad pa don yod pa yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems dang / khams pa thams cad dang sems can thams cad la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa
147b8(mdo): sems gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong chos myi 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang gi sems chos thams cad la nam mkha' dang lag par mnyam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
147b9(mdo): myi 'jigs pa'i rgyan yin no// ji ltar na bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang // bdag myed pa dang / snying rje dang / sems can myed pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid byung ba
148a1(mdo): dang / btang snyoms dang / gang zag myed pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba'i sems nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus dang /
148a2(mdo): bden pa'i sems nyid dang / nges par sems pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / rgya che ba'i sems nyid dang / dran par gzhag pa dang / dran pa myed pa dang / yid la byed pa myed pa'i sems dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /
148a3(mdo): skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba myed pa'i sems nyid dang / dad pa dang / thogs pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang rang 'byung gi sems nyid
148a4(mdo): rang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dbang po myed pa'i sems nyid dang / stobs dang / myi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
148a5(mdo): blo rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid dang / lam dang sgom pa'i sems nyid / dang / zhi gnas dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong // dang / rmongs pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden
148a6(mdo): ba'i bsgom pa dang / shi nad du yongs su shes pa sgom pa'i sems nyid dang / sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang / mun pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang chos yid la byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid
148a7(mdo): dang / dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang / gnas pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba dang / gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa dang / chos
148a8(mdo): kyi dbyings dbyer byed pa'i sems nyid dang / zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / ram mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan myed pa'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa/
148a9(mdo): thob pa dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir gyi ldog pa'i sde dang chug par rjog pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i sems nyid dang / khams gsum gyi snying po yi nad pa'i sems nyid dang /
148b1(mdo): sems can thams cadams bzung char gcad pa'i sems dang / sems can thams canas pan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang cos thams cad mnyam pa nyid su rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi
148b2(mdo): lo bkod pa dang / chos thams cad skor ba byed pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu stond pa dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems nyid kyi chos de la gang rjes su rtogs par 'gyur
148b3(mdo): ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab tsam yang myi dmyigs shing rnam par sbyind pa myed pa'i chos la mos par byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na gang dag phyogs bcu nas sngon gyi tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin
148b4(mdo): sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs yang dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyand pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs bzhag kya thub pa'i spyan sngar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpalas
148b5(mdo): ya phrag drug dang ba'i 'bum po de dag gis myi skye ba'i chos la/ bzod pa thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pas/ bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
148b6(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi
148b7(mdo): bye ma snyed kyis kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gleng ba'i pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi'i phyir gyi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to//
148b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstand pA dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag yongs su rdzogs shing / rnam par
148b9(mdo): das pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de yang mchog tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba des gnod nu lo nyi shu lon
149a1(mdo): pa lta bur red nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zham 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa de yang bu stong dang khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang / gzhan yang
149a2(mdo): srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang / nyan thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / nges pa dag gis mngon par brtson par byas par
149a3(mdo): gyur to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas/ mthard kyis nyam thos kyi theg pa'i gtam gi chos
149a4(mdo): kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong blags shing kun chub par byas so rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri lung ma nos shing / grags te kun chub par byas so// de bzhin du
149a5(mdo): bla na myed pa'i theg pa chen po'i gtam la yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum lung mnos zhing blags te kun chu/ ba par byas so// tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam
149a6(mdo): 'bum dang sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam 'bu ma dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum yang lung mnos te/ blags shing kun chub par byas so// khams
149a7(mdo): tshogs kyi gtam 'bus dang / skye mched kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / 'dod chags kyi kun tu sbyar ba spang ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / zhe sdang gi kun tu sbyor ba spang ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum
149a8(mdo): dang / kuti mug gi kun du sbyor ba rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rdzogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / stobs dang / kyi 'jigs pa dang / sas
149a9(mdo): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing sngags gang kun chub par byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thid nam ma chos kyi phung po 'bus phrag bcu'i bar dag
149b1(mdo): dag kyang bzung zhing blags te kun chub par byas so// rigs kyi bu ci tsam gyi dus gzhan zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po phung po lhag ma myed pa'i
149b2(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des rol mo 'i sgra dang / me tog dang / phye ma dang / me tong 'phreng dang / spos dang byug pa
149b3(mdo): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag gis mchod pa byas shing s+pho'ulu sna tshogs kyis bkrus nas/ sku gdung bzhag pa'i mchod rten rin po
149b4(mdo): che sna bdun las byas pa nga du di tshwa s+ya ni dpag tshad yod pa yang pa tshigs so// de nas zhag bdun ga bar du rol mo'i sgra dang me tog dang / me tog daphreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
149b5(mdo): gdugs dang ka rgyal mtshan dang / pa dan dang / rin po me dpag tu byed grangs mye bag gis mchod pa byas nas/ der yang sem/ sa can dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag theg pa gsum yang
149b6(mdo): dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de zhag bdun po de dag 'das pa dang / srog chags brgyad khri ba ni stong dang lhan cig tu mngon par byung ste/ sgra dang kha spu bregs
149b7(mdo): nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/ yang dag par dad pa kyis kyis myed par rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po yongs su mya ngan la swa pa'i bstand pa 'bar bar byas te/ lo khri'i
149b8(mdo): bem du ngas pa'i chos 'dzind par gyur nas de yang sems can dpag tu myes dr-i / theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug cing brgyad de rab tu bkod do// gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba
149b9(mdo): yang rab tu bkod do// dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang / sten pa'i rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen gyi dngos po tshangs par myong pa'i sdom pa la btsud de rab tu bkod // des kyang srog/
150a1(mdo): chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum zag mang po dag mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa la nges par sbyar cing des kyang tshangs par myong ba'i gnas lA yang nges par sbyar te/ phung po
150a2(mdo): rnams dgra lta bur gyur par yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/ skye mched rnams grong stong pa lta bur yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar ba chos thams cad rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes 'dus
150a3(mdo): byas shes pa yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/ chos thams cad myig yos bu dang / smyig sku lta bu dang / chu zla lta bur yang bstand skye ba myong ba dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / mtshams sbyor ba myed pa'i
150a4(mdo): 'gog pa myed pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi dad pa dang / mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / 'gog pa mya ngan las 'ad/ das pa yongs su shes pa yang bstand te/ 'phags pa'i la
150a5(mdo): yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu bkod nas 'chi ba'i dus byasabar gyur da to// sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
150a6(mdo): dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa la snga ma bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus pa dag la rus pa'i mchod pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sems can de dag gis kyang snying rje chen
150a7(mdo): po dang ldan bI ge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa dag la mchod pa byas so// gang gi nyin mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po'i 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa de'i nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa rin
150a8(mdo): po che'i snying po'i dam pa'i chos kyang nub ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni/ smon lam go dbang gis 'jig rten gi khams gzhag dag tu skye ba yongs su bzung ste/ kha cig
150a9(mdo): ni spo dang lam gyi dbang gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes so// kha cig mi phyi rnams kyi nang du/ kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du/ kha cig ni smond las kyi rab kyi dud 'gro la myi gnas sna tshogs dag du skyes so//
150b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dge sbyong chen po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang smon lam gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri 'das pa de na 'jig rten ga
150b2(mdo): khams yang dag 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ den myi rnams ni tshe lo brgyad cu thub la/ myi dge ba'i tsha ba dang ldan pa gtum pa/ lag pa khrag gis gos pa/ sdig pa la zhend pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba myed
150b3(mdo): par zhugs pa/ mar myi 'dzind pa/ phar myi 'dzind pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par myi lta ba sha stag ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dge sbyong chen po de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren
150b4(mdo): der gdol pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ de yang lus shin tu ring bar gyurd cing / sha nid tu stobs dang ldan pa/ shinang tu shugs da nga ldan pa/ shind tu dran pa dang ldan pa ga shind tu stobs dang ldan pa
150b5(mdo): shinang tu mgyogs pa dang ldan par gyurang nas/ des stobs kyi/ shugs brtan pas sems can dag bzung ste smras pa/ kye sems can dag khyed cag gal te ma byin par lend pa spong ba
150b6(mdo): dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar byed na/ ngas khyod cag gi sbyor bar byas shing / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag sbyin par bya'o// kye gal te myi spong na
150b7(mdo): ngas srog dang phral te 'gro'o// de nas sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te smras pa// mgon po khyod kyi tshig gis bdag cag da deng slad nas// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin le nad pa nas
150b8(mdo): log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar myi byed do// gdol pa stobs cad de song nas// rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bkrabs pa dag la bsgo ba/ kho bo'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad du zas dang skom dang / bza' ba
150b9(mdo): dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / kos dang / mal tsa dang / spos dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le spram
151a1(mdo): dka dgos kyis/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po dag kho bo la phul cig/ gdolang pa stobs can des/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /
151a2(mdo): de nas kyi de dag kyang tshe lo lnga brgya thub par gyur to// de na rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i blon po de dag gis gdol pa'i stobs can de rgyal po'i dbang bskur te/
151a3(mdo): rgyal por bcug nas rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyis ring po ma lon par yul der rjes su bstand te/ bsngon 'grus brtan zhing brtul zhugs gnyis par yang rjes su bstand nas/ rgyal po bsod nams
151a4(mdo): stobs ring po ma lon par/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bar du gyu rad to// gang gi tshe rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thas
151a5(mdo): cad kyi rgyal srid bzung nas/ de'i 'og tu sems can rnaMs srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod do// de bzhin du ma byin par lend pa dang / log
151a6(mdo): par lta bu'i bar dag spong ba yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar dag la rab tu bkod do// sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag
151a7(mdo): yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod cing /
151a8(mdo): theg pa gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad du smra dbyangs rje su bsgrags pa/ spongs mo pa gang su dag zas 'dod pa dang / rin po che'i bar dag 'dod pa de dag thams
151a9(mdo): cad tshur sheg shig dang / ngas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgrags so// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lpags nas/ rgyal
151b1(mdo): po bsod nams stobs la slongs mo byed par gyurd pa dang / rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis kyang de dag las brtsams te sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byin no// de na 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs shes bya ba
151b2(mdo): zhig rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi drung du stong smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhed cing sbyin pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su
151b3(mdo): gtong bar mdzad la/ rgyal po chen po gal te khyod kyis bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par gyur dan ni rgyal po chen po khyod rgyal po 'i 'jig rten ka sgron mar 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/
151b4(mdo): khyod ci zhig 'dod// 'tshob pa rdul dbyangs kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni lA ma yin gyi g.yul chen po rab tu 'joms dpa'i rigs sngags 'chang nyid 'tshal na/ cho ga zhib mo bsgrubs
151b5(mdo): pa'i srang tu myi gsom po lags pa yang 'tshal/ myig kyang 'a/ sa te/ de'i slad du bdag khyod kyi spyar sngar mchis ras gson ba bgyid lags so// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams
151b6(mdo): stobs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thob nas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag cig dge ba'i bcu'i las rab kyi lam rab tu bkod cing theg pa gsum/
151b7(mdo): po de dag la yang nges par sbyar te/ bdag gis sbyin pa yang dpag tu myed pa zhig byin na/ 'di ni snying po myed pa'i lus las snying po le nad par byed pa zhig ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam nas/
151b8(mdo): rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas khyod la sha'i myig tha yal pa 'di sbyin par byas dga' bar gyis shig/ de nas bdag gis bla na myed pa'i chos kyi spyan thob par gyurd cig/ ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis
151b9(mdo): rang gi pags pa 'di yang sbyin par byas/ de nas bdag gos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur da cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis/ lag pa g.yas
152a1(mdo): pas rang gi myig gnyis phyung ste/ 'tshob pa la byin nas/ gdong khrag gis yog bzhin du smras pa/ 'di na kang dag 'dir lhags pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /
152a2(mdo): gnod sbyin mthu chen po rnams dang / myi 'am ni gang yin pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gang yin pa rnams dang / 'byung po gang yin pa rnams dang / myi 'am gang yin pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/ bdag gis
152a3(mdo): sbyin pa byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge bas/ zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur nas/ bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho myi bzad pa las sgrol zhing bla na myed pa'i zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod
152a4(mdo): par gyur na cig/ yang sbas pa/ gal te bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba ltan ji srid tu 'tsho ba 'di'i rig sngags des grub par ma gyu rang pa de srid
152a5(mdo): kyi bar du bdag gi srog gi dbang po 'gags par ma gyurd cig/ bdag gi dran pa yang nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag lagyod par yang ma gyurd cig/ rigs kyi bu rgyal pos pags
152a6(mdo): pa yang khyer cig ces spras pa dang / 'chos pa rdul dbyangs des ma tshon rnon po blangs ste/ rgyal po gson po'i lus las pags pa bshus nas/ pags pa khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs so//
152a7(mdo): de sa zhag bdun gyi pa du rgyal po ma song rnams stobs kyi sgrog kI dbang po yangs 'gugs/ rnan pa sangs nyams sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de sangs myong sa/ des skad cig nas yang 'gyong ba skyes par
152a8(mdo): bya ri sgra 'di'i snyas du sems/ de'i ma de'i dum ma phying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyu ra pa ri ga 'ang rig yin pa snyam du 'dzind du/ gzhan du rtsi bak+ta ste/ de ng+ge rnam
152a9(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pa'i yab nyid rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ra gyur to// ngas bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgreng par gyur pa'i dngos po ni de yin no/
152b1(mdo): ngas dang po sems bsgreng bas sems can bgrang ba las 'dra ba dag na/ bla na byed payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug ste/ 'di dpa' ba'i dngos po dang / dpa' bo'i bya ba'i dang lon
152b2(mdo): de yin no// nga smon pa lam gi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'drem du gdos pa'i rigs su skyes pa/ re'i chen ngas gdolang pa'i rigs su gnas nas sems can rnams dge ba
152b3(mdo): sbyard cing / rang gi stobs dang rdul bral bas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob pa'i bar dang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du 'thub pa dang / cod pa'i rnyog pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing / tshe yang bsrings
152b4(mdo): ti ngas dang po lus yongs su btang ba de ni/ nga'i dpa' ba'i dngos po dang / dpa' bo bya ba gnyis po yin no// gang gi tshe des rang gi myig dag yongs su btang zhing rang gi pags pa yang
152b5(mdo): btang ba btang ste/ de nas shi 'phos pa nas yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren de nyid kyi gling gnyis bar gdold pa'i rigs su skyes nas// snga ma bzhin du sbyar
152b6(mdo): te der yang ngas brtson 'grus rten zhing rtul ba de lta bus sems can rnams dge ba'i las dag la nges par sbyar ba nas stobs kyi 'kho ra los sgyur ba'i bar yang thob ste/ der yang 'thab pa dang chod
152b7(mdo): pa'i rnyog pa dang 'khon pa dang 'gyod pa dag rab tu zhi bar byas te tshe yang bsrings so/ 6/ der yar ga lus las lce dang rna ba dag yongs su btang ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren gyi stong chen po kun gyi gling
152b8(mdo): thams cad kyi bar du yang skyes bu'i rtsa ba de lta bu'i rtsa ba da lta pa dag byas so// smon lam dang brtson 'grus btan zhing brtul pa rjes su 'brel pa dang / smon lam gi dbang gis snyigs ma snga dang
152b9(mdo): sregs pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'ang gang ka'i klung ga phyi ma steng dag tu yang sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la nges par sbyar cing / theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug ste//
153a1(mdo): 'thab pa dang / thod pa'i stog pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'khon pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing / skyes bu chen po'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
153a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gzhan rAg gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni 'di'i phyir te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi khyad pa pyod pa ma
153a3(mdo): gzhan gi ltung ba gleng bar myi byed cing gzhan la 'jigs pa stond par myi byed la sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin tu ma bcug pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom
153a4(mdo): ldan 'das dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dag gi sangs rgyadas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyurd te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na stu nga ba'i mying yang myed la bslab pa gzung ba myed/ tshig rtsub mo
153a5(mdo): yang myi grag/ myi dge ba'i sgra yang myi grag ste// gzhan du nas ngas rgyas kyi zhing de chos kyi sgra dang / yid du myi 'ong ba myed pa'isgras khyab pa yin no// de na sems can rnams kyang ji ltar
153a6(mdo): 'dod bzhin du byed pa yin te/ de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mying du gdags pa tsam yang myi sring do// ngas ni gang gi tshe bskalang pa chen po gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sdum
153a7(mdo): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'di stong pa gang ga' klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/ tshig chub po dang / 'jigs su rung bas sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bcud de rag
153a8(mdo): tu bkod pa nas/ theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na/ del las kyi 'phros/ da ltar nga nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing myi dge ba'i sgras kun tu khyab la/
153a9(mdo): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu na/ theg pa gsum gyis chos stond te/ ngas sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
