173a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgya sa kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu bdun 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
173a7(mdo): blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen ri bo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond pa gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpa/
173a8(mdo): bya rang cig kyang ba 'byod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
173a9(mdo): rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang / de bzhini gshegs pa dbyangs sa byed mdzod ces bya ba dang bab grags pa dang / sums tu snyim po dang / zangs
173b1(mdo): pa'i mye tog dang / sku mchog rnam par gnon dang / chos kyi shugs kyi sgron ma dang / lhun po phrag myed sgra dbyangs rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi logs kyi
173b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag gi mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas yongs su bsgrags pa de dag gis gdan dag g.yos shing de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas
173b3(mdo): kyi pho nya/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khod pa'i bar
173b4(mdo): tu ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du byang byadags dang / de bzhin du ste dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de bzhin du lho nub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang
173b5(mdo): de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs rnams su yang snga ma bzhin du spya ra te brjod par bya'o// yang bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa/ sa bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
173b6(mdo): 'di nas byang shard kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ sangs rgya sa kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin
173b7(mdo): gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyurd cing / byang chub sems dpa'i pyad pa 'byor
173b8(mdo): nangs thams cad kyi dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pha rold du phyind pa drug gi bar yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug nas/ thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
173b9(mdo): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gi zad du phul nas der des dang por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob bo// gang gi tshe de'i mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa/
174a1(mdo): bas banas/ shAdag dang byabs dang / dadu pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra skad 'byam mi thaMd nga gi 'am nga ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gag grub pa de ban/
174a2(mdo): sa 'i bar du shad pa rlos kyi na ro/ kya chu ses dpa' gnyis la gcig 'i khrun byed chos zhes bya ba dang / ciganas mi sangs
174a3(mdo): dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa nas thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po ngos byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis pos te 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// rigs
174a4(mdo): kyi bu dag khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed du deng la nga'i tshig gi/ rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am// bde bar reg pa la gnas sam// zhes snun
174a5(mdo): gsol cig/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing // myi mjed kyi sa dang / nam mkha' thams cad yang dag par rjes
174a6(mdo): su mthong ste/ de na sa dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi skabs kyang ma mchis na/ bdag cag gang tu gnas par bgyil gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
174a7(mdo): bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed na go skabs myed do zhes de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab
174a8(mdo): pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te// sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / theg pa gsum gyis chos bstand pa las brtsams te chos stond par mdzad pa dang / slab
174a9(mdo): pa gsum kyi sdom pa stond par mdzad pa dpa/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum po dog stonod par mdzad pa dang / sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang / zhi ba'i lam
174b1(mdo): gsum po dag la rab tu bkod par mdzad pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la ni 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de mngon par rdzog/
174b2(mdo): par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig ma/ 'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs shing ri brag myi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po myig ces bya ba gnas shing sa la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
174b3(mdo): bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun las 'da' bar mdzad cing / bzhugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sa la 'ili phug thams cad khyab par gyur pa te/ de na gang tu de bzhin gshegs
174b4(mdo): pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang byed do// zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang dgas bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag
174b5(mdo): khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de// la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa// 'i phyir 'jig rten ga khams myi mjed kyi ri de dag gang yin pa
174b6(mdo): de logs su mngon du phyogs te/ 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du
174b7(mdo): 'phags pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad spros pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis kye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri skyed pa 'di dag yong la/ lho rlob kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i
174b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyi mjed der deng shig/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la spyan phyi mngal 'am// thugs bde 'am zhes kyang snyun gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral
174b9(mdo): mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po des mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma byed pa dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug myed ze mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yang dag 'dongs
175a1(mdo): tsa/ byin nas/ 'di skad ces bka' mjog kyi bu dag pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gi khams kyi mjed du deng shig/ de nas srog chags nyi khris kyang gsolang pa/ btsum pa bcom ldan 'das
175a2(mdo): bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi bu'i slad du 'jig rten rten gi khams myi mjed du mchi lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa des
175a3(mdo): bka' stsald pa// rigs kyi bu dag bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du deng shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas
175a4(mdo): kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba de nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed 'dir phyi nad te/ bya rgod phung po'i ril so sor 'khod ngo // so sor 'khod nas
175a5(mdo): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa/ ga lA ba de logs su thal mo sbya rad pa btud de gsold pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang shar gi phyogs logs
175a6(mdo): su zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa des mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag kyang skur zhing bcom ldan 'das la lhun gyi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am zhes kyang lhun gsolang lags so//
175a7(mdo): zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g.yos te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang der 'dus par gyur da pa de dag
175a8(mdo): gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan g.yos pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yongs su zhus pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// de bzhin du de'i tshe na re
175a9(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa sa pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po'i 'od gzer dang / pad ma dam pa dang / tsan dan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang / rgya mtsho dang / skar ma'i snying po dang / rnam par gnon pa'i
175b1(mdo): na nga tsananas ga nas sug N+DI byed mas byed pa ba dgas rgyang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang debazhi gshegs pags ma grub pa sa yongs su zhu 'dang / yod 'bya /
175b2(mdo): bakhye bcur byab dang / chos nyan bu'i khyo sde tog zla ba mdog mdzes drim byed pa dag yog / sangs rgyas kyi ning kyi mjed 'dir rnags pa dang / de'i ming la de bzhin gshegs bkas kyi mu' pa'i rgyu 'phrus kyis bus
175b3(mdo): sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed du 'dus par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi chang tsam du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi mjed thams cad de lta bu 'i sems can ngas
175b4(mdo): gis khyab par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis dang nam a kha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyurd to// gang tu sems can dag gis la khyab par ma gyurang pa'i go skabs ni rba
175b5(mdo): tha na myig sman gi zur ma gzugs gi gtos tsam yang myed do// sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shag/ kye thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par/ nam mkha' stong par mthong
175b6(mdo): du zad kyi gcig gis ma mthong ngo // de dag gi myig lam du ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor sug chen po dang / ri rnams kyang sAng bar ma gyurd to// 'jig rten ka bar dag kyang myi snang / lga'i
175b7(mdo): gzhal byed khang rnams kyang kyi sdang ste/ 'og tu gser gi 'khor la thug pa'i bar dang / de'i steng gi sa gzhi yang myig lam du snang bar ma gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da dam mkha' khyab
175b8(mdo): chos selang shi nang tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par rtogs pa dang / des mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma byed pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo thams cad du zhugs te/ gang dag 'jig rten gnyi
175b9(mdo): byi mjed gi khongs su chung bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // sems cadan de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba dag kyang gzugs la kun tu lta bu'i byed pa dang bral bar byed par
176a1(mdo): dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i sgo 'ba' zhig tu nges par rtogs te/ de yang 'di lta ste dper na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skyed mos tshal lta bur rim po mo'i gang ljond pa sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs
176a2(mdo): dang / mye tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bskyed mos tshal dag mthong ngo // shing ljonod paras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpung rgyan dang
176a3(mdo): mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de dag mthong ba dang / sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag bskyed mos 'tshal de/ ltar dong ngo snyam nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed kyi khongs su
176a4(mdo): chud par gyurd pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las/ semasacan dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / cud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa na pyod pa
176a5(mdo): rnams ma rtogs par sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin ga/ shegs pa de'i spu'i sgo dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du zhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
176a6(mdo): rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te/ gzhengs pa dang / sems can de ngag gcig gcig mthong nas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ga kya thub pa la ga la bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' byams
176a7(mdo): pas smras pa/ kye sems can dag bdag cag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par shes bzhin gyis soms shig/ de nas sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyi nang bcas
176a8(mdo): par mthong zhing / ji ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs te/ 'dus par gyu rad pa rang rang gi mngon gsum du gyu rad nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gang nas de bzhin gshegs
176a9(mdo): pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs shing sus 'dir bcug snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la smras mngon par byas te smras pa/ khyod cag nyon cig/ 'di ni
176b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'grus pa// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo 'phrul yin te/ gang gi phyir bdag 'akrus pan pa yadzang pa'i stong du pa sos spyod par mdzad kyis/ de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyis/
176b2(mdo): soms shig// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar pa btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba pyod pa'i chos thams cad bstan to// de la bde ba pyod pa'i chos thams cad gang
176b3(mdo): zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'khor ba'i 'dam las bsgral ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzung pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes
176b4(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de la bsam gtan la gzung dpa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste phan pa'i dngos po yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ sems
176b5(mdo): can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang // sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir gru chen po yang // dag par bsgrub pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir phyin ci log
176b6(mdo): las yongs su thard par bya ba'i phyir/ ma grol ba bgrol ba 'i go cha dang / chos bdag myed par so sor brtag pa'i phyir seng ge 'i sgra chen pos myi skrag pa'i don dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma
176b7(mdo): dang / myi lam dang / myig yor lta bur rtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i go cha dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa' la gnas pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gi khams thams
176b8(mdo): cad snang bas brgyan par byed pa'ogo tsha dang / ma ros tu phyidad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nims bcu yongs su bsgrub pa ga cha dang / ji skad smras pa de
176b9(mdo): bzhin du byed pa'i phyir/ mya 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i go cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bad/ ma lus par
177a1(mdo): 'thob pa'i go cha dang / smos pa myed pa ste/ de dag mi bde ba pyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzung ba rnam pa bcu'o// mtshan nyid byed pa'i sgo yongs su shes pa/ rtogs pa'i 'apyod pa dang / chos thams cad
177a2(mdo): bdag myed par yid la byed pa dang / sems bskyed pa myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa yin te/ de la mi 'jug pa dang ldog pa chad cing rtag pa myed pa dang / gdeg pa byed pa
177a3(mdo): dang / gzhag pa myed pa yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gang ga'i klung dung phyur phrag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
177a4(mdo): pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa
177a5(mdo): sna tshogs thos par gyur nas/ thams cad de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir 'thon pa dang / ngo mtsham/ du gyur pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
177a6(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khorar dang sku'i tshod brtag pa'i phyir phyogs bcur rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag du dong ngo // de na byang chub sems dpa'
177a7(mdo): shar phyogs logs su dong ba dag/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi lci dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pazhag kya thub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nyams pa myed cing der
177a8(mdo): tshig dang / don dang yig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra dag de bzhin du thos te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gag kya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug pa'i tshe// chos thos pa de bzhin du de'i chos thos so//
177a9(mdo): gzhan yang de na de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa'i sku yang skyes pa 'am/ bri bar myi mngon par de bzhin gshegs pa gag kya thub pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dag gis khyab par
177b1(mdo): sdang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i sku'i sgo gcig na yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag 'jug cing 'byung bar sdang ngo // de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas/
177b2(mdo): spu'i sgo thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ste/ phyogs bcu'i bar du yang de bzhin du rjod par bya'o// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs par
177b3(mdo): gyur pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ske dag nas khyer 'thod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
177b4(mdo): don dang / tshig dang / yi 'bru dang smra dang / brjod pa sna tshogs dag gis bstod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyan snga na 'khod do// de nas de'i mod la 'dod pa na pyod pa dang / gzugs na myod pa'i/
177b5(mdo): lha'i bu rnams kyis/ spos dang / kye tog 'phreng dang / byug pa smra tshogs kyi bar dag rab tu phab ke/ kwa'i sil snyan kyang rab tu gsis nas lha'i gzugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rba
177b6(mdo): bza' dang / ras bcos bu dang / brgyan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcon par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs byed yang dag 'drend ces bya ba des bcom
177b7(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lung bstand pa chen po'i mdo'i sde 'di'i phyir ci lags// bcom
177b8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba dang / mang po 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub seMs
177b9(mdo): dpa' lung bstand pa zhes bya ba dang / myi 'jigs pa'i lam du smos pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzinid kyi rtog pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu stonod pa zhes bya ba dang / rgya
178a1(mdo): lta bu zhes bya ba dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / snying rje pad ma dkar po zhes bya'o// yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan gnyis kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos
178a2(mdo): kyi rnam grangs 'ang mnyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par stond par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par
178a3(mdo): 'gyur lags// bka' stsald pa/ ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te/ de yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o// gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
178a4(mdo): klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par stond par byed pa dang / gang yang ma'o/ nges pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na/ tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na
178a5(mdo): de bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyind pa drug la pyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin
178a6(mdo): no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang baHsa pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang / bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / klu dang / dri za dang /
178a7(mdo): grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / myi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang / lu ldan su'i khyab dang thal po dang lal pa dang chod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams
178a8(mdo): cad nye bar zhing bya dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang 'chi ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bde bar bya ba dang / lo legs par bya
178a9(mdo): pa dang / nad byed par kun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / smag pa rnams 'jigs pa myed cing bde bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i yab rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / ngan pong gsu
178b1(mdo): gyi sdug bsngal las tha rad par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstand par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzinang dang gzungs dang / bzod pa thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba/
178b2(mdo): dang / rdo rje'i bdar la 'dug par bya ba dang / bdung bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i nor 'dum dang
178b3(mdo): bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang / 'khor yang por bya ba dang / myi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad par
178b4(mdo): bya/ su zhig lnga brgya pa tha ma la nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsku nga bar 'gyur zhing / chos ma yin pa spur len pa'i sems can rnams da tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par
178b5(mdo): 'gyur/ chos ma yin pa la chags pas chags par 'gyur/ kha rnams dang / 'dod pa kyi bza pal 'i sad kyis gnod pa/ rnams dang / rnam yon pas yongs su dkris pa rnams dang
178b6(mdo): rnams can yongs su sbyind pa nams sus du skyob skyeng para'agyur ga su snyam dgongs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i ma ldan ladas kyi thugs kyi yongs su rtog pa ma
178b7(mdo): xxx
178b8(mdo): rgyus pa de zhed de bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa yang pa/ drang srong min po khyod kyis chos kyi nas mangs 'di thung la/ lnga brgyal pa sa na phyir gyi ldog pa kyang
178b9(mdo): mims dpa' yus ga'an rgya song ba'i ya dag gi ma lam du rab tu sgrogs gas/ dengs kyang phyin gyi ldog pa'i sems bskyed du chug shes// gamis dam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de mnan
179a1(mdo): te btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag smon lam gyis bskald pa chen po brgyad bcu rtsa ba'i 'das pa nas/ gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi khyad pa pyod pa ma/
179a2(mdo): bdag gis sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la yang rab tu bkod lags te/ bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga
179a3(mdo): brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind par bgyid pa dang / gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzind par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyi rang bar bgyi
179a4(mdo): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal da nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lga dang / myi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/
179a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bston to// / 'phags pa snying rje pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// rdzogs s+ho//
179a6(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya san d+hi ma la ma ha su tra// bo di sad tA ma ha bi ni shu ya nir de'i shan mA hA ma Ni rang na ko'u sha l+ya nir de ga
179a7(mdo): ma hA pa ri nA ma ra dzA na ma// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las/ nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa pa
179a8(mdo): yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rdo rje rin po che'i rtse mo la bzhug
179a9(mdo): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// kye rgyas pa'i sras 'di la byang chub la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi
179b1(mdo): skyabs byed par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pa blangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed 'dod pa// byang chub sems
179b2(mdo): dpa' chen po'i pyod pa'i tshogs nye bar bsogs par 'dod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob par 'dod pa/ sgrib pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang gzungs dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo rnams kyis
179b3(mdo): rtse 'am 'dod pa/ nam mkha' mdzod nyid dang / lag ma rin cem nyid 'thob par 'dod pas 'di ltar sngo bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po nas
179b4(mdo): dang / rdo rje 'chang rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las la rab tu gnas pa mying 'di ci zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems
179b5(mdo): dpa' thams cad la rgyas thams cad su yong ye 'bul zhing mchis/ na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnga' chen po can rnams dang / bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnyes pa rnams
179b6(mdo): kyis bzhes shing bdag la rtag tu bsod nams kyi stobs chen po dang / ye shes kyis nye bar brtan pa dang / pa thon 'grusadang / brtsor ba'i bdag nyid dang / zhi ba dang / mul ba dang / 1
179b7(mdo): zhi ba'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// de'i 'og tu yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag la dgongs
179b8(mdo): su gsol// bdag myid ci zhes bgyi ba 'khor bar ltung ba bcing bas bcings pa/ btson rar chud pa/ chos kyi sas stor ba/ nyon mongs pa'i rig pado' bas mngon par gces pa/ mgon ma mchis/
179b9(mdo): ba/ grubs ma mchis pa// sprob pa ma mchis pa// gnas ma mchis pa/ dpung mnyen ma mchis pa/ rton pa ma mchis pa/ lam gol bar zhugs pa/ 'khor ba la mngon tu phyogs pa/ mya ngan las
180a1(mdo): haM/ 'das pas rgyab kyis bltas pa/ ngan song la gzhol pa/ ngan song la 'bab pa// ngan song las 'bab pa/ myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs par ltung ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyem dang bral ba
180a2(mdo): sman pa la myi sman pa dang / 'thun pa la myi 'thun pa dang / dge ba la myi dge bar gzung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blta ba la rgyab kyis 'phyogs pa/ skye ba dang / rga
180a3(mdo): ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyi 'tshe bas gtses pa/ bde ba ma thob pa/ myi skrag pa ma thob pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma gzhag pa/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang / nges pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang /
180a4(mdo): bag yod dang bral ba/ ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs dang / swa dang/ bzod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa rnams la gnas pa dang bral ba/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
180a5(mdo): snyoms la gnas pa dang / myi ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshu/ la khrims kyi sdom pa rnam gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes chen po dang bral ba/ shin tu gnas
180a6(mdo): pa'i chos kunan tu 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid la gyi gnas pa mngon par shes pa dang bral ba/ stobs rnams ma thob pa/ kyi 'jigs pa dang kyi ldan zhing myi gnas pa/ kyi brjed pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'gro
180a7(mdo): ba'i zhabs dang kyi ldan pa/ yon tan gyis stong pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi gos kyis ma g.yogs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bgrod pa dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal brgya stong
180a8(mdo): brag tums mngon par gtses pa/ rtag tu gdungs pa// rtag tu dman pa dang // rtag tu mongs pa/ rtag tu mnyas par sa bzhag / rtaka tu nyon mongs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa lags / thugs rje chen po sa
180a9(mdo): dgongs te/ bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gas so/ zhi nyi pa da pa gad kyi chu dang byang chub kyims dang / byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs par
180b1(mdo): stobs brgya dang / gyi 'jigs pa bani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / so mo yang dag pa rig pa bani dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba dang / gzungs rnams sbubs mdzad dugasol// bdag gi sun
180b2(mdo): gsum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gams phu gsol// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / mthu chen po rnyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
180b3(mdo): rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po bgyis nas bdag 'bul lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na bkod pa/
180b4(mdo): chen po rnams kun tu gnas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gzhal myed khang rnams dang / rin po che'i gang ljond pa rnams dang rin po che'i ri rnams dang / rin po che'i bdan rnams dang / rin po/
180b5(mdo): che'i lan kan rnams dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba rnams dang / ri/ na po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i rgyas mtshan rnams/ dang / rin po che'i chun po rnams dang / rin po che'i mu tig gA nga?
180b6(mdo): pa rnams dang / rin po che'i snod rnams dang / rin po che'i 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams dang / rin po che'i gling brgya dang / nor bu chen po rnams dang / mar mye'i sdong bu gtsang ba nor bu dang / rin po che
180b7(mdo): sna tshogs kyis spras pas 'tsher ba/ gser gyi cong tsong mang pos btags pa rnams dang / pad ma 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i ge ser ga ge sar chen po can rnams dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rnams dang / gser gyi
180b8(mdo): gzhal myed khang rnams dang / rin po'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i char rnams dang / rin po che'i snying po can gyi khang bzangs brtsigs pa nor bu rab mchog sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che
180b9(mdo): lan kan can rnams dang / rigs sngags 'chang chen po 'o skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gnas nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gzhal myed khang nyams dga' ba rnams dang / lha'i skyed mos tshas
181a1(mdo): nyams dga' ba rnams dang / sA'i nye bar gyung ba nyams dga' ba yongs sum khyad pa ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo/
181a2(mdo): gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis pa'i spa nang nab pa snga tshogs rnams dang / bcud kyis lend kyi rigs rnams dang / gang dag dus thams cad pa'i nor bu dang / gangabadag zhas zas ro zhim po phun sum chos
181a3(mdo): pa khyad par chu 'phags pa rnams dang / gang dag dri gdal ba'i ljo shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi ldod shing nas pa sna tshogs dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / tsam dan dmar po rnams dang / rtag tu kye tog dang ldan
181a4(mdo): ba'i nags tshal chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngang rgyas pa yid du mchi ba'i dri gda' ba'i ljon gang ga rigs rnams dang / gang dag dpag bsams kyi zhing bdag gi ma mchis shing / yongs
181a5(mdo): su 'dzind pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag rgya mtsho'i// nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang / yad bzhin gyi nor/ bu rnams dang / gang dag ri spun po dang / ti se dang / spos kyi
181a6(mdo): ngad ldang dang / ma la ya dang / 'bigs byed dang / man dar dang / rje'i ri las stsogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi zom rnams la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa theg pa rnams dang / rin
181a7(mdo): po che sna tshogs kyi bug rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi brag rnams dang // ka ba rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis kazhi bstan pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhas myed khang rnams
181a8(mdo): rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po rnams dang / ran pa cha sna chags kyi phang pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka pa rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
181a9(mdo): khang pa'i tshar rnams dang / nor bu bye dur+ya sna tshogs kyi sgron ma rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi zhal myed khang blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi lha'i grong khyer gzhal myed khang yongs su/
181b1(mdo): gzung ba ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi me tog blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi klu dbyangs kyi cha gyad rnams dang gzhal myed khang stong pa rnams kyi char rlung gis bskyod pan sgra snyan pa
181b2(mdo): 'byin pa rnams dang / rol mo'i cha byad kyi rnam pa ma bkrol bar rang sgra snyan par 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi bya'i tshogs gzhal byed khang stong pa rnams na gnas shing skad snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang /
181b3(mdo): gang dag rin po che'i sprin sgra dbyangs chen po snyan par 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi nor bu rnams dang / gang dag glu dbyangs rnams dang / gang dag dri gda' ba'i me tog gi shing ljond pa rnams dang / 'the
181b4(mdo): ba'i ljond shing rnams dang / spos kyi ljond shing rnams dang rgyal mtshan gyi ljon shing rnams dang / ba dan gyi ljon ga'i rnams da rin po che'i sngon zhing yongs su ma pyang pa de dag thams cad sangs
181b5(mdo): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo// gang dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i 'jig rten/ gi khams thams cad na/ mchod pa'i sprin me tog gi sprin rnas
181b6(mdo): dang / dri'i sprin rnams dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / bdug pa'i sprin rnams dang / lhab lhub kyi sprin rnams dang / byug pa'i sprin rnam sa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i
181b7(mdo): rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sdon 'ang gi sprin rnams dang / rin po ches bkang ba'i snod kyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che nor bu chen po srungs pa'i sprin nas
181b8(mdo): da/ rim po chenas pa lnga thogs pa'i smin rnams dang / mar kye'i snod stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi med cas la dririm po'i 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang zhing snying po'i ras mi rab brgya'i sad cas rab tu
181b9(mdo): 'bar ba rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'phrul lo// de dag thams cad la gsol ba ni/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud gdul
182a1(mdo): pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bskas pa bzhugs par gsol
182a2(mdo): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis myi dmyigs par bzhugs te bsngos pa ltar bdag gi bsod nams thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
182a3(mdo): thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so// oM s+pha ra s+pha ra/ bi ma na sa ra/ ma hA dza pa hUM/
182a4(mdo): de'i 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du/ sgra rdzas kyi mchod pa rin po che'i sprin rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar 'gyu dang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la
182a5(mdo): la zhig sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa yid la byed pas yongs su/ bsngo ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'di nyin par mtshan mo 'don na/ de'i sdig pa rnams zad par 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
182a6(mdo): kyang bsrabs par 'gyur ro// kong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro// la nad cig bzlas brjod byas nas tshangs pa brgya'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro// rmyi lam na yang rtag tu de
182a7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos stond pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags rnams kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang gis yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
182a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstand pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas
182a9(mdo): ba bstand pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rdzogs spro// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya Ur+ya ga NA na na ma ma
182b1(mdo): hA be'i bu l+ya su tra na// bod skad du/ 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi sa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo'o// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
182b2(mdo): le// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi nong gzhan
182b3(mdo): grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag nas/ der lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs myed dpag tu byed brjod du byed pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so//
182b4(mdo): de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang / gnan dag nas der 'dus te spags pa'i nyan thos chen po grangs myed pa dpag tu myed pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing bdun
182b5(mdo): byis bltas so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa'i dang nga po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / lha'i dbang
182b6(mdo): po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / myi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
182b7(mdo): dbang po'o grangs myed dpag tu byed pa dag brjod du byed pa dag gis kyang / myi mched kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang na ma ka la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to// de bzhin du 'dod pa na khyod/
182b8(mdo): pa dang / gzugs na 'apyod pa'i sgra gzhan dang // gzhan dag dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / kyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang / gzhan grangs byed
182b9(mdo): dpag tu myed pa dag kyang lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gye nad tu lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das ring po myi thogs par mthar phyind pa/ nam mkha' ltar snang ba byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa
183a1(mdo): rab tu 'byed pa/ dbugs na tsA pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa 'amib skyed pa'i zho/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa lung bsta nang pa ston pan/ nga kyi lba bar 'khod de thams cad dang ldan pa skyemached kyi sangs
183a2(mdo): nus kyi zhing thams cadas dang dram mkha'i lam gang par gyur cing / da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi car gyis chos bstand pas chis par ma gyur danas/ zal mo dag rab tu sbya rad te/ bcom ldan 'a/
183a3(mdo): kho na la sta zhing 'khod pa na/ dper na nas dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / mun pas khebs pa dag snang ba la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
183a4(mdo): sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te/ de ltar gyi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang nam mkha'i las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyam tho
183a5(mdo): ngag dang dbang po brgya byin dag na/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po// dag gi bar dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na myod// pa'i lha gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams
183a6(mdo): gzhan dang / gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan ba chos kyi rgyal po la lta zhing / thal mo sbyar te/ cang myi smra bar 'khod par gyurd to// de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po pad ma 'bar
183a7(mdo): ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog pa/ chos la dbyigs pa'i byams pa'i
183a8(mdo): shin tu yongs su spang ba byas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa chen po pad+ma ma 'bar ba'i dpal stand las langs te/ pra gros thug pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lci pas la btsugs
183a9(mdo): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo skya rad pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol bar btab bo// ring du gshegs gang gyur pa'i rgyud ga
183b1(mdo): ma/ thung ba skur mdzad kyis po 'ong gams za// rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa'o// khyod gsung ragazhing rgyaskar tshul mkhye nang mkhas// dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rnam pa mkhye na // tshangs pa'i gas
183b2(mdo): bya bzhi po dag dang ldan// sring ba gsum po ji ster dag 'gyur bar// sems can 'gro ba sas mdzad pa po// tshul gcig ldan pa nyid kyi sakhyen mngal ba// wA gyi rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang /
183b3(mdo): sos nyi rgyal mdzad rigs pa stes chu bo rgal/ bde 'gro 'i mkhyerd pa gyur dang ldan pa/ byang chub myong dang sangs rgya mngon gsum// sems g.yo'i sems can kha cig 'dod krung srung // bum pas
183b4(mdo): khyebs shing myig rang kyi ldan pa yi// sdug bsngal thams cad com par gyur lags pa// ma thos dge bral slob dpon khas pa ldan pa'i/ skye bo bral la myi dbang thugs rje s+ye/
183b5(mdo): mnyan pa'i chos mngon skye ba'i pha rol da mtsha'i sred pa'i bcod pa/ bshad par mdzad dugasol// skye klung pha rol gshegs thu// bzugs rjes gsungs// blo 'chal skye mang sred pa'i lam//
183b6(mdo): de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba can der ni sems can 'khyam 'gyur gcad du gsol // gang du sdug bsngal rab zhi dbang drug dang // yid kyang zhi 'gyur sred skyon rgyal bas gsungs//
183b7(mdo): sred pa bral ba sred rgyu kye mnga' ba// sems can gdung ba dpal kun bral gyur pa/ de slad thub pa thugs pa che ba yi rgyus// sred pa'i chu klung skyems mdzad pa// myur du bde'i zhing 'chi ba
183b8(mdo): ma mchis pa'i// chos kyang sred pa gcod pa bshad par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa pad ma 'bar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang dag sngon chad pha rol
183b9(mdo): phyi nang // spyod pa phyed cing spyod 'gyur ba// de dag nyan thos chos rnams la// nam yang dga' bar myi bya ste// sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i// ltung ba gnyis pa gzhan myed de// de
184a1(mdo): ni yang dang yang du yang // gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin// khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang // rkye nad kyi byang chub 'jug pa'i// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// skye gnas bzhi
184a2(mdo): ldan sems can 'di// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa dag/ thams cad 'dod pa sten myi byed// thams cad myi sdug thob ma yin// 'di ni sems can mkhas pa gang // byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs
184a3(mdo): shing // gang po gzungs dang bzod pa la// brtson zhing legs par goms byas la// / dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing // skyil mo krung gis dran bzhag nas// rang gi 'apyod yul zil gnon pa// phyi ma'i
184a4(mdo): dus kyi de bzhin gshegs// nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa yang yi na 'dir ni myi sdug tshul bshad na// kun gzhi gang yin sems can gyi// 'ching ba brtan pa 'dir bcad 'gyur// ngas ni chos
184a5(mdo): kyi ser sna spangs// sems can bsrung phyir ma bshad de/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub phyir sems 'a// der myi gtang // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis//
184a6(mdo): chos 'dir yun ring gnas bya zhes// sa 'di yongs su spyad cing sa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed kyis kyang zhing 'di la ni bache bar byos// de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses
184a7(mdo): bsdams nas yun ring gnas par byos// nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de// sems can chags las tha rad bya zhing // phung po dag dang khams rnams dang // skye mched stong pa ngas bshad do// ni gnas
184a8(mdo): nam pa bcu gsum dang // lhag mthong nga yis bshad bya ste/ 'dod pa'i bcing bas dam bcings pa'i// sems can de yis nas dag 'gyur// sems can rnams la snying brtse bas// nyan thos rnams/
184a9(mdo): kyi bden pa bzhi// chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang // zag pa myed phyir ngas bshad do// nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni// srid pa'i mtsho las ngas bsgral lo// byang chub pyod pa thams cad
184b1(mdo): kyang / phyi nas khyed la bstand par bya// de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i myi mched kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di
184b2(mdo): ni nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi// theg pa chen po'i gtam ni myi mdzad do snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin
184b3(mdo): gshegs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad ris yongs su spyad ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ gang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
184b4(mdo): rgyun gyi 'chang bar bya ba'i phyim dang / sa 'ongs pa'i rus ma lba dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' shA dang / gyi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / byi dang gyi ma yin pa sa
184b5(mdo): dad pa' rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams/ byir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can chos la ma/ don par brtson pa dag dang / chos la gnas pa dag dang / yon
184b6(mdo): tan gyis phyug pa dag dang / tshul khrims kyis dri dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang / rnam par 'gro 'tsham pa myed par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang grol kyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par
184b7(mdo): bya ba'i phyir dang / ji nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ga nad tu yon tan dag gis bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang / phyogs btsun gdas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgo ba'i 'os su gyu rang ba dang / tha ma
184b8(mdo): mas gus pa dang / byag bya ba'i 'os su gyu rang par bya ba'i phyir bdag cag nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pas/ ma la bdag cag gis/ da de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/
184b9(mdo): khang zag thams ca dkyis pa'i steng cu sus mo srung gis 'khod par bya me/ rang rang gi nas pa sna sogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams ca dang ldan pa'i mthong ba dang / gzungs dang ting dz+ra
185a1(mdo): dang / rnal 'byor de dag gis gnas pa dag tu bya'o gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang dag sa bcu/
185a2(mdo): ngag dang / gang dag myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la/ gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / myi 'jigs/
185a3(mdo): pa thob pa dag gi bar de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyu rad to// de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog pa bzod pa dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzind dag la mnyam par
185a4(mdo): bzhag pa dag tu gyur to// yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin rgyu 'thun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang / byang chub
185a5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag/ las/ kha cig ni lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste dper na// mer mye 'i 'od lta bu'o// kha cig ni skar mda' dang mnyam pa
185a6(mdo): dag go// kha cig ni ni brgya byin dang mnyam pa dag go// kha cig gi ni myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas/ kha cig gi ni zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go// kha cig gi ni
185a7(mdo): nyi ma dang mnyam pa dag go// kha cig gi ni nyi ma gnyis dang mnyam pa dag go// kha cig gi ni nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag go// kha cig gi ni nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go/ kha cig ni nyi ma stong dang
185a8(mdo): mnyam pa'i bar dag go// kha cig gi lus las ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste/ myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i sngas chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig
185a9(mdo): te khyab par gyur to// de dag gi lus las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang / sems kyi bde ba la reg pa dang / dge ba dang rab tu tshim par byed pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ s+t+wa/
185b1(mdo): ngan tha thams cad rab tu ni par byed pa/ sum kyi samya ngan len thams cad rab tu ni par byed pa/ bkres bu dang bsgom pa thams cad rab tun par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu'i bar byed pa/
185b2(mdo): ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na srid pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams
185b3(mdo): cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed do// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang / chos la bab pa dag dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' ba la mkhas pa dag 'khod
185b4(mdo): bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas 'di phyogs bcu'i ka nga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa pa dang / stong ba ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa/
185b5(mdo): ma yin pa dag na/ kun nas lam me lhan ne/ spang der yang dag/ par snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma brgya stong shard nas/ lha me lhan ne lgang nge ba bzhin te/ de
185b6(mdo): ltar de'i tshe myi mched kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin ba dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dag na
185b7(mdo): kun nas mchog tu lam me ldan ne ldang nger gyur da to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa/ gang dag bskal pa rgyas nges par 'byung ba dag
185b8(mdo): dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / myi 'jigs pa thob pa'i bar de dag/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas chas te seMs
185b9(mdo): kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du sa steng du skyal mo krung gis 'khod par gyur da to// de bzhin du rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan
186a1(mdo): dag tu byed cing / ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs skyed pa thob pa de dag dang / myi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang rkye nad dang ldan pa'i de dag gi lus de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyu rad to// de na bcom ldan 'das
186a2(mdo): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas/ nyan thos chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig/ byind kyi rlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams
186a3(mdo): cad kyi yul zi lad kyis mnan nas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir gyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun myi gcad pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir myi mjed kyi
186a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs su khyad pa mdzad do// de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs byed pa dpag tu myed pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan dang
186a5(mdo): mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par che ba dang ldan pa dag gis myi mjed kyis pargya de na/ chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sgra dang / klu dang gnod
186a6(mdo): sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang phyi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par byaba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'brel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
186a7(mdo): sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos kyis gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dgu dang / sems la dbang ba dang ldan par gyur pa rnams bde' ba la reg pa dang / rnam par po brtsam pa
186a8(mdo): myed par bya ba'i phyir dang / nga'i bstand pa rab tu kyi 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bya grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sa chen po 'di yongs su khyad par byas pa yin no// don de nyid byid kyi
186a9(mdo): brlabs par bya ba'i phyir da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gyis rnam par che bar byed do// sa phyogs gang dang gang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186b1(mdo): chen po 'dingan 'a' / mas gtadu ga sus dag gis rnam par len par byed pa dadang der/ bskar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma dang / kha cig tu la la nga 'das nas/ sems can 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa
186b2(mdo): smug cing / mya ngan las 'das pa 'do pa dag sku gzung gi mchod rten dag byed du 'jug pacu 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bzhums khang dag gas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gas/ chom
186b3(mdo): kyi bzugs khang ngag byed par 'gyur ro// yang na der glegs pam chu bri bar byas nas/ nga'i chos kyi sku yang 'chang bar 'gyur ro// dem mchod pa rnam pa sna rtogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur ming
186b4(mdo): der ris po tshe rnam pa lnga tshogs dag kyang 'bul par 'gyuradang 'di lta ste/ dper dang dus dang / byi nur+ya dang / shes dang / tig dbar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / smug dang / nor bu dang
186b5(mdo): mu tig dang / dbyig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi mu las/ sogs pa dang / dar yug dang / dril bu dang/ za bug dang / gso ras bzang po dang / yul ka ni l-i ras bzang po dang /
186b6(mdo): dbu rten nang tshangs can dang gding ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / chos gos dang gur rgyan dang phyag rgyan dang spos dang / mye tog dang / bdug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / yus
186b7(mdo): 'dud pa dang / bla ma dang gus pa chen po dang gces par byed pa dag tu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// de dag gi mchod
186b8(mdo): pa ni nga nas/ nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir myi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro// sa phyogs la lar ni gtsug lag khang dang /
186b9(mdo): gnas khang dang / 'chag sa dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dag rab tu shom par byed do// yang na nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro rnam
187a1(mdo): ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag
187a2(mdo): dang / 'chag sa dang / dgon pa'i gnas de dag tu yang bkur sta byis te/ chos nyand pa dang / rnam par gtan la dbab pa' gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba 'am/ glegs ba ma dag klog par 'gyur ro//
187a3(mdo): gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa las stsogs pa de dag tu yang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa snga tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste zhing gi ga'i 'am/ khyim gyi gzhi 'am// kun dag 'a ra ba'i/
187a4(mdo): gzhi 'am/ bran dang bran mo dang / glang po tshe dang / rta dang rnga mo dang / bal lang dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / phyugs / zhan dag dang / sdod s+yad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag der
187a5(mdo): yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing / nga yi nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnams longs pyod par bya ba'i phyir mal cha dang / ste/ na gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sems kyi rgyand kyi don dang /
187a6(mdo): sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang / rnal 'byor kyi tshogs kyi don dang / byang grol gyi bde' ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir snga ba dag tu byed do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ pas
187a7(mdo): bas nang pa la sem gdags pa'i phyir yongs su 'atong ba rnas pa sA sogs dag yongs su gtor bar byed do// de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsong ras su bya ba'i dngos po de thams ca
187a8(mdo): latsa nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ der rjes su byugs rang bar mdzad do// bzhes par mdzad do// sems can logro par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gro
187a9(mdo): gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir gyi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro// sems can de dag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid
187b1(mdo): chusang / yongs spyod gnyis tha chos kyi yongs 'apyod dang / thang zing gi longs dpyod dang kyi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dri dang / nags khrod dang shing ljond pa chen po dang / dgon pa dang / nags mad ba gang tu yang rung ste/ daltam
187b2(mdo): dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus mtha rad pa don tu gnyer ba chos kyi gnas pa'i dge slong sa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma smra bsgyangs pa dag dang / gcom bskyangs pa dag dang / na bya yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas
187b3(mdo): pa dag dang / chus bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / 'dus pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sgra dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'dul ba'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthul snyom na/
187b4(mdo): bdud thams cad kyi phu dbum kyi su 'i kyis pa su yo ni de bzhin te/ pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul ring duH/ ras par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gi gdung rgyun gyi
187b5(mdo): 'chad pa'i phyir sngon kyang myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di/ yongs su spyad pa mdzad do// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po grangs myed pa dpag tu myed pa gang dag phyogs
187b6(mdo): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang gi bye ma snyed nas/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang / zhal blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i
187b7(mdo): rgyag dang ldan pa so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i phyir lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bas
187b8(mdo): snying nye ba 'i phyir chos kyi tshul ring chu gnas par bya ba'i don dang / dkon mchog gsum kyi gdung rgyand TI gcang pa'i ngo tu/ bsam gtan gI yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas/ bdud thams cad kyi yul tshar
187b9(mdo): gcad ba'i phyir dang / 'khor bas skrag pa sbyir pa sa mngod par brtson pa'i sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su pyod pa dag tu byed do// ngasur dang sa 'ongs pa'i dus ma
188a1(mdo): nga'i bstand pa 'di dang dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs bstan yun ji srid gnas par chos kyi gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo 'bar gang su
188a2(mdo): dag gis de ltar bsngos pa de la sdig pa 'gyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag tha na 'dab ma cig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / mye tog gcig yongs su pyod pa dag tu byed na/ de ni blun po de la dor ma yin pa dang /
188a3(mdo): pan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi ga zhen/ phyogs thams cad du kyi snyan pa cheran po 'gro ba yin/ mdza' bo dang nye ru dang sdug gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang /
188a4(mdo): slob dpon dang / rim 'gro ba stug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang / rgya ra du bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis phebs par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i gos dang lhung bzed kang
188a5(mdo): yod pa de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yi// na no// lnga gang dag gis zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / mye dang chu dang / bgo'o skal la myod pa myi mdza'
188a6(mdo): pa dang / lnga po de dag gis so// de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'do pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yang yin/ te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal
188a7(mdo): ba chen po myi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas/ sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/ 'brog dgonod pa ro snyam gyi rang du dud 'gro dang yi dgas kyi
188a8(mdo): rim su long ba dang / rka log myed pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de lo brgya stong mang po dog tu bkres pa dang / smyos pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ya ni/ gal te brgyal
188a9(mdo): res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sprul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yi ni/ de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos ma/
188b1(mdo): gshe gyi rnams kyis tu byes na/ nad kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'ang sdigs ma la dang ldan pa stong pa dag ca kyi nyid 'joms pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing / mod rtul ba dang / tshus tu gyi shes par 'gyur ba dang / byig ma tshang ba dang /
188b2(mdo): dang / rkang pa ma 'a ba dang / su myong kyi khams la gtu ni / cag zhung ma'i khazlas thab da / 'das ma dang / byas dang khrod na / 'thog dang gon pa dang / sram po chernams na
188b3(mdo): 'tsho bar 'gyuras/ re de dam shi 'phos nas kyang / yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin pa de sar gyi ba 'byung len/ 'di ltar sdig pa byung pa'i das
188b4(mdo): slong de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la/ khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ba dang / bran dang / bran po dang / thugs dgabar bsngos pa dag thogs nas/ kar zag rang gi yongs su 'apyod/
188b5(mdo): par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa pyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni de lta// ra ngo mtshar mad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul myed par bya ba dang / rnam par bzhag pa dang rgyun gcad pa
188b6(mdo): dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir bcon pa yin no// de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myed par bya ba nas/ nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs
188b7(mdo): ni tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te/ de'i phyir de nyid kyi myi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa lci ba mngon par ma grub
188b8(mdo): pa yin no// de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung mtsham blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mya nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob kyang myi bsngo'o// rab tu byung nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i slad du
188b9(mdo): log par sgrub pa ni de ltar ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ka ya 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gang tu de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur/
189a1(mdo): ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no// 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig kyi nyid thob par rnyed par dka' ba rnyed de/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
189a2(mdo): gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i bar du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas/ 'on kyang
189a3(mdo): skyes bu blun po de gang gis mchod par myi 'gyur ba dang / bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba kyi dge ba'i phyogs/ rnal 'byor nga yid la byed pa yongs su bsams nas/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang / rde'u rigs dang /
189a4(mdo): dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag ki bar/ dge slong chos kyi gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag
189a5(mdo): longs khyod par bya ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i phyogs dang 'thun par/ bya ba'i phyir de ltar yongs su bsngos pa la/ sdig pa pyod pa'i// dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu 'am/ khyim na gnas pa'i
189a6(mdo): mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de/ skyes bu blun po de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de
189a7(mdo): lta bur gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsoyod to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos
189a8(mdo): pa'i longs khyod dang nye bar pyod pa phrogs nas/ bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyis pa'i dge slong rab tu byung ba'i myi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de lta bu 'byung lags na/ dpe' tsam du bgyi na gang yang khyim ma ga dus
189a9(mdo): par gyur la/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs bakhyod dang / nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su dpyod par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig/
189b1(mdo): dang ldam par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rgyal po chen po thong khyod kyi smras pa des ci zhig bya/ gsolang pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos kyis gnas pa'i yon tan gyis phyag/
189b2(mdo): pa de lta bu dag la longs spyod dang / nye bar pyod pa dag gis stsal par ni bgyid kyi/ 'phrog par myi bgyid lags so// 'on kyang slad ma'i dus na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs
189b3(mdo): rigs ma dad pa 'jig rten pha rold kyis 'jigs par myi lta ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dge slong chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis phyag pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs pyod dang / nye bar pyod pa thogs
189b4(mdo): nas/ bdag nyid kyis yongs su dpyod par bgyid kyi gang dag dalags pa de dag gi rgud par 'gyur ba gang lags/ @ ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te ngas
189b5(mdo): yung po lta bu'i rgyal rigs dag nas dasangs rigs dag gi bar/ ngag chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis byug pa dgas/ re snar bsdom pa'i longs khyod dang / nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas
189b6(mdo): bdag nyid kyis yongs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par bsgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/ de'i tshe de dag kyang nga'i bkal bstan pa'i 'phrin las kyi skabs thos nas/ spong
189b7(mdo): ba dag tu byed la/ yid ches pa dag tu kyi byed do// de dag na phreng bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gnyi
189b8(mdo): su yang 'di slar ces gso yod to// phan sa ldan 'das bsta na du gso yod/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan tu gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pa ro lad kyis 'jigs par lta napa 'tsham/
189b9(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba legs pam bstand pa yang dag par 'dzind pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyas rigs nas/ dmangs rigs kyi bar dag gi rigs rgyud rigs 'atsun
190a1(mdo): ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni khyod kyi bka'i 'phrin las bstand pa thos nas/ stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu chen pos rgyal ba'i bstand pa legs par bstand pa
190a2(mdo): gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dag tu 'gyur zhing / gang zag de lar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / chos kyis gnas pa dag dang yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la yang mchod par bgyid pa dang / bsrung ba
190a3(mdo): bgyid pa dang / yongs su bskyod bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'phrog par myi bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyim na gnas pa gang gis gang
190a4(mdo): zag chos kyis gnas pa dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su pyod par bgyid pa de'i rgud pa ra 'gyur ba gang lags/ rgyal po chen po gal te ngas ma 'ongs
190a5(mdo): dus na/ phung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs nas/ dmangs kyi bar dag/ chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyag pa dag la de ltar bsngo// sa pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar pyod pa 'phrog cing / bdag nyid
190a6(mdo): kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par smra ba pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/ de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstand pa'i 'phrin las kyi skabs thos nas spong ba dag tu byed la/ yid ches pa dag tu
190a7(mdo): myi byed de/ de dag ni phung bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gsum du yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
190a8(mdo): ldan 'das bstan du gso yang / bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gso yod/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol dgyis 'jigs par lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bstand pa yang dag

191a1(mdo): pa rang sa dang spun dang chung ma dang bu mo dang bran dang bran mo dag kyang bsko ba bzhin na gyi byed pa yin derigasang sngags gsang ba dag dang / rong gsang ba dang / sras gsang ba dang / de'i dngos po gsangs

191a5(mdo): byed cing / bdag nyid kyis kyang yongs su skyong bar byed pa de 'a// chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar skye// da par skye bar 'gyur 'gyur ro// de der yang tshe bskald par

191a8(mdo): par rkang pa dang lag pa dang kyig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang phyogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kunam cu tsha ba dag gis kun tu gdung bar byed cings su mri dang 'dra ba'i steng tu dmyal bar byed/ yong
191a9(mdo): su dbyal par byed de/ re der lo brgya stong mang por sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no// de gal te brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas na 'a phos nas kyang rgya mtsho'i nang du lus dpag rang 'argya
191b1(mdo): sha rang dam po skye bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rgyas de'i dpag cad kho na yug gi chu zangs bzhun ma star dmar po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// der yang de lo brgya stong mang por chu'i nang du sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa bye

191b3(mdo): do// der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dgas dang bya dag lpags te yongs su za ba dag tu byed do// de brgya la res 'ga' dus ring zhig 'das nas// de nas shi 'phos na yang sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur

193a9(mdo): rnams sang sa sbed par 'gyur ram/ gam 'ad pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yang lags so// btsun pa 'de bar gshegs pa skyes bu rim pa sod rnams kyi phung ba grangs sa mnges/ rad ma mchis dang/

193b2(mdo): de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las zlog par byed pa'i rgyal rigs sam/ ljongs kyi bla de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa

193b4(mdo): snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'a stsald pa/ rgyal po chen po gang zag gcig gi len du pa ngas ma gnang ngo // gnyis las ma yin/ gsum gyi ma yin/ bzhi'i ma
193b5(mdo): yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug la/ ka khang gcig dang / dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na ya/ dge slong chos kyis gnas lnga'i le nad par ngas gnang ste/ 'gan

193b7(mdo): gsos sman dang / yo byad dag longs 'apyod par ngas gnang ngo // gal te gtsug lag khang gcig dang / dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na/ der yang gan Di brdung nas phyogs

198a1(mdo): ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no// de mings pa'i chos su srung ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa la yin par lta bar bya'o// 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas
198a2(mdo): kyi ning yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ ring por myi thogs par bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na
198a3(mdo): rgyas rigs 'chas pa khyed kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang bsta rad pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa dag yang dag par zung zhig dang / de
198a4(mdo): rgyu dad kyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang / dkon mchog gsum gi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang gyi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
198a5(mdo): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhal ta pa zhes bgyi lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsas kyis na zhal ta bar btags pas gang
198a6(mdo): par mdzad pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dge slong gnyis zhal ta par ngas gnang ngo // gnyis gang yin zhes gang yang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la bsgom
198a7(mdo): ba'i dgra bcom pa dang / gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyu nad tu zhugs pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta pa'i las byed par gnang ngo // / 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen pa'i
198a8(mdo): mdo las le'u ma rtsa gcig pa ste/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las dam pa'i chos srung ba'i 'dus pa dang po/ rdzogs spro// / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying
198a9(mdo): bo dang / thabs gcig tu dge slong tshogs kyis gnas pa rnams kun tu bsrung ba'i gtam yang dag par thom pa mdzad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa gang ga'i klub
198b1(mdo): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gi khams yongs su gdung ba myed pa zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs
198b2(mdo): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stonang to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po zhes
198b3(mdo): bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyurd to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos gyi nad tu bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs
198b4(mdo): kyi snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po grangs myed/ dpag tu myed pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su 'dong pa dag mthong bar gyur to//
198b5(mdo): de nas gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dong ba/ nub phyogs su bltas nas kyang de nas snang ba che/ na po mthong nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ga
198b6(mdo): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das steng gi nam mkha' lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis
198b7(mdo): pa gar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags so// nub phyogs kyi snang ba chen po ya dag gis mthong lags na/ 'di la rgyu gang lags/ de nas de bzhin
198b8(mdo): gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi sdong po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas tshad myed pa
198b9(mdo): gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed ces bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
199a1(mdo): rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyis gnas pa' nyid myi 'chad
199a2(mdo): pa'i phyir 'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstand pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu stonod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig/
199a3(mdo): pa'i phyir dang / stobs dang myi ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir 'du bar mdzad de/ de yang de bzhin
199a4(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che me tog ces bya ba gzung sa sngags bshad cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang longs pyod pangar mdzad nas slar gshegs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa
199a5(mdo): ga kya thub pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus/ pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/ so so yang
199a6(mdo): dag par rig pa pa'i dang ldan pa'i khyan gsum dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dag bstand kyang / da dung 'khor sangs kyi gyi mjed kyis dang / nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang ga ni
199a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos das pa gsungs pa/ shAg kya thub pa'i chos bstand pa la ngoms pa byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu stanang pa gsung bshag kyi thub pa bsdu ba'o
199a8(mdo): dngos po bzhi dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang / bdud kyi yul nas par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi len dang / sems can kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags
199a9(mdo): bshang par gnod nas gdi 'di snyam du dgongs te byigs 'acu'i langs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma yi ros du myor pa drug sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pazlas
199b1(mdo): brgyas nges par byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan du dring myi 'jog pa'i phyir myi ldog pa'i sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar la 'khod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
199b2(mdo): kyi zhing kyi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur du cing / 'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang / bsam gtan dag gis rnam par myod par gyur sa// des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'diras chen po ma tu gas da
199b3(mdo): dang ldan pa dang bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin gyur da cig snyam dgongs so// de lta bas na
199b4(mdo): da lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mya mjed der zhugs pa/ de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de
199b5(mdo): sgom pa de dag las kha cig gi lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu byung / ste/ dper na 'bru mar gyi mar mye bzhin no// kha cig gi/ lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste/ dper na zla ba
199b6(mdo): dang nyi ma'i bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byu nga ste/ dper na zla ba dang nyi ma'i bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no// der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199b7(mdo): po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed khyab par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
199b8(mdo): lhums par gyu rang bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma gyur par na sdug de'i tshe ting nge 'dzind de lus ldangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed ni chas te
199b9(mdo): der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 'khod cing / rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do// der yang de bzhin gshegs bkag kya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do//
200a1(mdo): bsnyen bskur byed do// 'dus pa chen po de la lta bar byed do// der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa dang / klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang sems can rnams kyi
200a2(mdo): las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do// rags kyi bu khad kyang da ltar tang nga 'dzand las langs nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod dkyi
200a3(mdo): mjed kyi khams su 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing myi mjed de na ni/ sems can rnams shi nad tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing / sred pa'i ltung btags pa dag yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
200a4(mdo): zhing de na nang na yang bud myed gzugs myi sdug pa dang / tshul du myi gas pa dang / mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa dang / dri nga ba dang / myi gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbrar pyod pa'i rgyags pas
200a5(mdo): dregs pa dang / ngo gnyis byed pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa'itshig smra ba dang / tshangs par myod par nga rgyal byed pa dang / blu// na pa dang / mkhas pa nga rgyal can dang / ser sna can dang / gtong
200a6(mdo): bar nga rgyal can da 'da' dam dad par nga rgyal can dang / g.yo sgyu can de nga/ sgyu byed pa dang / drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang / phra dog can dang / pha dog myed pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang / gnod sems dang /
200a7(mdo): ldam pa'i sems dang / byams mam nga rgyal can dang / rnam par dben byed pa dang / 'thun par nga rgyal can dang / log par lta ba dang / yang dag par lta bar nga rgyal can yin te/ skyes bu das pa mkhas pa chen po
200a8(mdo): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan mngon par shes pas rnam par che ba dag bsam gtan yongs su sbyang bar byas su zin kyang / yud tsam gyis bad kyi dbang du 'gyur ba yin no// bud byed kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
200a9(mdo): cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / ngan song ba dag dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la nga'i bkas zhu ba'i phyir/ nga'i
200b1(mdo): bkas kyi mjed kyi 'jig rten gi khams su 'gro bar spron/ der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig pa mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzung
200b2(mdo): sngags las ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad do// der bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba phan yon tshe ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
200b3(mdo): thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyams pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ chol
200b4(mdo): ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ rnab sems thams cad dang / rgod pa thams cad dang / ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par bye da pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang / mthar 'dzind
200b5(mdo): lta ba thams cad dang / the tsom thams cad dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzind thams cad kun tu zad par// byed pa/ rtag par lta ba thams cad dang / chad par lta ba thams
200b6(mdo): cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ sems can du lta ba thams cad dang sgrib par lta ba thams cad dang / gsol bar lta ba thams cad dang / gang zag tu lta ba thams cad dang / byed pa por lta ba thos
200b7(mdo): cad dang / tshor ba por lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs su lta ba thams cad dang / smar lta ba thams cad dang / dring lta ba thams cad dang / ror lta ba thams cad dang / reg byar ltar thams cad kun
200b8(mdo): tu zad par byed pa/ rmang du byung ba thams cad lta ba thams cad dang / skye bar lta ba thams cad dang / gnas par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa 'di dang / bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa
200b9(mdo): gzugs kyi phung po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po thams cad kyi bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ myig gi dbang
201a1(mdo): po thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched
201a2(mdo): thams cad kyi bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa spong bar byed pa/ chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad stond par byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad
201a3(mdo): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang de na sems can rnams 'byung ba dmus long 'dra ba dag dang / mchog tu glen pa dag dang / 'byung po lug dang 'dra ba dag dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis myos pa dag yod do// bden
201a4(mdo): ba dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni sems can de dag gi lta ba thams cad spong ba dang / longs spyod myi zad pa nyid byed pa yin/ bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni chos thams cad
201a5(mdo): gter brtan pa yin/ bsam gis myi khyab pa'i chos la bdud// ngang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud tham/ sa cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig par byed pa yin no// rigs kyi
201a6(mdo): bu gzhan yang bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni bdu da rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin/ klu rnams pham par byed pa'i na/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/ gnod sbyin rnams snying
